GP12garup3_u:7: oṃ mallānāmaśanirnṛṇāṃ naravaraḥ strīṇāṃ smaro mūrtimān gopānāṃ svajano 'satāṃ kṣitibhṛtāṃ śāstā svapitroḥ śiśuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:8: mṛtyurbhojapatervidhātṛvihita stattvaṃ paraṃ yogināṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ ca patiḥ sadaiva śuśubhe raṅge 'cyutaḥ sāgrajaḥ // GarP_3,1.1 //
GP12garup3_u:14: yajantaḥ parayā bhaktyā viṣṇumādyaṃ jagadgurum // GarP_3,1.4 //
GP12garup3_u:22: teṣāṃ śiṣyapraśiṣyāṇāṃ saṃkhyā vaktuṃ na śaṅkyate // GarP_3,1.8 //
GP12garup3_u:26: kena sidhyettu sakalaṃ karma trividhamātmanaḥ // GarP_3,1.10 //
GP12garup3_u:28: sāṃja lirvākyamāha sma vinayāvanataḥ sudhīḥ // GarP_3,1.11 //
GP12garup3_u:31: sa etadakhilaṃ vetti vyāsaśiṣyo yatīśvaraḥ // GarP_3,1.12 //
GP12garup3_u:33: atha te ṛṣayo jagmuḥ puṇyaṃ siddhāśramaṃ tataḥ // GarP_3,1.13 //
GP12garup3_u:38: kena viṣṇuḥ prasannaḥ syātsa kathaṃ pūjyate naraiḥ // GarP_3,1.15 //
GP12garup3_u:42: natvā viṣṇuṃ śriyaṃ vāyuṃ bhāratīṃ śeṣasaṃjñakam /
GP12garup3_u:43: dvaipāyanaṃ guruṃ kṛṣṇaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāmati // GarP_3,1.17 //
GP12garup3_u:44: nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:48: kartavyaṃ brūhi me brahmankṛpayā mama suvrata // GarP_3,1.19 //
GP12garup3_u:49: tataḥ śriyaṃ tato vāyuṃ bhāratīṃ ca tataḥ param /
GP12garup3_u:50: ante vyāsaṃ kimarthaṃ ca tvaṃ namaskṛtavānasi /
GP12garup3_u:51: sūtasūta mahābhāga brūhi kāraṇamatra ca // GarP_3,1.20 //
GP12garup3_u:53: ādau vandyaḥ sarvavedaikavedyo vede śāstre setihāse purāṇe /
GP12garup3_u:54: sattāṃ prāyo viṣṇurevaika eva prakāśate 'to namya eko harirhi // GarP_3,1.21 //
GP12garup3_u:55: sarvatra mukhyastvadhikonyatopi sa eva namyo na ca śaṅkarādyāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:56: namanti ye 'vinayācchaṅkaraṃ tu vināyakaṃ caṇḍikāṃ reṇukāṃ ca // GarP_3,1.22 //
GP12garup3_u:57: tathā sūryaṃ bhairavaṃ mātāraśva tathā vāṇīṃ girijāṃ vai śriyaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:58: sarvepi te vaiṣṇavā naiva loke na tadbhaktā veti cāryā vadanti // GarP_3,1.23 //
GP12garup3_u:59: na pārthikyānnamanaṃ kāryameva prīṇanti naitā devatāḥ pūjanena /
GP12garup3_u:60: pūjāṃ gṛhītvā devatāścaiva sarvāḥ kiñciddatvā phaladānena tāṃśca // GarP_3,1.24 //
GP12garup3_u:61: saṃtarpya tuṣṭaiḥ svamanonu sārāttaiḥ kāritāṃ kāmyapūjāṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:62: nivedayitvā paradevatāyāṃ viṣṇau harau śrīpuruṣādivandye // GarP_3,1.25 //
GP12garup3_u:63: ihāparatrāpi sukhetarāṇi dāsyanti paścādadharaṃ vai tamaśca /
GP12garup3_u:64: ato hyete naiva pūjyā na namyā mokṣecchubhirbrāhmaṇādyairdvijendra // GarP_3,1.26 //
GP12garup3_u:66: śrīkāmya yā ye tu bhajanti nityaṃ śrībrahmarudredrayamādidevān // GarP_3,1.27 //
GP12garup3_u:67: iheva bhuñjanti mahacca duḥ khaṃ mahāpadaḥ kuṣṭhabhagandarādīn /
GP12garup3_u:68: namanti ye 'vaiṣṇavānbrahmarudravāyu pratīkānnaiva te viṣṇubhaktāḥ // GarP_3,1.28 //
GP12garup3_u:69: abhiprāyaṃ tvatra vakṣye munīndrāḥ paraṃ gopyaṃ hṛdi dhāryaṃ hi taddhi /
GP12garup3_u:70: vāyoḥ pratīkaṃ pūjyameveha viprā na brahmarudrādipratīkameva // GarP_3,1.29 //
GP12garup3_u:71: pūjākāle devadevasya viṣṇorvāyoḥ pratīkaṃ yogyabhāge nidhāya /
GP12garup3_u:72: antargataṃ tasya vāyorhariṃ ca lakṣmīpatiṃ pūjayitvā hi samyak // GarP_3,1.30 //
GP12garup3_u:73: paścādvāyoḥ supratīkaṃ ca samyaṅ nirmālyaśeṣeṇa hareḥ samarcayet /
GP12garup3_u:74: pṛthakca sragdhūpavilepanādipūjāṃ prakurvanti ca ye vimūḍhaḥ // GarP_3,1.31 //
GP12garup3_u:75: teṣāṃ duḥ khamiha loke paratra bhaviṣyate nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:76: prāyaścittaṃ svasti viprāḥ kathañcittatkurvantu smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇoḥ // GarP_3,1.32 //
GP12garup3_u:78: namanti ye phalabuddhyā vibhūḍhāsteṣāṃ phalaṃ śāśvataṃ duḥ khameva // GarP_3,1.33 //
GP12garup3_u:79: vāyoḥ pratīkaṃ yadi vipravaryaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ cennamanaṃ hi kāryam /
GP12garup3_u:80: naivedyaśeṣeṇa hareśca viṣṇoḥ pūjā kṛtā cenna hi doṣaleśaḥ // GarP_3,1.34 //
GP12garup3_u:82: evaṃ viditvā paramaṃ hariṃ ca putraṃ punarmukhyadevasya vāyoḥ // GarP_3,1.35 //
GP12garup3_u:83: namaskāro nānyathā vipravaryā ādhīyatāṃ hṛdi sarvai rahasyamam /
GP12garup3_u:84: ye vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇa vadāsabhṛtyāḥ sarvepi te sarvadā viṣṇumeva // GarP_3,1.36 /
GP12garup3_u:85: namanti ye vai pratipādayanti tathaiva puṇyāni ca sāttvikāni /
GP12garup3_u:86: namanti ye vāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca samyak svaśaktyā pratipādayanti // GarP_3,1.37 //
GP12garup3_u:87: pravṛttimārgeṇa na pūjayanti hyāpatkāle paradaivaṃ tadanyam /
GP12garup3_u:88: te vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsabhṛtyā anye ca sarve 'vaiṣṇavamātrakāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,1.38 //
GP12garup3_u:90: tānevāhuḥ satpurāṇāni viprāḥ kalau yuge nābhyasūyanti sarve // GarP_3,1.39 //
GP12garup3_u:92: ato hyasūyanti sadā vimūḍhāḥ kalau hi viprāḥ pracurā hi tepi // GarP_3,1.40 //
GP12garup3_u:93: na cāsti viṣṇoḥ sadṛśaṃ ca daivataṃ na cāsti vāyoḥ sadṛśo guruśca /
GP12garup3_u:94: na cāsti tīrthaṃ sadṛśaṃ viṣṇupadyāḥ na viṣṇubhaktena samosti bhaktaḥ // GarP_3,1.41 //
GP12garup3_u:95: anyāni viṣṇoḥ pratipādakāni sarvāṇi te sāttvikānīti cāhuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:96: śrāvyāṇi tānyeva manuṣyaloke śrāvyāṇi nānyāni ca duḥ khadāni // GarP_3,1.42 //
GP12garup3_u:97: kalau yuge sarva purāṇamadhye trīṇyeva mukhyāni haripriyāṇi /
GP12garup3_u:98: mukhyaṃ purāṇaṃ hi kalau nṛṇāṃ ca śreyaskaraṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam // GarP_3,1.43 //
GP12garup3_u:99: pūrvaṃ hi sṛṣṭiḥ pratipādyate tra yato hyato bhāgavataṃ paraṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:100: yasminpurāṇe kathayanti sṛṣṭiṃ hyādau viṣṇorbrahmarudrādikānām // GarP_3,1.44 //
GP12garup3_u:102: tenaiva siddhaṃ pravadanti sarvaṃ hyataḥ paraṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam // GarP_3,1.45 //
GP12garup3_u:103: tataḥ paraṃ viṣṇupurāṇamāhustataḥ paraṃ gāruḍasaṃjñakaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:104: trīṇyeva mukhyā ni kalau nṛṇāṃ tu tathā viśeṣo gāruḍe kiñcidasti // GarP_3,1.46 //
GP12garup3_u:105: śṛṇudhvaṃ vai taṃ viśeṣaṃ ca viprāstryaṃśairyuktaṃ gāruḍākhyaṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:106: ādyāṃśaṃ vai karmakāṇḍaṃ vadanti dvitīyāṃśaṃ dharmakāṇḍaṃ tamāhuḥ // GarP_3,1.47 //
GP12garup3_u:107: tṛtīyāṃśaṃ brahmakāṇḍaṃ vadanti teṣāṃ madhye tvantimoyaṃ variṣṭhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:109: tṛtīyāṃśe paṭhite vedatulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavennātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:110: tṛtīyāṃśaśravaṇādeva viprāḥ phalaṃ proktaṃ paṭhatopyarthamevam // GarP_3,1.49 //
GP12garup3_u:111: tṛtīyāṃśaśravaṇādarthataśca puṇyaṃ cāhuḥ paṭhato vai daśāṃśam /
GP12garup3_u:112: tato varaṃ matsyapurāṇamāhustato varaṃ kūrmapūrāṇamāhuḥ // GarP_3,1.50 //
GP12garup3_u:113: tathaiva vai vāyupurāṇamāhustrīṇyeva cāhuḥ sāttvikānīti loke /
GP12garup3_u:114: tatrāpi kiñcidveditavyaṃ bhavecca purāṇaṣaṭke sattvarūpe munīndrāḥ // GarP_3,1.51 //
GP12garup3_u:115: sattvādhame mātsyakaurme tathāhurvāyu cāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ madhyamaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:116: viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ sattvottamaṃ gāruḍaṃ cāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,1.52 //
GP12garup3_u:117: skāndaṃ pādmaṃ vāmanaṃ vai varāhaṃ tathāgreyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ parvasṛṣṭau /
GP12garup3_u:119: rajaḥ prācuryādrājasānīti ca huḥ śrāvyāṇi naitāni mumukṣubhiḥ sadā /
GP12garup3_u:120: teṣāṃ madhye sāttvikāṃśāśca saṃti teṣāṃ śrutergāruḍīyaṃ phalaṃ ca // GarP_3,1.54 //
GP12garup3_u:121: brahmāṇḍalaiṅgye brahmavaivartakaṃ vai mārkaṃṇḍeyaṃ brāhmamādityakaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:122: etānyā hustāmasānīti viprāstatraikadeśaḥ sāttviko rājasaśca // GarP_3,1.55 //
GP12garup3_u:124: teṣu sthitāḥ sāttvikāṃśā munīndrāsteṣāṃ śrutirgāruḍaikāṅghritulyā // GarP_3,1.56 //
GP12garup3_u:126: viṣṇudharmotaraṃ caiva tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ tathā // GarP_3,1.57 //
GP12garup3_u:128: tathā haṃsapurāṇaṃ ca ṣaḍetāni munīśvarāḥ // GarP_3,1.58 //
GP12garup3_u:136: purāṇaṃ bhāgavataṃ śaivaṃ nandiproktaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_3,1.62 //
GP12garup3_u:137: pāśupatyaṃ raiṇukaṃ ca bhairavaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
GP12garup3_u:140: sarveṣvapi purāṇeṣu śreṣṭhaṃ bhāgavataṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,1.64 //
GP12garup3_u:141: vedaistulya sama pāṭhe śravaṇe ca tadardhakam /
GP12garup3_u:142: arthataḥ śravaṇe cāsya puṇyaṃ daśaguṇaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,1.65 //
GP12garup3_u:145: vedobhyosya tvarthataścādhikatvaṃ vadanti bai viṣṇurahasyavedinaḥ // GarP_3,1.67 //
GP12garup3_u:148: daityāḥ sarva viprakuleṣu bhūtvā kṛte yuge bhārate ṣaṭsahasryām /
GP12garup3_u:149: niṣkāsya kāṃścinnavanirmitānāṃ niveśanaṃ tatra kurvanti nityam // GarP_3,1.69 //
GP12garup3_u:150: matvā hariṃ bhagavānvyāsarūpī cakre tadā bhāgavataṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:151: tathā samākhyāya ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tattataḥ paraṃ gāruḍākhyaṃ sa cakre // GarP_3,1.70 //
GP12garup3_u:152: ato hi gāruḍaṃ mukhyaṃ purāṇaṃ śāstrasaṃmatam /
GP12garup3_u:154: yathā surāṇāṃ pravaro janārdano yathāyudhānāṃ pravaraḥ sudarśanam /
GP12garup3_u:155: yathāśvamedhaḥ pravaraḥ kratūnāṃ chinneṣu bhakteṣu tathaiva rudraḥ // GarP_3,1.72 //
GP12garup3_u:156: nadīṣu gaṅgā jalajeṣu padmamacchinnabhakteṣu tathaiva vāyuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:157: tathā purāṇeṣu ca gāruḍaṃ ca mukhyaṃ tadāhurharitattvadarśane // GarP_3,1.73 //
GP12garup3_u:159: ato harirnamaskāryo gamyo yogyo hariḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.74 //
GP12garup3_u:161: paro narottamo vā sa sādhakeśopi ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.75 //
GP12garup3_u:168: vyāsasya namanaṃ hyante kathaṃ kāryaṃ mahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,1.78 //
GP12garup3_u:169: ante ca vandane tasya kāraṇaṃ brūhi suvrata /
GP12garup3_u:173: vyāso naiva samatvena prokto bhagavato hareḥ // GarP_3,1.80 //
GP12garup3_u:175: vyāsastu kaścana ṛṣiḥ purāṇe tāmase smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.81 //
GP12garup3_u:176: iti jñānā valaṃbena daityā daityānugaiḥ samāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:177: praviśanti hyandhatama iti tvante namaskṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.82 //
GP12garup3_u:178: yadidaṃ paramaṃ gopyaṃ hṛdi dhāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:179: parāṇāṃ namyamevoktaṃ pratipādyaṃ yatotra hi // GarP_3,1.83 //
GP12garup3_u:181: vāstavaṃ taṃ na jānīyurupajīvyo yato hariḥ // GarP_3,1.84 //
GP12garup3_u:187: bhūbhāraharaṇe viṣṇoḥ pradhānāṅgaṃ hi mārutiḥ // GarP_3,1.87 //
GP12garup3_u:188: vākyarūpā bhāratī tu dvitīyāṅgaṃ hi sā smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:189: tṛtīyāṅga hareḥ śeṣo na namyāḥ sāmyato hareḥ // GarP_3,1.88 //
GP12garup3_u:191: avāntarāśca vāyvādyā na namyāstena te smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,1.89 //
GP12garup3_u:193: vācakāni yato nityaṃ tannamyāste munīśvarāḥ // GarP_3,1.90 //
GP12garup3_u:196: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe sūtaśaunakasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe sāttvikādipurāṇavibhāganamyānamyadevavibhāgādiviṣayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:200: sṛṣṭikramaṃ na jānāmi devānāṃ hyantaraṃ mune // GarP_3,2.1 //
GP12garup3_u:204: evameva kṛtaḥ praśro harau tu garuḍena vai /
GP12garup3_u:212: śṛkṛṣṇa uvāca mūlarūpe hyato jñeyo viṣṇutvādviṣṇuravyayaḥ // GarP_3,2.6 //
GP12garup3_u:214: aneko hyekatāṃ prāpya saṃśete pralayāya vai // GarP_3,2.7 //
GP12garup3_u:215: tatrāpi ca viśeṣosti jñātavyaṃ tatvameva saḥ // GarP_3,2.8 //
GP12garup3_u:218: tatraiva daśanādvāpi kṣiprameva tamo vrajet // GarP_3,2.9 //
GP12garup3_u:220: harirūpāstu te jñeyā ekībhūtā hi tena te // GarP_3,2.10 //
GP12garup3_u:221: praleya samanuprāpte jīvāḥ sa yānti māmakāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:222: virājṛpe hareḥ saṃti tadā te ca hyanekadhā // GarP_3,2.11 //
GP12garup3_u:224: biṃbena tu svayaṃ viṣṇurekībhāvaṃ vrajedyadi // GarP_3,2.12 //
GP12garup3_u:230: biṃbānāṃ mūlarūpasya bhedo nātra vivakṣitaḥ // GarP_3,2.15 //
GP12garup3_u:232: ekāṃśena tu biṃbaistu caikībhāvaṃ vrajanti te // GarP_3,2.16 //
GP12garup3_u:233: ekāṃśena tu jīvatve saṃsthitā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:234: biṃbamūlaṃ na jānanti te janā hyasurāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,2.17 //
GP12garup3_u:235: eka eva hariḥ pūrvaṃ hyavidyāvaśataḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:237: evaṃ vadanti ye mūḍhā stepi yāntyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:238: upādhirdvividhaḥ proktaḥ svarūpo bāhya eva ca // GarP_3,2.19 //
GP12garup3_u:240: sarvopādhivi nāśe hi pratibiṃbaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_3,2.20 //
GP12garup3_u:242: duḥ kharūpo hyupādhistu tamaso yedhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_3,2.21 //
GP12garup3_u:245: daityāḥ duḥ khāyate yasmāttasmāduḥ khī hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:248: parasparaṃ tathā bhedaṃ hyantaraṃ vā na cintayet // GarP_3,2.24 //
GP12garup3_u:250: anyonyaṃ nāṇumātraṃ ca bhedo bāhyāntarepi ca // GarP_3,2.25 //
GP12garup3_u:252: pratibiṃbasthito biṃbaḥ strīrūpo hyasti sarvadā // GarP_3,2.26 //
GP12garup3_u:254: ekībhāvaṃ nāpnuvanti viṃbena saha saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_3,2.27 //
GP12garup3_u:256: bhedastu nāṇumātraṃ ca śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana // GarP_3,2.28 //
GP12garup3_u:257: yadā hi śete pralayārṇave vibhurjīvāṃśca sarvānudare niveśya /
GP12garup3_u:262: evaṃ janāñjaṭhare saṃnidhāya samyakūśete hyaṃbhasi vai sa kalpe /
GP12garup3_u:263: lakṣmīstu sā sarvavedātmikā ca bhaktyā harau nityasaṃvardhitāpi // GarP_3,2.31 //
GP12garup3_u:264: atyādaraṃ darśayatīva sā tu īḍe viṣṇuṃ bhaktisaṃvardhitāpi /
GP12garup3_u:265: ceṣṭādirūpeṇa tadā na kiñcidāsīdvinā viṣṇumatha śriyaṃ ca // GarP_3,2.32 //
GP12garup3_u:266: paryaṅkarūpeṇa vabhūva devī vāsasvarūpeṇa ramā vireje /
GP12garup3_u:267: sarvaṃ ramā saiva tadaiva cāsītsaikā devī bahurūpā babhāṣe // GarP_3,2.33 //
GP12garup3_u:269: tvaṃ brahma eko na caturmukhaśca nāhaṃ rudro na bṛhaspatiśca // GarP_3,2.34 //
GP12garup3_u:270: viṣṇāveva brahmaśabdo hi mukhyo hyanyeṣvamukhyo brahmarudrādikeṣu /
GP12garup3_u:273: deśānantyaṃ guṇataḥ kālato vā nāstyānantyaṃ kvāpi deśe ca kāle // GarP_3,2.36 //
GP12garup3_u:274: yadā nantyaṃ kimu vaktavyamatra guṇānantyaṃ nāsti brahmādikeṣu /
GP12garup3_u:275: yadyapyahaṃ deśataḥ kālataśca samastadā vāsudevena sārdham // GarP_3,2.37 //
GP12garup3_u:276: tathāpi me guṇato nāstyanantaṃ tato dharmā guṇatonantataśca /
GP12garup3_u:277: saṃti śrutāvaviruddhāśca deve cintyā hyacintyā bahudhā te hyanantāḥ // GarP_3,2.38 //
GP12garup3_u:278: ato guṇāṃstava devasya viṣṇo stotuṃ sadā smo na hareḥ kadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:279: nāhaṃ na keśau na ca gīrna rudro na dakṣakanyā na ca menakāsutā // GarP_3,2.39 //
GP12garup3_u:280: na vai biḍaujā na ca vā pulomajā na cedhmavāho na yamo na cānyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:281: na nārado nāpi bhṛgurvasiṣṭho na vighnapo nāpi balyādayaśca // GarP_3,2.40 //
GP12garup3_u:282: na vai virāṭo nāpi bhīmaḥ śaniśca na puṣkaro na kaśerustathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:283: na kinnarāḥ pitaro naiva devā gandharvamukhyā nāpi vā tuṣyasaṃjñāḥ // GarP_3,2.41 //
GP12garup3_u:284: na vai kṣitīśā na ca mānuṣāśca viṣṇorna jānanti kimatra cānye /
GP12garup3_u:285: mattodhamaḥ kociguṇena brahmā samo hi tasya brahmaṇo mātariśva // GarP_3,2.42 //
GP12garup3_u:287: buddhau samānau saṃsṛtau mokṣakāle parasparādhārasamanvitau ca // GarP_3,2.43 //
GP12garup3_u:289: na śaktosau brahmadevo vivastuṃ vāyuṃ vinā saṃsṛtāveva nityam // GarP_3,2.44 //
GP12garup3_u:290: na taṃ vinā mātariśvā ca vastumanyonyamāptiḥ kālato nyūnatā ca /
GP12garup3_u:292: tadā vāyurnāśakadvai mahātmā bāhye sṛṣṭau kālabhedena cāsti /
GP12garup3_u:293: sarasvatī bhāratī brahmaṇastu saṃvatsarānantaraṃ saṃbabhūva // GarP_3,2.46 //
GP12garup3_u:294: yadā daśābdāḥ samatītā mahātmā tadā vāyuḥ samabhūllokapūjyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:295: kiñcinnyūnatvaṃ sthūlasṛṣṭau mahātmannaitāvatā vānayoḥ saumyahāniḥ // GarP_3,2.47 //
GP12garup3_u:297: giraḥ sakāśātkālato nyūnatāsti vāyostadā hyadhamattve kṣatiḥ kā // GarP_3,2.48 //
GP12garup3_u:300: śeṣastvindro rudra ete trayaśca samā hyete jñānabalādikeṣvapi tathāpi teṣāṃ kālato nyūnatāsti kālopi teṣāṃ dvivyesahasravarṣam // GarP_3,2.50
GP12garup3_u:301: anantarudro brahmavāyū yathā vā tathā jñeyo naiva hāniḥ svarūpe /
GP12garup3_u:302: sthūlasya sṛṣṭau bāhyasṛṣṭau mahātmankālānnyūnatvaṃ sa mayā naiva cintyaḥ // GarP_3,2.51 //
GP12garup3_u:303: teṣāṃ sakāśādvāruṇī pārvatī ca sauparṇīnāmnī tistra etā mahātman /
GP12garup3_u:304: daśābdebhyonantaraṃ saṃbabhūvuḥ sarasvatī bhāratīvacca bodhyā // GarP_3,2.52 //
GP12garup3_u:305: indro varo rudrabhāryādikebhya evaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadā dehyamandam /
GP12garup3_u:306: evaṃ jñānaṃ yasya bhavecca loke sa vai jñānī vedavedyaḥ sa eva // GarP_3,2.53 //
GP12garup3_u:307: na vai jñānītyantaraṃ yo na veda sa vedavādī na ca vedapāṭhakaḥ // GarP_3,2.54 //
GP12garup3_u:309: tāvanti harināmāni priyāṇi ca hareḥsadā // GarP_3,2.55 //
GP12garup3_u:310: mama svāmī harirnityaṃ dāsohaṃ sarvadā hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:311: brahmādyā devatāḥ sarvā guravo me yathākramam // GarP_3,2.56 //
GP12garup3_u:312: eteṣāṃ ca hariḥ svāmī vede sarvatra gīyate /
GP12garup3_u:313: evaṃ jānaṃstu yo vedānsaṃpaṭhetsa dvijottamaḥ // GarP_3,2.57 //
GP12garup3_u:316: jñānābhimānī vedamānī ubhau tu parasparaṃ hyūcatuḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:317: jalaṃ vedo yatra vāso murārerācāryāṇāṃ saṃgadoṣāddvijānām // GarP_3,2.59 //
GP12garup3_u:318: mahāparādhāḥ saṃti loke mahātmansahasraśaḥ śataśaḥ koṭiśaśca /
GP12garup3_u:319: hariśca tānkṣamate sarvadaiva nāmatrayasmaraṇādvai kupāluḥ // GarP_3,2.60 //
GP12garup3_u:321: dṛṣṭvāparādhaṃ tasya viṣṇurmahātmā hāhākāraṃ kurute krodhabuddhyā // GarP_3,2.61 //
GP12garup3_u:322: uttiṣṭha govinda suvedavedya sovyātkṛtākhyo mayi samyak prasīda /
GP12garup3_u:323: bho keśavottiṣṭha sukhasvarūpa sṛṣṭau vyaye vartayituṃ samarthaḥ // GarP_3,2.62 //
GP12garup3_u:324: sṛṣṭvā brahmāṇaṃ prerayetpūjyasṛṣṭau sṛṣṭvā rudraṃ prerayetsaṃhṛtau ca /
GP12garup3_u:326: hare murāre svāpahīnādya tiṣṭha kalpā dikānantarajñāna (raṃ buddhi) (jāna) hīnāt /
GP12garup3_u:327: samyag dṛṣṭvā karmadṛṣṭyā mahātmallaṃbdhaṃ tamo dāhi duḥ khasvarūpam // GarP_3,2.64 //
GP12garup3_u:329: tasmādāhurduḥ svarūpī haristvaṃ duḥ khasvarūpāttvaṃ ca duḥ khī hare tvam // GarP_3,2.65 //
GP12garup3_u:330: uttiṣṭha nārāyaṇa vāsudeva hyuttiṣṭha kṛṣṇācyuta mādhaveti /
GP12garup3_u:331: uttiṣṭha vaikuṇṭha dayārdramūrte uttiṣṭha lakṣmīśa namonamaste // GarP_3,2.66 //
GP12garup3_u:332: uttiṣṭha madhveśa sarasvatīśa uttiṣṭha rudreśa tathāṃbikeśa /
GP12garup3_u:333: uttiṣṭha candreśa tathā śacīśa vipreśa bhakteśa gaveśa nityam // GarP_3,2.67 //
GP12garup3_u:334: śāstrapriyottiṣṭha ṛci priyastvaṃ yajuḥ priyottiṣṭha nidānamūrte /
GP12garup3_u:335: sāmapriyastvaṃ ca tathā murāre atharvavedapriya sarvadā tvam // GarP_3,2.68 //
GP12garup3_u:337: sugāyanaprītikarastvameva hyutiṣṭha śīghraṃ kamalā patistvam // GarP_3,2.69 //
GP12garup3_u:338: evaṃ stuto viṣṇurajaḥ purāṇo hyatitvarāvānutthito nityabaddhaḥ // GarP_3,2.70 //
GP12garup3_u:339: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe brahmāviṣṇumaheśvarādidevatātāramyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:342: babhūvecchā mama devasya viṣṇoḥ sraṣṭuṃ sṛjyānmokṣayogyāṃśca moktum /
GP12garup3_u:343: icchāśaktiḥ sarvadaivāsti viṣṇostathāpi tadvyāharaṇaṃ ca laukikam // GarP_3,3.1 //
GP12garup3_u:344: tadā harirjagṛhe laukikaṃ ca tamaḥ pānaṃ tena rūpeṇa cakre /
GP12garup3_u:345: tadrūpamāhuḥ prākṛtaṃ vai tadajñā hyandhaṃ tamaḥ praviśantyeva sarve // GarP_3,3.2 //
GP12garup3_u:347: pūrṇaṃ ca tatparaṃ rūpaṃ pūrṇātpūrṇāḥ samudgatāḥ // GarP_3,3.3 //
GP12garup3_u:350: pūrvarūpaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ padavitāragam? /
GP12garup3_u:353: tasya dṛrṣṭi vinā nānyo layaḥ kṛṣṇādinā kvacit // GarP_3,3.6 //
GP12garup3_u:354: tattve pīḍā na kartavyā tayā duḥ khāni vindati /
GP12garup3_u:356: jñātavyāṃśe tu pīḍā tu kartavyā guruṇā saha /
GP12garup3_u:357: tamantevāsinaṃ cāhuḥ sa eva cu guruḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,3.8 //
GP12garup3_u:360: guruṇāpi samaṃ hāsyaṃ kartavyaṃ kuṭilaṃ vinā /
GP12garup3_u:363: sākṣāddhariḥ puruṣaḥ piṅgalākṣaḥ svamāyāyāṃ guṇamayyāṃ mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:364: svapauruṣeṇaiva sumaṅgalena adhāttu vīryaṃ bhagavānvīryavāṃśca // GarP_3,3.11 //
GP12garup3_u:366: vīryasvarūpaṃ brūhi me vāsudeva vīrye tvadīye saṃśayo me vibhāti /
GP12garup3_u:367: kiṃ vīryamīśasya svarūpabhūtaṃ kiṃ vā vibhinnaṃ vada sādhu vetsi // GarP_3,3.12 //
GP12garup3_u:371: bhinnaṃ tadāhuḥ prākṛtameva cāhuḥ svanābhipadmādikavacca bodhyam /
GP12garup3_u:372: naitāvatā jñānarūpasya viṣṇorna vīryahāniriti cintanīyam // GarP_3,3.14 //
GP12garup3_u:373: vīryasvarūpī bhagavānvā sudevaḥ sarvatra deśepi ca sarvakāle /
GP12garup3_u:374: sarvārthavānyadi na syātkhagendra tarhīśvaraḥ puruṣo naiva sa syāt // GarP_3,3.15 //
GP12garup3_u:376: ubhe rūpe vīryavatī khagendra tayorabhedaścintanīyo hi samyakū // GarP_3,3.16 //
GP12garup3_u:377: strīrūpavānyadi na syātkhargedrastrīṇāṃ kathaṃ pratibiṃbatvameva // GarP_3,3.17 //
GP12garup3_u:380: strīrūpavannaiva vicintanīyaṃ napuṃsakaṃ tbasya janyaṃ hi viddhi // GarP_3,3.18 //
GP12garup3_u:381: napuṃsakaṃ navaiva svarūpabhūtamato harau nāsti vicintanīyam /
GP12garup3_u:382: strībiṃbabhūte harirūpe khagendra śrīrūpamastīti vicintanīyam // GarP_3,3.19 //
GP12garup3_u:385: strīrūpabhūte viṃbe tu strīrūpāḥ santi sarvadā // GarP_3,3.20 //
GP12garup3_u:386: sthitau tatra nimittaṃ ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mama prabho // GarP_3,3.21 //
GP12garup3_u:393: nārāyaṇo nāma hariḥ svatantraḥ śriyā vinā nāsti kadāpi tārkṣya /
GP12garup3_u:395: hariṃ vinā śrīrapi deśakāle nāstīti mokṣecchubhireva vedyam /
GP12garup3_u:396: yasyāmadhādvīryamanukṣaṇaṃ ca sā māmikā cendrajālā tmiketi // GarP_3,3.25 //
GP12garup3_u:397: vadanti ye asurā mūḍharūpā adhaṃmataḥ praviśantyeva sarve /
GP12garup3_u:398: māyā nāma prakṛtistvemāhuḥ susūkṣmarūpā na tu cendrajālikā // GarP_3,3.26 //
GP12garup3_u:399: tasyābhimānaḥ śrīriti veditavyo vīryādhānaṃ tatra teṣāṃ ca melaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:400: kāryonmukhaṃ melanaṃ cāhurāryā ito rūpaṃ nāhurāyyāśca viṣṇoḥ // GarP_3,3.27 //
GP12garup3_u:401: sānādi nityā satyarūpā ca viṣṇormithyā rūpā sā kathaṃ syātkhagendra /
GP12garup3_u:404: anādinityā yadi na syātkhagendra suśūkṣmarūpeṇa na kāraṇaṃ syāt // GarP_3,3.29 //
GP12garup3_u:405: sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇa ca kāraṇaṃ syāt tarhi prapañcasya ca kāraṇaṃ vada /
GP12garup3_u:406: avidyāyā vaśato viṣṇureva nānārūpairdṛśyate viṣṇureva // GarP_3,3.30 //
GP12garup3_u:407: śāstrajñānānnāśameti hyavidyā na saṃśayo hariṇā caikyameti /
GP12garup3_u:408: evaṃ brūṣe yadi vādatkhagendra vakṣyehaṃ te tatra yuktiṃ śṛṇu tvam // GarP_3,3.31 //
GP12garup3_u:409: sarvajñarūpasya hi me murāreḥ kathaṃ harerghaṭate hyajñatā ca /
GP12garup3_u:410: sūrye yathā tamo nāsti tathā nārāyaṇe harau /
GP12garup3_u:411: ajñānaṃ nāsti pakṣīdra kathaṃ tatvaṃ bravīṣyaho // GarP_3,3.32 //
GP12garup3_u:413: sarvajñosau kutra pakṣīndra viṣṇuralpajñajīvo jñānaśūnyaśca kutra // GarP_3,3.33 //
GP12garup3_u:414: viruddhayoścānayoḥ sarvadaiva kathaṃ caikyaṃ saṃvādiṣyanti vedāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:415: deśe kāle sarvadā dduḥ khahīno jagatkartā pūrṇaśaktiḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,3.34 //
GP12garup3_u:416: jīvaḥ sadā svalpakartāsti pūrṇaḥ saṃsārarūpe duḥ kharūpe ca nityam /
GP12garup3_u:418: ye vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsavaśyāsteṣāṃ drohaṃ sarvadā saṃcaredyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:419: hariprītistena bhavenna nityamānandavṛddhistena bhavenna muktau // GarP_3,3.36 //
GP12garup3_u:420: māyī sadā māyibhṛtyastathāpi bhedajñānānnindyate kāryate ca /
GP12garup3_u:421: tenāpi teṣāṃ duḥ khavṛddhirbhavecca hyadhaṃ tamaḥ punarāvṛttihīnam // GarP_3,3.37 //
GP12garup3_u:422: khagendrātaḥ prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmarūpā sā nityā sā satyabhūtā sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:426: padārthānāṃ pārthivānāṃ khagendra viśeṣāṇāṃ caramākhyo viśeṣaḥ // GarP_3,3.39 //
GP12garup3_u:430: he kṛṣṇa he mādhava sāttvatāṃ pate padārthānāṃ caramāṃśaḥ parāṇu // GarP_3,3.41 //
GP12garup3_u:431: iti proktaṃ tatra me saṃśayosti yontyo viśeṣaḥ sa tu nāṃśayuktaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:432: yo hyaṃśayukto na tu soṃtyo viśeṣa evaṃ mamābhāti vacastu tathyam // GarP_3,3.42 //
GP12garup3_u:434: ya eva loke saṃsthitā mānuṣāstu viśeṣāṇāṃ darśane śaktiyuktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:435: tathāpi te yasya cāṃśitvameva viśeṣaṃ vai naiva draṣṭuṃ samarthāḥ // GarP_3,3.43 //
GP12garup3_u:437: ye kāṇādā gautamādyāḥ khagendra niraṃśakaṃ paramāṇuṃ vadanti // GarP_3,3.44 //
GP12garup3_u:438: anantāṃśaiḥ saṃyutatvepi tāṃśca niraṃśino bhrāntidṛṣṭyā vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:441: parā (ramā) ṇūnāmekadeśe khagendra tanno saṃti prāṇināṃ rāśayaśca /
GP12garup3_u:442: pratyekaśa saṃti rūpā hareśca hyataśca tatparamāṇoraṇīyaḥ // GarP_3,3.46 //
GP12garup3_u:443: yo vā tvaṇīyānparamasya viṣṇoḥ sa eva rūpo mahato mahīyān /
GP12garup3_u:444: teṣāmanyonyaṃ na viśeṣosti kaścidacintyarūpe ca vicintanīyaḥ // GarP_3,3.47 //
GP12garup3_u:448: ānantyaṃ trividhaṃ nityaṃ harernānyasya kasyacit // GarP_3,3.49 //
GP12garup3_u:454: vyāptatvaṃ deśato hyasti sarvabhūteṣu yadyāpi // GarP_3,3.52 //
GP12garup3_u:455: na ca bhedaḥ kvacittasya hyaṇumātrepi yujyate /
GP12garup3_u:458: yattasya vyāpakaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ viduḥ // GarP_3,3.54 //
GP12garup3_u:462: tathaiva jaḍajīvānāṃ nityaṃ bhedo jaḍeśayoḥ // GarP_3,3.56 //
GP12garup3_u:463: pañca bhedā ime nityaṃ sarvāvasthāsu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:464: etādṛśyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ vīryamādhatta vīryavān // GarP_3,3.57 //
GP12garup3_u:466: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavadvīryasvarūpatadādhānadvārakaguṇatraya sṛṣṭijaḍeśabhedādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:475: antaraṃ ye vijānanti te yāntyandhantamaḥ param /
GP12garup3_u:478: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ ca rajasā brahmaṇi prāviśaddhariḥ // GarP_3,4.5 //
GP12garup3_u:479: ādyo brahmā sa vijñeyo na tu sākṣāddhariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:480: tamasāpi samānhantuṃ rudre ca prāviśaddhariḥ // GarP_3,4.6 //
GP12garup3_u:481: rudre sthito rudrasaṃjño na rudrastu hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:482: viṣṇureva hariḥ sākṣāttāvubhauna harī smṛtau // GarP_3,4.7 //
GP12garup3_u:484: evaṃ jñātvā mokṣameti nānyathā tu kathañcana // GarP_3,4.8 //
GP12garup3_u:486: te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ punarāvṛttivarjitam // GarP_3,4.9 //
GP12garup3_u:488: kāryonmukhaṃ yathā bhūyātkṣobhayāmāsa vai tathā // GarP_3,4.10 //
GP12garup3_u:501: apikṣitaṃ ca tatrādau guṇasāmyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:503: rāśibhūtaṃ guṇānāṃ tu darśayiṣye sthitiṃ ca vai /
GP12garup3_u:508: mūlaprakṛtijā hyete na mūlā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā // GarP_3,4.19 //
GP12garup3_u:510: ataḥ prakṛtijā jñeyā na mūlāste khageśvara // GarP_3,4.20 //
GP12garup3_u:512: uktaṃ svarūpaṃ teṣāṃ tu tava samyak khageśvara // GarP_3,4.21 //
GP12garup3_u:514: rajastamobhyāṃ garuḍa hyavimiśraṃ hyatastu tat // GarP_3,4.22 //
GP12garup3_u:515: kevalaṃ sattvamityuktaṃ na tu śreṣṭhatvataḥ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:516: sṛṣṭikāle kevalaṃ syātpralaye miśritaṃ bhavet // GarP_3,4.23 //
GP12garup3_u:518: sarvadāpi vimiśraṃ ca sattvarāśiṃ dvijottama // GarP_3,4.24 //
GP12garup3_u:519: ye vijānanti te sarve viśanti hyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:523: sattvaṃ ca miśritaṃ jñeyaṃ nānyathā pakṣisattama /
GP12garup3_u:524: rajasaḥ śatabhāgānāṃ madhye tu vinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.27 //
GP12garup3_u:528: rāśibhūtepi tamasi sattvaṃ ca vinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.29 //
GP12garup3_u:530: miśritaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ jñātavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.30 //
GP12garup3_u:532: ya eko bhāga uddiṣṭastāvatparimitaṃ rajaḥ // GarP_3,4.31 //
GP12garup3_u:538: tatra me saṃśayo hyasti śṛṇu tvaṃ sāttvatāṃ pate /
GP12garup3_u:539: yadrāśyāṃ yadrā śibhāgā hyadhikāḥ saṃti yāvatā // GarP_3,4.34 //
GP12garup3_u:542: uvāca para maprītyā saṃstuvan garuḍaṃ hariḥ /
GP12garup3_u:545: miśritaṃ cāpi pakṣīndra na sattavamiti kīrtyate /
GP12garup3_u:548: evaṃ mayoktā garuḍa guṇānāṃ nijasaṃsthitiḥ // GarP_3,4.38 //
GP12garup3_u:550: rāśīkṛtācca rajasaḥ janyaṃ yacca kageśvara // GarP_3,4.39 //
GP12garup3_u:552: pralaye samanuprāpte mahattattve sthitaṃ rajaḥ // GarP_3,4.40 //
GP12garup3_u:553: dvādaśāṃśena tu hyaddhā vibhaktaṃ bhavatiṃ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:554: rāśībhūte hi sattve tu daśabhāgena miśritam // GarP_3,4.41 //
GP12garup3_u:556: tamorāśyā miśritaṃ ca bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.42 //
GP12garup3_u:558: miśritaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ jñātavyaṃ nānyathā kvacit // GarP_3,4.43 //
GP12garup3_u:560: evaṃ layastu jñātavyo hṛdi tattvārthavodibhiḥ // GarP_3,4.44 //
GP12garup3_u:562: guṇasāmyamiti prāhurevaṃ jānīhi vai khaga // GarP_3,4.45 //
GP12garup3_u:563: anyathā ye vijānanti te yānti hyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:567: kathaṃ brūhi mahābhāga etattattvaṃ samāsataḥ // GarP_3,4.47 //
GP12garup3_u:571: idānīṃ guṇavaiṣamyaṃ śṛṇu samyaṅ mama priya /
GP12garup3_u:572: sṛṣṭikāle tu saṃprāpte yatpūrvaṃ pralaye khaga // GarP_3,4.49 //
GP12garup3_u:573: daśabhāgaiśca sattve tu miśritaṃ yadra jastathā /
GP12garup3_u:576: evaṃ dvādaśabhāgaiśca praviṣṭaṃ sarvaśo rajaḥ // GarP_3,4.51 //
GP12garup3_u:579: miśritaṃ bhavati hyaddhā mahattattvaṃ tadā smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:587: tatraikāṃśastamaḥ proktaḥ tribhāgo raja eva ca // GarP_3,4.56 //
GP12garup3_u:589: caturbhāgātmakaṃ proktaṃ mahattattvaṃ śrutaṃ mayā // GarP_3,4.57 //
GP12garup3_u:594: mūlasattve miśritaṃ ca daśabhāgena yadrajaḥ // GarP_3,4.59 //
GP12garup3_u:595: tatsarvaṃ ca militvaiva tveko bhāgastu kīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:596: mūle rajasi yaccokto rajobhāgaḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,4.60 //
GP12garup3_u:598: mūle tamasi yaccokto rajobhāgastathaiva ca // GarP_3,4.61 //
GP12garup3_u:600: tathā mūle ca tamasi hyeko bhāgastamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,4.62 //
GP12garup3_u:609: evaṃ hi śrūyate kṛṣṇa saṃśayo metra bādhate // GarP_3,4.66 //
GP12garup3_u:612: tribhāgabhūte rajasi tathā dvādaśadhāpi ca // GarP_3,4.67 //
GP12garup3_u:614: praviṣṭamastīti khaga jñātavyaṃ tacchaṇu dvija // GarP_3,4.68 //
GP12garup3_u:616: praviṣṭamastīti khaga vaktavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.69 //
GP12garup3_u:619: evaṃ ca militānbhāgānvakṣye śṛṇu mahāmate // GarP_3,4.70 //
GP12garup3_u:621: trayodaśāṃśā vijñeyā dvādaśāśaṃ rajaḥ smṛtam // GarP_3,4.71 //
GP12garup3_u:623: ādau tu dvādaśāṃśeṣu bhāgānvakṣyāmi tacchṛṇu // GarP_3,4.72 //
GP12garup3_u:627: ekāṃśastu rajo jñeyastamo hyekā daśādhikam // GarP_3,4.74 //
GP12garup3_u:629: sattvabhāga iti jñeyo mahattattve khageśvara // GarP_3,4.75 //
GP12garup3_u:633: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe kṛṣṇa garuḍasaṃvāde tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe guṇavaiṣamyabhedabrahmadehasvarūpaguṇasāmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturtho
GP12garup3_u:635: etādṛśe mahattattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:636: praviveśa mahābhāga kṣobhayāmāsa vai hariḥ // GarP_3,5.1 //
GP12garup3_u:642: sahasrābdācca paścāttau jātau khagaharau dvija // GarP_3,5.4 //
GP12garup3_u:644: kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavāllaṅkṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam // GarP_3,5.5 //
GP12garup3_u:646: tridhā babhūva rudropi yatasteṣāṃ niyāmakaḥ // GarP_3,5.6 //
GP12garup3_u:648: tāmase tu sthito rudrastāmaso hyabhidhīyate // GarP_3,5.7 //
GP12garup3_u:649: taijase tu sthito rudro loke vai taijasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:650: taijase tu hyahantattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam // GarP_3,5.8 //
GP12garup3_u:652: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇameva ca // GarP_3,5.9 //
GP12garup3_u:658: anantaraṃ ca sauparṇī gaurojāpi tathaiva ca // GarP_3,5.12 //
GP12garup3_u:660: utpattiriti vijñeyaṃ krameṇa tu khageśvara // GarP_3,5.13 //
GP12garup3_u:662: tārkṣya hyanantarau jñeyau muktau saṃsāra eva ca // GarP_3,5.14 //
GP12garup3_u:666: bṛhaspatistathā dakṣa ete pāṇyātmakāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,5.16 //
GP12garup3_u:684: pāyośca mānino vīndra jajñire tadanantaram // GarP_3,5.25 //
GP12garup3_u:690: vittapaḥ sapta vasava ukto hyāgnistathāṣṭamaḥ // GarP_3,5.28 //
GP12garup3_u:691: satyānāṃ śṛṇu nāmāni droṇaḥ prāṇo dhruvastathā /
GP12garup3_u:692: arke doṣastathā vaskaḥ saptamastu vibhāvasuḥ // GarP_3,5.29 //
GP12garup3_u:694: daśa rudrasya nāmāni śṛṇuṣva dvijasattama // GarP_3,5.30 //
GP12garup3_u:697: daśa rudrā iti proktāḥ ṣaḍādityāñchṛṇu dvija /
GP12garup3_u:702: savitā hyaryamā dhātā pūṣā tvaṣṭā tathā bhagaḥ // GarP_3,5.34 //
GP12garup3_u:706: śṛṇu nāmāni teṣāṃ tu purūravārdravasaṃjñakau // GarP_3,5.36 //
GP12garup3_u:711: dyāvā pṛthivyau vijñeyau ete ca ṣaḍaśītayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:720: rūpābhimānī saṃjajñe vyāno nāma mahānprabho // GarP_3,5.43 //
GP12garup3_u:722: apāṃ nāthāśca catvāro marutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,5.44 //
GP12garup3_u:732: pitṝṇāṃ saptakaṃ caivetyādyāḥ saṃjajñire khaga // GarP_3,5.49 //
GP12garup3_u:734: varuṇasya patnī gaṅgā parjanyākhyo vibhāvasuḥ // GarP_3,5.50 //
GP12garup3_u:742: budhastu candraputro yaḥ svāhāyā adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,5.54 //
GP12garup3_u:743: uṣā nāma tathā jajñe budhasyānantaraṃ khaga /
GP12garup3_u:744: uṣānāmā bhimānī tu hyaśvibhāryā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,5.55 //
GP12garup3_u:745: budhādhamā sā vijñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup3_u:746: tataḥ śanaiścaro jajñe pṛthivyātmeti viśrutaḥ // GarP_3,5.56 //
GP12garup3_u:750: praviveśa sa deveśastattveṣu ramayā sahā // GarP_3,5.58 //
GP12garup3_u:751: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimāni devatotpattitattāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:755: svesve hyāyatane svāṅge tadarthaṃ ca khageśvara // GarP_3,6.1 //
GP12garup3_u:757: cintyācintyaguṇe viṣṇau viruddhāḥ saṃti sadguṇāḥ // GarP_3,6.2 //
GP12garup3_u:759: kva śaktiriti buddhyā sā vrīḍayāvanatābravīt // GarP_3,6.3 //
GP12garup3_u:761: natāsmi te nātha padāravindaṃ na veda cānyaccaraṇādṛte tava /
GP12garup3_u:762: tvayīśvare saṃti guṇāḥ śrutāstu tathāśrutāḥ saṃti ca devadeva // GarP_3,6.4 //
GP12garup3_u:763: samyak sṛṣṭaṃ svāyatanaṃ ca datvā govinda dāmodara māṃ ca pāhi /
GP12garup3_u:764: stutyā madīyaśca sukhakapūrṇaḥ priyo jano nāsti tathā tvadanyaḥ // GarP_3,6.5 //
GP12garup3_u:766: lakṣmīpate sarvajagannivāsa tvaṃ jñānasiṃdhuḥ kva ca viśvamūrte /
GP12garup3_u:767: ahaṃ kva cājñastava vai śaktirasti hyajñohaṃ vai hyalpaśaktirmamāsti // GarP_3,6.6 //
GP12garup3_u:769: tava prasādādasti jagannivāsa tatra svāmitvaṃ nāsti viṣṇo sadaiva // GarP_3,6.7 //
GP12garup3_u:770: na dehi tvaṃ sarvadā me murāre ahaṃmamatvaṃ prāpyametāvadeva /
GP12garup3_u:771: gamyajñānaṃ yogyaguṇe rameśa pramādo vā nāstināstyadya nitya // GarP_3,6.8 //
GP12garup3_u:772: tanme hṛṣīkāṇi patantyasatpathe padāravinde tu patantu sarvadā /
GP12garup3_u:773: lakṣmyā hyahaṃ koṭiguṇena hīnaḥ stotuṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāsti me suprasīda // GarP_3,6.9 //
GP12garup3_u:774: iti stavaṃ viṣṇuguṇānvidhātā tārkṣyasthitaḥ prāñjalistasya cāgre /
GP12garup3_u:775: tadā vāyurdevadevo mahātmā dṛṣṭvā viṣṇu bhaktisaṃvardhitātmā // GarP_3,6.10 //
GP12garup3_u:778: ete hi devāstava bhṛtyabhūtāḥ padāravindaṃ paramaṃ sudurlabham // GarP_3,6.11 //
GP12garup3_u:780: dṛṣṭvā hareḥ saiva māyaiva tāvatsukāraṇaṃ kiñcidanyanna cāsti // GarP_3,6.12 //
GP12garup3_u:782: lokasya kṛṣṇādvimukhasya karmaṇā apuṇyaśīlasya suduḥ khitasya // GarP_3,6.13 //
GP12garup3_u:784: gobhūsurāṇāṃ ca mahīruhāṇāṃ tathā surāṇāṃ pravarāvatāraiḥ // GarP_3,6.14 //
GP12garup3_u:785: kṣemopakārāṇi ca vāsudeva krīḍanvidhatte na ca kiñcidanyat /
GP12garup3_u:786: mano na tṛpyatyapi śaṃsatāṃ naḥ sukarmamauleścaritāmṛtāni // GarP_3,6.15 //
GP12garup3_u:787: acchinnabhaktasya hi me mukunda sadā bhaktiṃ dehi pādāravinde /
GP12garup3_u:788: sadā tadevāstu na kiñcidanyadyatra tvamāsīḥ puruṣe devadeva // GarP_3,6.16 //
GP12garup3_u:789: ahaṃ ca tatrāsmi tava prasādādyatrāsmyahaṃ tatra bhavānmahāprabho /
GP12garup3_u:790: vyaṃsirmameyaṃ ca śarīramadhye caturmukhaścaiva na caitatadanyaiḥ // GarP_3,6.17 //
GP12garup3_u:791: madīyanidrā tava vandanaṃ prabho madīyayāmācaraṇaṃ pradakṣiṇam /
GP12garup3_u:792: madīyavyākhyāharaṇaṃ stutiḥ syādevaṃ viditvā ca samarpayāmi // GarP_3,6.18 //
GP12garup3_u:793: madbrṛddhiyogyaṃ ca padārthajātaṃ dṛṣṭvā hareḥ pratimā eva tacca /
GP12garup3_u:794: itthaṃ matvāhaṃ sarvadā devadeva tatrasthitānharirūpān bhajiṣye // GarP_3,6.19 //
GP12garup3_u:795: yaccandanaṃ yattu puṣpaṃ ca dhūpaṃ vastraṃ ca yadbhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:796: etatsarvaṃ viṣṇuprītyarthamevetyetadvrataṃ sarvadā vai kariṣye // GarP_3,6.20 //
GP12garup3_u:799: viṣṇudruhāṃ chedayiṣye ca jihvāṃ tacchṛṇvatāṃ pūrayiṣye trapūlkāḥ // GarP_3,6.21 //
GP12garup3_u:800: etādṛśī śaktirmamāsti deva tava prasādādbra linopi viṣṇo /
GP12garup3_u:801: athāpi nāhaṃ stavane samarthaḥ lakṣmyā hyahaṃ koṭiguṇairvihīnaḥ // GarP_3,6.22 //
GP12garup3_u:802: etatstotraṃ hyarthayeccaiva yā naḥ tatra prītirhyakṣayā me sadā syāt /
GP12garup3_u:803: stotraṃ hyetatpāṭhayantīha loke te vaiṣṇavāste ca haripriyāśca // GarP_3,6.23 //
GP12garup3_u:804: kurvanti ye paṭhanaṃ nityameva samarpayiṣyati sadā harau ca /
GP12garup3_u:805: teṣāṃ hariḥ prīyate keśavolaṃ harau prasanne kimalabhyamasti // GarP_3,6.24 //
GP12garup3_u:806: evaṃ stutvā valadevo mahātmā tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ prāñjaliragrato hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:808: ko vā rasajño bhagavan murāre hare guṇastavanātkīrtanādvā // GarP_3,6.25 //
GP12garup3_u:810: yaḥ karṇanāḍīṃ puruṣasya yāto bhavapradāṃ deharatiṃ chinatti // GarP_3,6.26 //
GP12garup3_u:812: paśvādirūpeṣu dhanādikeṣu anarghyaratneṣu priyaṃ chinātti // GarP_3,6.27 //
GP12garup3_u:813: anaṃ tavedapratipāditopi lakṣmīrna vai veda tava svarūpam /
GP12garup3_u:814: caturmukho naiva veda na vāyurasau na vettīti kimatra citram // GarP_3,6.28 //
GP12garup3_u:815: etādṛśasya stavane kvāsti śaktirmama prabho brahmavāyvoḥ sakāśāt /
GP12garup3_u:816: śatairguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūnatāsti ato hare dayayā māṃ ca pāhi // GarP_3,6.29 //
GP12garup3_u:817: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ sā tu tūṣṇīmāsa khagaśvara /
GP12garup3_u:818: bhāratī tu tadā stotuṃ hariṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,6.30 //
GP12garup3_u:820: brahmeśa lakṣmīśa hare murāre guṇāṃstava śraddadhānasya nityam /
GP12garup3_u:821: tathā stuvantosya vivardhamānāṃ matiṃ ca nityaṃ viṣayeṣvasatsu // GarP_3,6.31 //
GP12garup3_u:822: kurvanti vairāgyamamutra loke tataḥ paraṃ bhaktidṛḍhāṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:823: tataḥ paraṃ caiva hareḥ prasannatāṃ kurvanti nityaṃ tava devadeva // GarP_3,6.32 //
GP12garup3_u:824: tenāparokṣaṃ ca bhavecca tasya ato guṇānāṃ stavane ca me ratiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:825: sā tu prajātā puruṣasya nityaṃ saṃsāraduḥ khaṃ tu tadācchinatti // GarP_3,6.33 //
GP12garup3_u:827: harerguṇānastuvatāṃ ca pāpaṃ teṣāṃ hi puṇyaṃ ca tathā kṣiṇoti // GarP_3,6.34 //
GP12garup3_u:828: evaṃ viditvā paramo gururmama vāyurdayālurmama vallabhaśca /
GP12garup3_u:830: uddhṛtya puṇyebhya ivārtabandhuḥ śivaśca no druhyati puṇyakīrtim /
GP12garup3_u:831: tava prasādācca śriyaḥ prasādādvāyoḥ prasādācca mamāsti nityam // GarP_3,6.36 //
GP12garup3_u:833: vāyorvirodhaṃ na karoti devaḥ sa tadvirodhaṃ ca karoti nityam // GarP_3,6.37 //
GP12garup3_u:834: harervirodhaṃ na karoti vāyurvāyorvirodhaṃ na karoti viṣṇuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:835: vāyoḥ prasādānmamanāsti kiñcidatānabhāvaśca tava prasādāt // GarP_3,6.38 //
GP12garup3_u:836: yathaiva mūlaṃ ca tathāvatāre duḥ khādikaṃ nāsti samīraṇasya /
GP12garup3_u:837: vāyustathānye ca ubhau mukundastathāvatāreṣu na duḥ kharūpau // GarP_3,6.39 //
GP12garup3_u:839: narāvatāre tatra deve murāre hyaśaktatā neti vicaṃ tanīyam // GarP_3,6.40 //
GP12garup3_u:840: avatārarūpe yamaduḥ khādikaṃ ca na cintanīyaṃ jñānibhirdevadeva /
GP12garup3_u:841: ahaṃ kadācitsukhanāśapradeśe daityāṃstathā mārayituṃ gatosmi // GarP_3,6.41 //
GP12garup3_u:842: naitāvatā mama vāyośca nityaṃ duḥ khātanaṃ naiva saṃcitanīyam /
GP12garup3_u:843: etādṛśohaṃ stavanenu kāsti śaktirguṇānāṃ madhusūdana prabho /
GP12garup3_u:844: vāyoḥ sakāśācca guṇena hīnā saṃsārarūpe muktarūpe ca deva // GarP_3,6.42 //
GP12garup3_u:845: evaṃ stutvā bhāratī tu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:846: tadanantarajaḥ śeṣaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha keśavam // GarP_3,6.43 //
GP12garup3_u:848: nāhaṃ ca jāne tava pādamūlaṃ rudro na vetti garuḍo na veda /
GP12garup3_u:849: ahaṃ vāṇyāḥ śataguṇāṃśahīno dattvā hyāyatanaṃ pāhi māṃ vāsudeva // GarP_3,6.44 //
GP12garup3_u:853: tava padoḥ stutiṃ kiṃ karomyahaṃ mama padāṃbuje hyarpitaṃ manaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:854: kathamahaṃ mukhe pakṣiyonijaḥ kathamevaṅguṇā nīḍituṃ kṣamaḥ // GarP_3,6.46 //
GP12garup3_u:858: yā vai taveśa bhagavanna vidāma bhūman bhaktirmamāstu śivapādasarojamūle /
GP12garup3_u:859: channāpi sā nanu sadā na mamāsti deva tenādruhaṃ tava viruddhamataḥ karomi // GarP_3,6.48 //
GP12garup3_u:860: sarvānna buddhisahitasya hare murāre kā śaktirasti vacane mama mūḍhabuddheḥ /
GP12garup3_u:861: vāṇyā sadā śataguṇena vihīnamenaṃ māṃ pāhi ceśa mama cāyatanaṃ ca dattvā // GarP_3,6.49 //
GP12garup3_u:862: evaṃ stutvā sa rudrastu tūṣṇīmāsa dvijottamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:865: lakṣmīpate brahmapate manoḥ pategiraḥ pate rudrapate nṛṇāṃ pate /
GP12garup3_u:866: guṇāṃstava stotumahaṃ samarthā na pārvatī nāpi suparṇapatnī // GarP_3,6.51 //
GP12garup3_u:867: śeṣādahaṃ daśaguṇairvihīnā māṃ pāhi nityaṃ jagatāmadhīśa // GarP_3,6.52 //
GP12garup3_u:868: evaṃ stutvā vāruṇī tu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:871: stotuṃ guṇāṃstava hare jagadī śavācā śrotuṃ hare tava kathāṃ śravaṇe na śaktiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:872: yastattvanuṃ smarati deva tava svarūpaṃ ko vai nu veda bhuvi taṃ bhagavatpadārtham // GarP_3,6.54 //
GP12garup3_u:873: ato guṇastavane nāsti śaktirvīndrāhadaṃ daśaguṇairavarā ca nityam // GarP_3,6.55 //
GP12garup3_u:874: evaṃ stutvā tu sauparṇī tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:876: pārvatyuvāca govinda nārāyaṇa vāsudeva tvayā hi me kiñcidapi prayojanam /
GP12garup3_u:877: nāstyeva svāminna ca nāma vācā saubhāgyarūpaḥ sarvadā eka eva // GarP_3,6.57 //
GP12garup3_u:878: nārāyaṇeti tava nāma ca ekameva vairāgyabhaktivibhave paramaṃ samarthām /
GP12garup3_u:881: stavane nāsti me śaktī rudrāddaśaguṇairaham // GarP_3,6.59 //
GP12garup3_u:882: avarā ca sadāsmyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup3_u:883: evaṃ stutvā sā girijā stūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara // GarP_3,6.60 //
GP12garup3_u:884: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttara- tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimānitattaddevatākṛtaviṣṇustutitattaddevatātāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:889: tava svarūpaṃ hṛdi saṃvijānan samutsukaḥ syātstavane yastu mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:890: ajānataḥ stavanaṃ devadeva tadevāhurhelanaṃ cakrapāṇe // GarP_3,7.1 //
GP12garup3_u:891: tathāpi tadvai tava nāma pūrvaṃ bhavettadā puṇyakaraṃ bhavediti /
GP12garup3_u:892: rudrādi kānāṃ stavane nāsti śaktistadā vaktavyaṃ mama nāstīti kiṃ vā // GarP_3,7.2 //
GP12garup3_u:893: guṇāṃśato daśabhī rudrato vai sadā nyūno matsamaḥ kāmadevaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:894: jñāne bale samatā sarvadāsti tathāḥ kāmaḥ kiṃ ca dūtaḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,7.3 //
GP12garup3_u:895: evaṃ stutvā devadevo hariṃ ca tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ prāñjalirnamrabhūrdhā /
GP12garup3_u:900: indrādahaṃ daśaguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūna ukto na jani tvāṃ sarvadā hyaprameya /
GP12garup3_u:901: tathāpi māṃ pāhi jagadguro tvaṃ dattvā divyaṃ hyāyatanaṃ ca viṣṇo // GarP_3,7.6 //
GP12garup3_u:902: āhaṅkārika evaṃ tu stutvā tūṣṇīṃbabhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:906: vāgīśvarairapi sadā manasāpi dhartuṃ no śakyamīśa tava pādarajaḥ smarāmi // GarP_3,7.8 //
GP12garup3_u:908: nyūnabhūtāṃ ca māṃ pāhi kṛpālo bhaktavatsala // GarP_3,7.9 //
GP12garup3_u:909: evaṃ stutvā śacī devī tūṣṇīṃ bhagavatī hyabhūt /
GP12garup3_u:914: etādṛśaṃ tava mukhaṃ nuvituṃ na śaktiḥ śacyā samāpi bhagavanparipāhi nityam /
GP12garup3_u:915: kṛtvā stutiṃ ratiriyaṃ paramādareṇa tūṣṇīṃ sthitā bhagavataśca samīpa eva // GarP_3,7.12 //
GP12garup3_u:920: rudropi tenava vidhṛtena jaṭākalāpapūtena pādarajasā hyaśivaḥ śivobhūt /
GP12garup3_u:921: etādṛśaṃ te caraṇaṃ karuṇeśa viṣṇo stotuṃ śaktirmama nāsti kṛpāvatāra /
GP12garup3_u:922: ratyā samaḥ śrutigato na gatosmi mokṣametādṛśaṃ ca paripāhi nidānamūrte // GarP_3,7.15 //
GP12garup3_u:923: evaṃ stutvā sa dakṣastu tūṣṇī meva babhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:926: saṃcintayāmi satataṃ tava cānanābjaṃ tvaṃ dehi duṣṭaviṣayeṣu viraktimīśa // GarP_3,7.17 //
GP12garup3_u:927: eteṣu śaktiryadi vai sa jīvo kartā ca bhoktā ca sadā ca dātā /
GP12garup3_u:928: yoṣāṃ ca putrasuhṛdau ca paśūṃśca sarvamevaṃ vinaśyati yato hi tadāśu chindhi // GarP_3,7.18 //
GP12garup3_u:930: śaktirna cāsti navane mama devadeva satyā samaṃ ca satataṃ paripāhi nityam // GarP_3,7.19 //
GP12garup3_u:931: evaṃ śrutvā ca paramaṃ tūṣṇīmeva sthito muniḥ /
GP12garup3_u:934: evaṃ harestava kathāṃ rasikāṃ vihāya strīṇāṃ bhage ca vadane parimuhya nityam /
GP12garup3_u:935: viṣṭhāntrapūritabile rasiko hi nityaṃ sthāyī ca sūkaravadeva vimūḍhabuddhiḥ // GarP_3,7.21 //
GP12garup3_u:937: āsvādane mama ca pāpagatermurāre māyābalaṃ tava vibho paramaṃ nimittam // GarP_3,7.22 //
GP12garup3_u:938: saṃsāracakre bhramataśca nityaṃ suduḥ kharūpe sukhaleśavarjite /
GP12garup3_u:939: malaṃ vamantaṃ navabhiśca dvāraiḥ śarīramāruhya sumūḍhabuddhiḥ // GarP_3,7.23 //
GP12garup3_u:940: namāmi nityaṃ tava tatkathāmṛtaṃ vihāyadeva śrutimūlanāśanam /
GP12garup3_u:941: kuṭuṃbapoṣaṃ ca sadā ca kurvandānādyakurvannivasan gṛhe ca // GarP_3,7.24 //
GP12garup3_u:942: dūre ca saṃsāramalaṃ tvidaṃ kuru dehi hyado divyakathāmṛtaṃ sadā /
GP12garup3_u:943: etādṛśohaṃ tava sadguṇaughaṃ stotuṃ samartho nāsmi śacīsamaśca // GarP_3,7.25 //
GP12garup3_u:947: stotuṃ hyanupraviśatopi na garbhaduḥ khaṃ tasmādahaṃ paramapūjyapadaṃ gataste // GarP_3,7.27 //
GP12garup3_u:950: parasparasamā hyete muktvā saṃsārameva ca // GarP_3,7.28 //
GP12garup3_u:954: tvadvicchayā racite dehagehe puttre kalatrepi dhane dravyajātau /
GP12garup3_u:955: mamāhamityalpadhiyā ca mūḍhā saṃsāraduḥ khe vinimajjanti sarve // GarP_3,7.30 //
GP12garup3_u:956: ato hare tādṛśīṃ me kubuddhiṃ vināśya me dehi te pādadāsyam /
GP12garup3_u:957: ahaṃ manoḥ pādapādārdhabhūtaguṇena hīnaḥ sarvadā vai murāre // GarP_3,7.31 //
GP12garup3_u:958: evaṃ stutvā tu varuṇaḥ prāñjaliḥ samupasthitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:962: punīhyataścaiva parovarāyānyajjihvāgre vartate nāma tasya // GarP_3,7.33 //
GP12garup3_u:963: yajjihvāgre harināmaiva nāsti sa brāhmaṇo naiva sa eva gokharaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:964: ahaṃ na jāne ca tava svarūpaṃ nyūno hyahaṃ varuṇātsarvadaiva // GarP_3,7.34 //
GP12garup3_u:965: evaṃ stutvā nārado vai khagendrastūṣṇīmabhūddevadevasya cāgre /
GP12garup3_u:966: yo nāradānantaraṃ saṃbabhūva bhṛgurmahātmā stotumupapracakrame // GarP_3,7.35 //
GP12garup3_u:968: kimāsanaṃ te garuḍāsanāya kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kaustubhabhūṣaṇāya /
GP12garup3_u:969: lakṣmīkalatrāya kimasti deyaṃ vāgīśa kiṃ te vacanīyamasti /
GP12garup3_u:970: ato na jāne tava sadguṇāṃśca hyahaṃ sadā varuṇā tpādahīnaḥ // GarP_3,7.36 //
GP12garup3_u:971: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ devaṃ bhṛgustūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:974: yattejasāhaṃ susamiddhatejā havyaṃ vahāmyadhvare ājyasiktam // GarP_3,7.38 //
GP12garup3_u:975: yattejasāhaṃ jaṭhare saṃpraviśya pacannannaṃ sarvadā pūrṇaśaktiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:976: ato na jāne tava sadguṇāṃśca bhṛgorahaṃ sarvadaivaṃ samosmi // GarP_3,7.39 //
GP12garup3_u:979: yannāmārthavicāraṇepimunayo muhyati vai sarvadā tvadbhītā api devatā hyavirataṃ strībhiḥ sahaiva sthitāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:980: māndhātṛdhruvanāradāśca bhṛgavo vaivasvatādyākhilāḥ premṇā vai praṇamāmyahaṃ hitakṛte tasmai namo viṣṇave // GarP_3,7.41 //
GP12garup3_u:981: ato na jāne tava sadguṇānsadā evaṃ vidhā kā mama śaktirasti /
GP12garup3_u:984: tadbhāryā vai prasūtistu traya ete samāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,7.43 //
GP12garup3_u:990: namostu tasmai puruṣāya vedhase namonamo 'sadvṛjinacchide namaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:991: namonamo svāṅgabhavāya nityaṃ natosmi henātha tavāṅghripaṅkajam // GarP_3,7.46 //
GP12garup3_u:992: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ bhagavanvāsudeva hyagnerahaṃ sarvadā nyūna eva /
GP12garup3_u:993: mitrādahaṃ sarvadā kiñcidūnaḥ stutvā deva sobhavattatra tūṣṇīm // GarP_3,7.47 //
GP12garup3_u:995: harintuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ gurum // GarP_3,7.48 //
GP12garup3_u:998: kurve ca nityaṃ sukhaleśalavādinā tvaddaraṃ manastvaśubhakarma samācarīṣye // GarP_3,7.49 //
GP12garup3_u:999: etādṛśohaṃ bhagavānanantaḥ sadā vasiṣṭhasya samāna eva // GarP_3,7.50 //
GP12garup3_u:1000: evaṃ stutvā marīcistu tūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
GP12garup3_u:1003: tattvārthamūlamavikāri tava svarūpaṃ hyānandasāramata eva vikāraśūnyam // GarP_3,7.52 //
GP12garup3_u:1004: traiguṇyaśūnyamakhileṣu ca saṃvibhaktaṃ tatra praviśya bhagavanna hi paśyatīva /
GP12garup3_u:1005: ato marārestava sadguṇāṃśca stotuṃ na śakromi marīcetulyaḥ // GarP_3,7.53 //
GP12garup3_u:1009: draṣṭuṃ na śakromi tava svarūpaṃ hyanantabāhūdaramastakaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:1011: etādṛśaṃ rūpamanantapāraṃ stotuṃ hyaśaktastu samosmi cātreḥ // GarP_3,7.55 //
GP12garup3_u:1017: (laśca) yasmai namo bhagavate purupāya tubhyaṃ yo vāvitā nirayabhāgagamaprasaṅge // GarP_3,7.57 //
GP12garup3_u:1018: etādṛśāṃstava guṇānnavituṃ na śaktaṃ māṃ pāhi bhagavansadṛśo hyaṅgirasā ca // GarP_3,7.58 //
GP12garup3_u:1019: evaṃ stutvā pulastyopi stūṣṇīmeva vabhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:1023: ārādhanaṃ bhagavatastava satkriyāśca vyarthaṃ bhavediti vadanti mahānubhāvāḥ // GarP_3,7.60 //
GP12garup3_u:1024: tasmai sadā bhagavate praṇamāmi nityaṃ niṣkāmayā tava samarpaṇamātravuddhyā /
GP12garup3_u:1025: vaikuṇṭhanātha bhagavanstavane na śaktiḥ sohaṃ pulasatyasadṛśosmi na saṃśayotra // GarP_3,7.61 //
GP12garup3_u:1026: evaṃ stutvā tu pulahastūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
GP12garup3_u:1030: yenaikajanmaśamalaṃ sahasaiva hitvā saṃyāti muktimamalāṃ tamahaṃ prapadye // GarP_3,7.63 //
GP12garup3_u:1032: tepi muktiṃ prayāntyāśu kimuta dhyāyinaḥ sadā // GarP_3,7.64 //
GP12garup3_u:1036: sohaṃ hi karmakaraṇe nirataḥ sadaiva strīṇāṃ bhoge ca nirataśca gude pramattaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1037: jihvendriye ca niratastava darśane ca samyagvirāgasahitaḥ paramo dareṇa // GarP_3,7.66 //
GP12garup3_u:1038: māṃsāsthimajjarudhiraiḥ sahite ca dehe bhaktiṃ sadaiva bhagavannapi taskare ca /
GP12garup3_u:1039: gurvagnibāḍabagavādiṣu satsu duḥ khātsamyagviraktimupayāmi sahasva nityam // GarP_3,7.67 //
GP12garup3_u:1040: lokānuvādaśravaṇe paramā ca śaktirnārāyaṇasya namane na ca mesti śaktiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1041: lokānuyānakaraṇe paramā ca śaktiḥ kṣetrādimārgagamane paramā hyaśaktiḥ // GarP_3,7.68 //
GP12garup3_u:1042: vaiśyādikeṣu dhanikeṣu parā ca śaktiḥ sadbrāhmaṇeṣvapi na śaktiraho murāre // GarP_3,7.69 //
GP12garup3_u:1046: na dhyāte caraṇāṃbuje bhagavato saṃdhyāpi nānuṣṭhitā jñānadvārakapāṭapāṭanapaṭurdharmopinopārjitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1047: antarvyāphamalābhighātakaraṇe paṭvī śrutā te kathā no deva śravaṇena pāhi bhagavanmāmatritulyaṃ sadā // GarP_3,7.71 //
GP12garup3_u:1054: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde devādistutitattattāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1061: veda svayaṃ bhagavānvāsudevo nāhaṃ nāgnirna tridevā munīndrāḥ // GarP_3,8.2 //
GP12garup3_u:1062: athāpare bhāgavatapradhānā yadā na jānīyurathāpare kutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1063: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ paratopyadhīśa viśvāmitrānnyūna eveti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:1064: ahaṃ parjanyārdviguṇa eva nityamato mama stavane nāsti śaktiḥ // GarP_3,8.3 //
GP12garup3_u:1065: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ mitrastūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
GP12garup3_u:1068: ananyena tu bhāvena bhaktiṃ kurvanti ye dṛḍhām /
GP12garup3_u:1073: tanmadhye patitāṃ pāhi sadā mitrasamāṃ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1076: yogena tvayyarpitayā ca bhaktyā saṃyānti lokāḥ paramāṃ gatiṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:1079: ato māṃ pāhi dayayā sadā tārāsamaṃ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1080: tadanantarajā stotuṃ prāvahī taṃ pracakrame // GarP_3,8.9 //
GP12garup3_u:1082: sutāḥ prasaṃgena bhavanti vīryāttava prasādātparamāḥ sampadaśca /
GP12garup3_u:1090: vāyuputro mahābhāgaḥ hariṃ stotuṃ pracakrame // GarP_3,8.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1097: saṃsmṛtiśca tadā nāśī bhūyādeva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,8.16 //
GP12garup3_u:1098: evaṃ stuttvā mahābhāgo viṣvakse no mahāprabho /
GP12garup3_u:1100: mitrādahaṃ nyūna eva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,8.17 //
GP12garup3_u:1101: iti śrīgā- ma- u- tṛ- dha- viṣṇustutirdevatāramyādi- aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1105: tadanyāṃśca krameṇeva vaktuṃ kṛṣṇa tvamarhasi // GarP_3,9.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1112: citrasenaśca gopālo balaḥ pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,9.4 //
GP12garup3_u:1114: ajānajasamā jñeyā muktau saṃsāra eva ca // GarP_3,9.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1116: ghṛtācī menakā raṃbhā urvaśī ca tilottamā // GarP_3,9.6 //
GP12garup3_u:1117: suketuḥ śabarī caiva mañjughoṣā ca piṅgalā /
GP12garup3_u:1126: uddālako hyṛ śṛṅgaḥ śaṅkhaḥ satyavratastathā // GarP_3,9.11 //
GP12garup3_u:1134: eteṣāṃ śravaṇādeva hariḥ prīṇāti sarvadā // GarP_3,9.15 //
GP12garup3_u:1135: bruve dvyaṣṭasahasraṃ ca śṛṇu tārkṣya mama striyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1139: tvaṣṭuḥ putrī kaśerūśca tāsāṃ madhye guṇādhikā /
GP12garup3_u:1142: tathādhikā hi pitara iti vedavidāṃ matam // GarP_3,9.18 //
GP12garup3_u:1146: svamukeneva devaiśca ājñāpyāḥ sarvadā gaṇāḥ // GarP_3,9.20 //
GP12garup3_u:1148: tebhyastu kṣitipā jñeyā avarāśca śatairguṇaiḥ // GarP_3,9.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1151: evaṃ brahmādayo devā lakṣmyādyā api sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,9.22 //
GP12garup3_u:1152: stutvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ sarve prāñjalīkṛtya bho dvija // GarP_3,9.23 //
GP12garup3_u:1157: idaṃ tu stavanaṃ viprā na paṭhantīha mānavāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1158: na śṛṇvanti ca ye nityaṃ te sarve caiva māyinaḥ // GarP_3,9.26 //
GP12garup3_u:1160: tairbhuktā satataṃ viṣṭhā sadā krimiśatairyutā // GarP_3,9.27 //
GP12garup3_u:1161: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtī- utta- brahmakāṇḍe devakṛtaviṣṇustutidevatātāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1165: kīdṛśaṃ hyāśrayaṃ dattvaiṣāṃ viveśa mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,10.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1167: samyag brūhi dayālo tvaṃ yadi macchrotramarhati // GarP_3,10.2 //
GP12garup3_u:1171: adau sasarja bhagavān brahmāṇḍaṃ kana kātmakam /
GP12garup3_u:1174: vartate tata ūrdhvaṃ tu pañcāśatkoṭibhūtalam // GarP_3,10.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1178: dvitīyā varaṇaṃ jñeyaṃ pāvakasya mahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,10.7 //
GP12garup3_u:1190: mahattattvānantaraṃ ca tamo hyāvaraṇaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,10.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1192: tasmācca dviguṇaṃ jñeyaṃrajo hyāvaraṇaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,10.14 //
GP12garup3_u:1200: evaṃ caturmukhenaiva tadā hṛṣyaṃ ti cāṇḍaja // GarP_3,10.18 //
GP12garup3_u:1201: te sarve virajānadyāṃ samyak snātvā visarjya ca /
GP12garup3_u:1202: liṅgadehaṃ tataḥ paścānmokṣaṃ vindanti te hareḥ // GarP_3,10.19 //
GP12garup3_u:1215: pralaye virajānadyā layo nāsti khageśvara // GarP_3,10.25 //
GP12garup3_u:1217: brahmatvayogyā ṛjavo nāma devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,10.26 //
GP12garup3_u:1219: pṛthakpṛthak ca taiḥ sākaṃ mokṣayogyāḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,10.27 //
GP12garup3_u:1220: jīvāḥ saṃti hyaneke ca pratikalpe sṛjanti te /
GP12garup3_u:1227: ekena śatakalpena vāyutvaṃ yāti bho dvija // GarP_3,10.31 //
GP12garup3_u:1232: brahmaṇā saha mokṣaṃ ca yāti samyaṅ na cānyathā /
GP12garup3_u:1235: brahmaṇaiva sahāyāti hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ param // GarP_3,10.35 //
GP12garup3_u:1239: iti śrutaṃ mayā brahmanbrahmaṇoktaṃ hareḥ priyāt /
GP12garup3_u:1240: itthaṃ tvayoktaṃ śrīkṛṣṇa saṃśayobādhate mama // GarP_3,10.37 //
GP12garup3_u:1241: ato me saṃśayaṃ chindhi yathā na syāttathā punaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1242: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt // GarP_3,10.38 //
GP12garup3_u:1250: pañcā śītibrahmakalpaṃ ye vijānanti bho dvija /
GP12garup3_u:1251: tendhaṃ tamaḥ praviśanti satyaṃsatyaṃ mayoditam // GarP_3,10.42 //
GP12garup3_u:1255: na dānaṃ jātiproktaṃ sarvadā nāsti saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,10.44 //
GP12garup3_u:1257: evaṃ mataṃ sa nirmāya bhagavānharikhyayaḥ // GarP_3,10.45 //
GP12garup3_u:1262: sṛṣṭiruktā tvayā pūrvaṃ śrutā samyaṅ mayā hare // GarP_3,10.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1263: kiṃ nāma prākṛtaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā kiṃ vaikṛtaṃ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1264: etadvistīrya me brūhi śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // GarP_3,10.49 //
GP12garup3_u:1267: te sarve prākṛtāḥ proktāsteṣāṃ jñānādvimacyate // GarP_3,10.50 //
GP12garup3_u:1269: yā sṛṣṭirucyate sadbhiḥ saivoktā vikṛteti ca // GarP_3,10.51 //
GP12garup3_u:1273: jagatpravāhaḥ satyo 'yaṃ naiva mithyā kathañcana // GarP_3,10.53 //
GP12garup3_u:1277: vedācchāstraṃ paraṃ nāsti na devaḥ keśavātparaḥ // GarP_3,10.55 //
GP12garup3_u:1279: teṣāmandhaṃ tamo jñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ garuṇāmapi // GarP_3,10.56 //
GP12garup3_u:1281: samyagjānāti yo loke sa yāti paramaṃ padam // GarP_3,10.57 //
GP12garup3_u:1282: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe brahmāṇḍādivaikṛtaikadeśaprākṛtasṛṣṭinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo
GP12garup3_u:1294: nārāyaṇa namaste 'stu śṛṇu vijñāpanaṃ mama // GarP_3,11.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1296: ajā tu prakṛtiḥ proktā cāparā prakṛtiḥ parā // GarP_3,11.6 //
GP12garup3_u:1298: umā śacyavarā tasyā avarāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,11.7 //
GP12garup3_u:1299: etāsāṃ hananaṃ naiva prārthayāmaḥ sadā hare /
GP12garup3_u:1300: asti pratinṛṣu brahma prakṛtī dve vyavasthite // GarP_3,11.8 //
GP12garup3_u:1303: ata eva tvaje jyeṣṭhe iti loke prakīrtite /
GP12garup3_u:1304: sukhaduḥ khapradā caiva aparā duḥ khadaiva tu // GarP_3,11.10 //
GP12garup3_u:1306: teṣāmācchādikā hokā tamoṅgā sā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,11.11 //
GP12garup3_u:1308: sā parā prakṛtirjñeyā paramācchādikā smṛtā // GarP_3,11.12 //
GP12garup3_u:1309: evaṃ sā paramā duṣṭā hokā tamoṅgā tu prakīrtitā /
GP12garup3_u:1310: jīvavargeṣveva khaga brahmādernāsti sā kvacit // GarP_3,11.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1312: prerikā tu tayordevyo stvahamādyā sukhātmikā // GarP_3,11.14 //
GP12garup3_u:1318: kuru deva mahābhāga iti vijñāyatāṃ mama // GarP_3,11.17 //
GP12garup3_u:1319: evaṃ stuto hariḥ kṛṣṇo suprabuddho 'pi sarbadā /
GP12garup3_u:1322: tatprākṛtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ bhūdevī tvabhimāninī // GarP_3,11.19 //
GP12garup3_u:1325: viṣṇoḥ svarūpabhūtaṃ ca ye vijānanti te narāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1326: te yānti hyadharaṃ lokaṃ tathā tatsaṃgisaṃginaḥ // GarP_3,11.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1328: kirīṭādyā api harerdvidhā saṃti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,11.22 //
GP12garup3_u:1330: gṛhītā iti vijñeyā na svarūpāḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,11.23 //
GP12garup3_u:1332: pralaye muktihīnaśca supta ityucyate budhaḥ // GarP_3,11.24 //
GP12garup3_u:1333: tasya samivastrivaṃ ca na jñātavyā khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:1334: pralayopi mahābhāga brahmavāyvorna cāsti hi // GarP_3,11.25 //
GP12garup3_u:1335: vṛttirūpaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ pādyārghyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1343: vāstavaṃ ye vijānanti teṣāṃ nityaṃ dhanaṃ tapaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1346: yadā hi kāraṇaṃ cāsti tadā kāryamiti prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1347: ityabhiprāyagarbheṇa tvaṃ samādhāsya te yadi // GarP_3,11.31 //
GP12garup3_u:1348: tarhi tasya mahābhāga kathaṃ brūhi bhayādikam /
GP12garup3_u:1349: bhayādikaṃ hyastu nāma kā vāsmākaṃ kṣatirbhavet // GarP_3,11.32 //
GP12garup3_u:1352: prīyate matvā brahma tasmātsuptiśca tatra hi /
GP12garup3_u:1353: ajñādikaṃ yadi brahma tasya na syātkathañcana // GarP_3,11.34 //
GP12garup3_u:1355: kathaṃ vā muktiparyantaṃ jñānavyaktirvadasva me // GarP_3,11.35 //
GP12garup3_u:1356: yadyajñānaṃ tasya satyaṃ na syāttarhi mahāprabho /
GP12garup3_u:1358: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt /
GP12garup3_u:1359: bhayaṃ ca vāstavaṃ tasya na jānīhi mahāmate // GarP_3,11.37 //
GP12garup3_u:1363: duḥ khājñānādikaṃ kiñcitkathaṃ tasmin bhaviṣyati // GarP_3,11.39 //
GP12garup3_u:1365: tena prīṇāti ca haristasya nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,11.40 //
GP12garup3_u:1367: kadāciddṛśyate brahmā duḥ khī na ca khageśvara // GarP_3,11.41 //
GP12garup3_u:1369: duḥ khivaddṛśyate brahmā ājñānāṃ mohanāya ca // GarP_3,11.42 //
GP12garup3_u:1375: padmāddhiraṇma yājjāto brahmā tu caturānanaḥ // GarP_3,11.45 //
GP12garup3_u:1379: ko vā māṃ sṛṣṭavānatra iti hyālocya sa prabhuḥ // GarP_3,11.47 //
GP12garup3_u:1380: taṃ vicārayituṃ brahmā padmanāḍīṃ viveśa ha // GarP_3,11.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1381: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛthṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'jñānahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1384: nāḍīṃ samāviśya mahānubhāvaḥ śrīviṣṇubhakto tvatha puṣkarasthaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1385: vicārayāmāsa guruṃ svamūlaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ nirguṇamadvitīyam // GarP_3,12.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1387: vicārakāle ca vicintanīyo hyajñānaleśastu khageśvareśvara // GarP_3,12.2 //
GP12garup3_u:1388: yathāsti viṣṇormanaḥ saṅkalpa eva tathaiva sopi prakaroti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:1389: ālocane tasya sadāsti bhūmansvayogyatāmanatikramya caiva // GarP_3,12.3 //
GP12garup3_u:1390: hareḥ svarūpe ca tathā prapañcaḥ svasminsvarūpe ca khagasti jñānam /
GP12garup3_u:1391: yathāpi nityaṃ paricāravāri ca ajñātavaddṛśyate viṣṇunā ca // GarP_3,12.4 //
GP12garup3_u:1392: hareḥ prītyarthaṃ kurute sau kadāccittatrāpi kaścidviśeṣo 'sti vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:1393: śṛṇuṣva samyaṅnigṛhītacitto yathā provāca sa vijānāti devaḥ // GarP_3,12.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1394: sadā tvadoṣaṃ praviśeṣeśca muktavedāstathā vā pavijānanti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:1395: tasya svarūpaṃ na tathā hariṃ ca svayogyatāmanatikramya vedhāḥ // GarP_3,12.6 //
GP12garup3_u:1396: hareḥ svarūpaṃ na vijānāti sarvaṃ svayo gyarūpaṃ sarvadā vetti viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1397: tatrājñānaṃ nāsti kiñciddvijendra yāvatsvarūpaṃ ca tathaiva lakṣmyāḥ // GarP_3,12.7 //
GP12garup3_u:1398: vedhā na jānāti kutastadanye tayoḥ svarūpaṃna vijānāti sarvam /
GP12garup3_u:1399: tathāpi vedānekadeśena veda jānāti lakṣmīrharirūpaṃ ca yāvat // GarP_3,12.8 //
GP12garup3_u:1400: tāvanna jānāti vidhiḥ khagendra jñāne vidhātuśca svayogyabhūte /
GP12garup3_u:1401: ato viriñcasya na cintanīyo hyajñānaleśaḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle // GarP_3,12.9 //
GP12garup3_u:1402: nāḍīṃ samāviśya tadā viriñco na veda nārāyaṇamekavacca /
GP12garup3_u:1403: tadā śṛṇottaṃ kamalāsanaṃ prabhustapastapa dvyakṣaraṃ sādareṇa // GarP_3,12.10 //
GP12garup3_u:1404: abhiprāyaṃ tasya samyagvidittvā tapaḥ kuru tvaṃ harituṣṭyarthameva /
GP12garup3_u:1405: tapo 'karoddharipādaika niṣṭho hareḥ prītyarthaṃ divyasahasravarṣam // GarP_3,12.11 //
GP12garup3_u:1406: tato hariḥ prādurāsītkhagendra varaṃ dātuṃ bhaktavarasya divyam /
GP12garup3_u:1407: sadā viṣṇuṃ devadevo dadarśa caturbhujaṃ taṃ jalajāyatākṣam // GarP_3,12.12 //
GP12garup3_u:1409: dṛṣṭvā hariṃ brahma nārāyaṇaṃ ca puraḥ sthitaṃ bhaktavaśyaṃ dayālum // GarP_3,12.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1410: samarcayāmāsa mahāvibhūtyā bhaktyā hareḥ pādatīrthaṃ dadhāra /
GP12garup3_u:1413: rameśa lokeśa jagannivāsa tava svarūpaṃ na vijānāti devī /
GP12garup3_u:1414: tava prasādātsuvijānāti devī guṇānvedoktānsarvadā vīndra sarvān // GarP_3,12.15 //
GP12garup3_u:1415: tathāpi sā na vijānāti devī sākalyenāśeṣitaḥ sadguṇāṃśca /
GP12garup3_u:1416: yadyapyanuktaṃ pañcabhirnāsti vedaistathāpi deve 'tra viśeṣa āste // GarP_3,12.16 //
GP12garup3_u:1417: tattvecchavaḥ pravijānanti nityaṃ vede sūktānkvāpyanuktāṃśca sarvān /
GP12garup3_u:1418: ādau jānantyatra vedā murāre ṛgādayaḥ suṣṭhu catvāra eva // GarP_3,12.17 //
GP12garup3_u:1419: vedā hyete vedayantīti deva tathā purāṇaṃ bhārataṃ pañcarātram /
GP12garup3_u:1420: kramādito vicintya sā viṣṇuguṇānsvayogyānsadā vijānāti ramāpi devī // GarP_3,12.18 //
GP12garup3_u:1422: sāmānyataḥ pravijānāti devī harerguṇānna viśeṣācca nityam // GarP_3,12.19 //
GP12garup3_u:1423: ahaṃ vijānāmi ramāpra sādāttava prasādācca guṇānsadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:1424: svayogyabhūtāñchrutipūktān guṇāṃśca kāṃścidvijānāti harerna kaścit // GarP_3,12.20 //
GP12garup3_u:1425: tava prasādācca mama prasādātkālāntare tāṃśca jānāti śeṣaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1426: duṣkarmaleśānna tirohitān guṇānyāneva pūrvaṃ viditān svayogyān // GarP_3,12.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1427: tāneva jñātvā punareva śeṣastiro hitāṃllabdhaguṇastataḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1428: sadā svayogyāṃśca harerguṇāṃśca umāpatiścāpi tava prasādāt // GarP_3,12.22 //
GP12garup3_u:1429: yadā vijānāti hare murāre aprāptalabdheti tadocyate haraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1430: mamāpi lokaṃ ca yadā murāre tadā vijānāti tava svarūpam // GarP_3,12.23 //
GP12garup3_u:1431: govinda nityāvyaya citsupūrṇa tava prasādānnāsti śateṣu tanmamayeye hi devāśca śarīradhāriṇaste jñānahīnā viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ // GarP_3,12.24 //
GP12garup3_u:1432: yeye devā viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāstete devā bahirarthabhāvāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1433: yeye devā bahirarthabhāvā mokṣā danye pralapantaḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,12.25 //
GP12garup3_u:1434: tava svarūpe ca jagatsvarūpe tavāsamānaṃ nāsti viṣṇo sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:1435: yatastava prākṛto nāsti deho yato jñānaṃ nāsti nāstye va nityam // GarP_3,12.26 //
GP12garup3_u:1436: pūrṇānandajñānadeho 'pi nityaṃ sadā śarīrī bhāṣyate bhaktimadbhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1437: yatastava prākṛto nāsti deho hyatopi nityamaśarīrīti ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,12.27 //
GP12garup3_u:1439: atto 'pyahaṃ tvaśarīrī sadaiva tathaiva nityaṃ bahirarthaiśca śūnyaḥ // GarP_3,12.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1441: ete hi sarve bahirarthasaṃjñakāḥ naisargakāmāḥ sarvadā me hi viṣṇo // GarP_3,12.29 //
GP12garup3_u:1442: tathāpyahaṃ kāmahīno hi nityaṃ rudrādayaḥ kāmavanto yatotaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1443: śarīriṇaste bahirarthabhāvā ajñānavanto 'pi ca saṃsmṛtāḥ khaga // GarP_3,12.30 //
GP12garup3_u:1444: svadārabhoge kevalāṃ prītimevaṃ harerevaṃ sarvadāhaṃ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:1445: stambāstrādīndhāriyiṣye sadaiva viṣṇoḥ prītyarthaṃ naiva gātrārthameva // GarP_3,12.31 //
GP12garup3_u:1446: nityānandādanyakāmo na mesti ataḥ sadā bahirarthaiśca śūnyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1447: mamāpi bhāryā bahirarthaśūnyā amūḍhabhāvā mūḍhavatīva dṛśyate // GarP_3,12.32 //
GP12garup3_u:1448: amūḍhabhūtā jñānināṃ sarvadaiva tathājñānāṃ jñānahīneti bhāti /
GP12garup3_u:1449: yāvajjñānaṃ cāsti me vāstudeva tāvajjñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti // GarP_3,12.33 //
GP12garup3_u:1452: sauriprakāśe ca yathaiva darśanaṃ tathā mama jñānagato viśeṣaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1453: dīpaprakāśe ca yathaiva darśanaṃ tathā jñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti // GarP_3,12.35 //
GP12garup3_u:1454: aspaṣṭaparūpā nyūnatā hyasti vāyau tathā jñānaṃ naiva saṃcintanīyam /
GP12garup3_u:1457: vāyormama pralaye sṛṣṭikāle tathā gāyatryā nāstināstyeva mohaḥ // GarP_3,12.37 //
GP12garup3_u:1459: mamājñānaṃ dṛśyate yatra kutra daityādīnāṃ mohanārtha sadaiva // GarP_3,12.38 //
GP12garup3_u:1462: sūryodaye nāsti yathā tamaśca tathājñānaṃ nāstināstyeva deva /
GP12garup3_u:1463: karomyahaṃ śravaṇaṃ sarvadaiva hariprītyarthaṃ niścatārthaṃ satāṃ hi // GarP_3,12.40 //
GP12garup3_u:1469: śatajanmasu pūrvaṃ tu parokṣeṇa mama prabho // GarP_3,12.43 //
GP12garup3_u:1472: nājñānaṃ cintanīyaṃ hi brahmayvośca deva hi /
GP12garup3_u:1475: sarvadā jñānarūpā sā sarvaduḥ khavivarjitā // GarP_3,12.46 //
GP12garup3_u:1476: daityānāṃ mohanārthāya aṃśe duḥ khīva dṛśyate /
GP12garup3_u:1477: tasyā duḥ khādikaṃ kiñcinnāstināstyeva sarvathā // GarP_3,12.47 //
GP12garup3_u:1479: tāvanmātreṇa vājñānaṃ tasyāṃ naivāhitaṃ ca yat // GarP_3,12.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1481: bhāratyāstu yathā nāsti sarasvatyāstu kiṃ punaḥ // GarP_3,12.49 //
GP12garup3_u:1485: vāyoraṃśāvatārosti yathā mūle tathaiva ca // GarP_3,12.51 //
GP12garup3_u:1486: balajñānā dikaṃ sarvaṃ cintanīyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1491: tretāyugasvarūpe ca na darśayati tādṛśam // GarP_3,12.54 //
GP12garup3_u:1496: vāyuḥ kaliyuge rūpe taddarśayati tādṛśam // GarP_3,12.56 //
GP12garup3_u:1498: avatāreṣu vāyośca antaraṃ ye viduḥ prabho // GarP_3,12.57 //
GP12garup3_u:1499: te 'dhaṃ tamaḥ praviśante te daityā na ca te surāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1502: tadarthameva vāyośca avatāraḥ sadā bhuvi // GarP_3,12.59 //
GP12garup3_u:1514: rāmeṇa duḥ khayuktena liṅgasya sthāpanaṃ kṛtam // GarP_3,12.65 //
GP12garup3_u:1516: svayaṃ vyaktasthale cāpi cidā nandatvakalpanam // GarP_3,12.66 //
GP12garup3_u:1519: viṣṇoḥ sūryeṇa sākaṃ ca abhedā divicintanam /
GP12garup3_u:1520: sarvottamaḥ sūrya eva viṣṇvādyāstasya kiṅkarāḥ // GarP_3,12.68 //
GP12garup3_u:1524: te sarve harinindāyāmavikāriṇa eva hi // GarP_3,12.70 //
GP12garup3_u:1526: pārthakyanayanaṃ yeṣu kurvanti yarhi vā prabho // GarP_3,12.71 //
GP12garup3_u:1527: tarhi teṣāṃ hi kāleṣu duḥ khaṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1528: ataḥ prārthakyanayanaṃ ye kurvantyeṣu sarvadā // GarP_3,12.72 //
GP12garup3_u:1529: te sarve tvabudhā jñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup3_u:1531: te sarve hyasurā jñeyā nānyathā tu kathañcana /
GP12garup3_u:1532: vihāya śūnyamaśvatthaṃ namanaṃ ye prakurvate // GarP_3,12.74 //
GP12garup3_u:1534: te sarve hyasurā jñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,12.75 //
GP12garup3_u:1536: asmacchatāyuḥ paryantameka eva kaliḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,12.76 //
GP12garup3_u:1537: kalau saṃti kalpamānaṃ kalerante saṃti ca /
GP12garup3_u:1538: tasmindine brahmarūpe gacchanti ca tamontikam // GarP_3,12.77 //
GP12garup3_u:1539: tatra sthitvā lokamārgaṃ pratīkṣante na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1544: tamasyandhepi saṃsāre nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,12.80 //
GP12garup3_u:1546: dūṣako viṣṇubhaktānāṃ tatsamo nāsti sarvadā // GarP_3,12.81 //
GP12garup3_u:1548: mithyādāne jñānabuddhirduḥ khe ca sukhabuddhimān // GarP_3,12.82 //
GP12garup3_u:1550: duryodhanaḥ sa evokto duḥ khānantyasvarūpavān // GarP_3,12.83 //
GP12garup3_u:1552: alakṣmīriti vikhyātā sā loke mantharā smṛtā // GarP_3,12.84 //
GP12garup3_u:1554: jarāsaṃdhaḥ sa evoktaḥ kālanemistataḥ param // GarP_3,12.85 //
GP12garup3_u:1557: tāveva haṃsahiḍaṃbakau jñeyau tau ca janārdana /
GP12garup3_u:1558: vipracittisamo jñeyo bhaumo vai bhūtale smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,12.87 //
GP12garup3_u:1564: śaṃbarasya samo jñeyaḥ śālvo daityeṣu cādhamaḥ // GarP_3,12.90 //
GP12garup3_u:1566: bāṇastato 'dhamo jñeyaḥ sa tu kīcakanāmataḥ // GarP_3,12.91 //
GP12garup3_u:1576: vetaḥ sa eva vijñeyaḥ pūrvajanmani sattama // GarP_3,12.96 //
GP12garup3_u:1578: duḥ śāsanastu vijñeyo jarāsaṃdhasamaḥ prabho // GarP_3,12.97 //
GP12garup3_u:1596: kalpādyaiḥ preritāḥ sarve rudrādyā adhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_3,12.106 //
GP12garup3_u:1598: kadāpyahaṃ ca vāyuśca viruddhaṃ nācareva bhoḥ // GarP_3,12.107 //
GP12garup3_u:1602: etādṛśopyahaṃ deva na ca śaktistu nastave // GarP_3,12.109 //
GP12garup3_u:1604: iti stutvā hariṃ brahmā sthitaḥ prāñja liragrataḥ // GarP_3,12.110 //
GP12garup3_u:1605: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde brahmastutivarṇanaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1608: iti stutaḥ sa bhagavān svapūtreṇa dayānidhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1611: yathā vai prākkṣaṇetadvatsṛja sarvaṃ mahāprabho // GarP_3,13.2 //
GP12garup3_u:1612: nāsti prayojanaṃ tena tava matprītaye sṛja /
GP12garup3_u:1613: evamuktastu hāriṇā brahmā stutvā hariṃ param // GarP_3,13.3 //
GP12garup3_u:1614: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ mano dadhre prīṇayanneva mādhavam /
GP12garup3_u:1616: ādau sasarja garuḍa puruṣātmā sa eva ca /
GP12garup3_u:1617: tato dakṣiṇahastāttu brahmāṇīṃ bhārantī tathā // GarP_3,13.6 // (13.5)
GP12garup3_u:1633: daśavarṣānantaraṃ ca pārvatīṃ ca tathaiva saḥ // GarP_3,13.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1641: ratiṃ sa janayāmāsa kāmabhāryāṃ mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.17 //
GP12garup3_u:1647: ahaṅkārādanu brahmā sajñānaṃ ca bṛhaspatim // GarP_3,13.20 //
GP12garup3_u:1649: pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu tārāṃ bhāryāṃ vinirmame // GarP_3,13.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1651: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ manuṃ caiva nirmame manasā vibhuḥ // GarP_3,13.22 //
GP12garup3_u:1663: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu pravāhīṃ nirmame prabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1667: tadbhāryāṃ śāmalāṃ devīṃ tasmādeva mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.30 //
GP12garup3_u:1689: kaśyapañjanayāmāsa manasā ca svayaṃ prabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.41 //
GP12garup3_u:1694: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu teṣāṃ bhāryāḥ krameṇa tu /
GP12garup3_u:1703: dhanapo hyabhavattatra tadbhāryā vatsare pare // GarP_3,13.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1713: evaṃ jñātvā mokṣameti nānyathā tu kathañcana // GarP_3,13.53 //
GP12garup3_u:1714: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1718: guṇānāmantara brūhi śiṣyasya mama savrata // GarP_3,14.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1720: yo mūlarūpī bhagavānananto brahmādibhiḥ purṇaguṇaḥ svatantraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1721: purātanaḥ pūrṇatanurmadātmā na tādṛśāḥ saṃti kadāpi vīdra // GarP_3,14.2 //
GP12garup3_u:1722: pādaśca pūrṇaḥ pādatalaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ nakhāśca pūrṇāḥ kaṭikaṇṭhau ca pūrṇau /
GP12garup3_u:1723: ūrū ca pūrṇe udaraṃ ca pūrṇaṃ labdhvāpi pūrṇāñjagṛhe tathāpyuraḥ // GarP_3,14.3 //
GP12garup3_u:1724: skandhaḥ supūrṇāḥ sakalāśca bāhavaḥ pūrṇāḥ keśāḥ śmaśrudantāśca pūrṇāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1725: lomāni pūrṇāni tathaiva romakūpāśca pūrṇāstu tathaiva śiśraḥ // GarP_3,14.4 //
GP12garup3_u:1726: aṇḍaśca pūrṇo hyaṇḍaromāṇi kakṣāścakṣuśca śrotre sarva ete ca pūrṇāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1727: kiṃ varṇaye mūlarūpaṃ hareśca yāvadvalaṃ pūrṇaṃ samagradehe // GarP_3,14.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1728: tāvadbralaṃ hyekaromādikeṣu saṃtitvime hi yataḥ sa eva pūrṇaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1729: sa eva tu sarvasya kartā sa eva harthā sa tu sārāṃśabhoktā // GarP_3,14.6 //
GP12garup3_u:1730: asārāṃśaṃ naiva bhoktā haristu sārānvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣīndra samyak /
GP12garup3_u:1731: drākṣekṣusāraṃ nārikelasya sāraṃ cūtasya sāraṃ panasasyāpi sāram // GarP_3,14.7 //
GP12garup3_u:1733: nārāyaṇo bījarūpasya sāraṃ gṛhṇāti nityaṃ bhaktavaryo dayāluḥ // GarP_3,14.8 //
GP12garup3_u:1734: tāmbūlasāraṃ khadirasya sāraṃ puṣpasya sāraṃ candanasyāpi sāram /
GP12garup3_u:1735: godhūmasāraṃ yavānāṃ ca sāraṃ māṣasya sāraṃ hareṇośca sāram // GarP_3,14.9 //
GP12garup3_u:1736: śuddhaṃ tathā vrīhinīvārasāraṃ śyāmākasāraṃ śuddhadhānyasya sāram // GarP_3,14.10 //
GP12garup3_u:1738: gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ paramādareṇa annasya sāraṃ bhakṣyabhojyasya sāram // GarP_3,14.11 //
GP12garup3_u:1739: sūpasya sāraṃ paramānnasya sāraṃ dugdhasya sāraṃ dadhitakrasya sāram /
GP12garup3_u:1740: ghṛtasya sāraṃ rāmaṭhasyāpi sāraṃ gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ sarṣapasyāpi sāram // GarP_3,14.12 //
GP12garup3_u:1741: marīcasāraṃ jīrakasyāpi sāraṃ tathā havirghṛtapakvasya sāram /
GP12garup3_u:1742: taileṣu pakvasya ca bharjitasya guḍasya sāraṃ navanītasya sāram // GarP_3,14.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1744: lakṣmīpatiḥ sarvajagannivā sastasyājñayā vāsudevopi nityam // GarP_3,14.14 //
GP12garup3_u:1746: evaṃ vimūḍhā vāsudevasya bhaktāḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ viṣṇubhaktā hi loke // GarP_3,14.15 //
GP12garup3_u:1747: kalyāṇāste sārabhoktāra eva naiṣāṃ bhavettena duḥ khābhivṛddhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1748: bhuñjanti ye vaiśvadevaṃ vihāya duṣṭāṃstānvai bhukticinttāṃśca viddhi // GarP_3,14.16 //
GP12garup3_u:1749: vakṣye viśeṣaṃ vaiśvadeve khagendra gopyaṃ no vadānyatra vidvān /
GP12garup3_u:1750: sūryādīnāṃ ye ca dāne ca dadyurvinā vāyorantarasthaṃ hariṃ ca // GarP_3,14.17 //
GP12garup3_u:1751: te vai sadā sārabhoktāra eva jñeyāstvato viṣṇureko mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:1752: sārāṃśabhoktā na tu sarvasya bhoktā bhunakti sarvaṃ tvaviruddhaśaktiḥ // GarP_3,14.18 //
GP12garup3_u:1753: vakṣye ha sārānpunaranyānkhagendra śṛṇuṣva guhyaṃ paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:1754: drākṣādayaḥ sarva eva tvasārāḥ kālādiduṣṭā bhāvaduṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ // GarP_3,14.19 //
GP12garup3_u:1756: asārāḥ kaluṣā jñeyāstathā jaṃbūphalaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,14.20 //
GP12garup3_u:1761: śuṣkabhūtaṃ nārikelaṃ khajūraṃ tu yathā tathā /
GP12garup3_u:1766: bhakṣyaṃ ca kvathitaṃ vīndra asāraṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,14.25 //
GP12garup3_u:1770: jaṃbīraṃ śṛṅgabere dhātrī karpūraṃ ca cūtakam // GarP_3,14.27 //
GP12garup3_u:1772: parpaṭaḥ pakṣamātreṇa niḥ sāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,14.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1774: ārdrā vāpyathavā śuṣkā sārdrā sāravatī smṛtā // GarP_3,14.29 //
GP12garup3_u:1775: ekādaśyāṃ tu tulasī sārā grāhyā manīṣibhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1776: tvacā nāseṃdriyeṇāpi na tu jihvendriyeṇa ca // GarP_3,14.30 //
GP12garup3_u:1779: ekavāre ca sāraṃ syāddvivāre ca tatodhikam /
GP12garup3_u:1782: ekādaśyāṃ hareḥ sāraṃ kṣīraṃ sarpirmadhūdakam // GarP_3,14.33 //
GP12garup3_u:1784: āṣāḍhamāse garuḍa śāko niḥ sāra ucyate // GarP_3,14.34 //
GP12garup3_u:1785: māsi bhādrapade vīndra hyasāraṃ dadhi cocyate /
GP12garup3_u:1786: kṣīraṃ tu hyāśvine māse niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,14.35 //
GP12garup3_u:1790: harinaivedyahīnastu pāko niḥ sāra ucyate // GarP_3,14.37 //
GP12garup3_u:1792: praharaṃ mallikā sāraṃ jātī tu praharārdhakam // GarP_3,14.38 //
GP12garup3_u:1796: kastūrī daśavarṣaṃ tu karpūraṃ varṣamātrakam // GarP_3,14.40 //
GP12garup3_u:1798: śuddhanniḥ sārabhūtāṃśca vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara // GarP_3,14.41 //
GP12garup3_u:1799: tuṣā medhyā āranālaṃ puṇyakaṃ bhiḥ saṭā tathā /
GP12garup3_u:1802: palāñjurlaśunaṃ vṛntaṃ kalañjaṃ ca tathā dvijā // GarP_3,14.43 //
GP12garup3_u:1803: etatsarvatra kāle ca niḥ sāramiti kīrtitam /
GP12garup3_u:1804: ekādaśyāṃ vaiśvadevaṃ śrāddhaṃ tarpaṇameva ca // GarP_3,14.44 //
GP12garup3_u:1806: havirnārāyaṇo devo etāṃśca hyaśubhānra sān // GarP_3,14.45 //
GP12garup3_u:1807: na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:1808: tathāpi sarvaṃ jānāti jīvānāṃ pāpakarmaṇām // GarP_3,14.46 //
GP12garup3_u:1810: asārabhojanaṃ caiva jīvānāṃ karmajaṃ phalam // GarP_3,14.47 //
GP12garup3_u:1812: śubhāni ca pibedviṣṇuraśubhaṃ no pibedvibhuḥ // GarP_3,14.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1813: ko vadettasya ceṣṭāṃ tu pūrṇānando hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:1814: na tena sadṛśaḥ kopi deśe kāle ca vidyate /
GP12garup3_u:1816: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vaiśvadevārthakasārāsāravastuviveko nāma caturdaśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1819: athāvatā rānpuruṣākhyo hariśca gato dhyānaṃ kartumīśo mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:1820: prādurbabhūvākhilasadguṇārṇavaḥ sa eva viṣṇuḥ sa ca bījabhūtaḥ // GarP_3,15.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1821: yo bījabhūtaḥ puruṣākhya viṣṇuḥ sa evābhūdvāsudevo mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:1822: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ puruṣākhyasya vāyormāyākhyāyāṃ mūlarūpo yathā'sa // GarP_3,15.2 //
GP12garup3_u:1823: yo vāsudevastu sa eva jātaḥ saṃkarṣaṇākhyo khilasadguṇātmā /
GP12garup3_u:1824: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ sūtrabhūtasya vāyorjayākhyāyaṃ pūrṇasaṃvitparātmā // GarP_3,15.3 //
GP12garup3_u:1825: sa evaṃ saṃkarṣaṇanāmadheyaḥ pradyumnanāmā ca sa eva viśrutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1826: sarasvatībhāratīsarjanārthaṃ sa eva devyā mūlarūpo babhūva // GarP_3,15.4 //
GP12garup3_u:1827: sṛṣṭvā yuktaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kalābhirmahattattvaṃ sūkṣmarūpaṃ sa eva /
GP12garup3_u:1828: sāhaṅkāraṃ krīḍayāmāsa devaḥ śṛṇu tvaṃ vai ṣoḍaśākhyāḥ kalāśca // GarP_3,15.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1830: tato babhūva hyaniruddhasaṃjñako jīvāṃśca saṃgṛhya supūrṇaśaktiḥ // GarP_3,15.6 //
GP12garup3_u:1831: soyaṃ viriñcyādisamastadevān sthūlena dehena sasarja nāthaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1832: tathā sa viṣṇuḥ puruṣābhidhastu sanatkumāratvamavāpa vīndra // GarP_3,15.7 //
GP12garup3_u:1833: ananyasādhyaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca kartuṃ daśendriyāṇāṃ śoṣaṇārthaṃ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:1834: sanandanādau paṭhitaḥ kumārastasmānnānyo nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,15.8 //
GP12garup3_u:1835: sa eva viṣṇuḥ sūkaratvaṃ hyavāpa kṣopaṇīmuddhartuṃ daityavapurnihantum /
GP12garup3_u:1836: hiraṇyākṣaṃ sajjanānāṃ khagendra tathā bhūmeḥ sthāpanārthaṃ ca devaḥ // GarP_3,15.9 //
GP12garup3_u:1838: tatrāvatāre pañcarātraṃ samagramupādeṣṭuṃ nāpa dānaṃ svatantraḥ // GarP_3,15.10 //
GP12garup3_u:1839: sa eva viṣṇuḥ samabhūdbradaryāṃ nārāyaṇākhyaḥ śamalāpahaśca /
GP12garup3_u:1840: tapastaptuṃ śikṣayituṃ tvṛṣīṇāṃ tiraskartuṃ hyapsarasāṃ sahasram // GarP_3,15.11 //
GP12garup3_u:1841: tato hariḥ kapilatvaṃ hyavāpya tirohitānkālabalena tattvān /
GP12garup3_u:1844: ānvīkṣikiṃ nāma sutarkavidyāmalarkanāmne pradadāttāṃ mahātmā // GarP_3,15.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1845: sa eva vaṃśepyabhavadraveśca ākūtyāṃ yaḥ saccidānandarūpaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1846: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ yattu manvantaraṃ ca devaiḥ sākaṃ pālayāmāsa vīndra // GarP_3,15.14 //
GP12garup3_u:1847: sa eva viṣṇuḥ sa urukramobhūdāgnīdhraputryāṃ merudevyāṃ ca nābheḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1848: vidyāratānāṃ mānināṃ sarvadaivamatyāścaryaṃ darśayituṃ ca vīndra // GarP_3,15.15 //
GP12garup3_u:1850: pṛṣṭhe dhartuṃ mandaraṃ parvataṃ ca brahmāṇḍaṃ vā dhartumīśo mahātmā // GarP_3,15.16 //
GP12garup3_u:1852: apathyadoṣānparihartumeva haste gṛhītvā pūrṇakubhaṃ sudhābhiḥ // GarP_3,15.17 //
GP12garup3_u:1853: tato harirjagṛhe śrīvapuśca yanmohinīti pravadanti loke /
GP12garup3_u:1854: udvṛttānāṃ ditijānāṃ mahātmā samyakteṣāṃ vañcayituṃ harirbalam // GarP_3,15.18 //
GP12garup3_u:1856: daityo hiraṇyakaśipuśca tathorudeśe saṃsthāpitaḥ karajairdāritaśca // GarP_3,15.19 //
GP12garup3_u:1858: indrāyedaṃ dātukāmaḥ khagendra tadarthaṃ vai pāvituṃ sovituṃ ca // GarP_3,15.20 //
GP12garup3_u:1859: tato harirjamadagneḥ sutobhūlloke sarve parśurāmaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:1860: brahmadviṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vīndra bhūmiṃ niḥ kṣatrāṃ kartukāmo maheśaḥ // GarP_3,15.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1863: tato harī raghuvaṃśevatīrṇaḥ kausalyāyāṃ rāghavaḥ sūryavaṃśe /
GP12garup3_u:1864: samudrādorvigrahaṃ kartumīśo haṃ tuṃ bhūmyāṃ rāvaṇādīṃśca vīndra // GarP_3,15.23 //
GP12garup3_u:1865: tato harirvyāsarūpī babhūva aṣṭāviṃśe dvapare jñānarūpī /
GP12garup3_u:1866: parāśarātsatyavatyāṃ mahātmā svayaṃ vedān saṃvibhaktuṃ ca devaḥ // GarP_3,15.24 //
GP12garup3_u:1867: tato hariḥ kṛṣṇarūpī babhūva devakyāṃ vai vasudevātsa viṣṇuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1868: kaṃsādīnvai nitarāṃ hantukāmaḥ samyakpātuṃ pāṇḍavāṃścāpi vīndra // GarP_3,15.25 //
GP12garup3_u:1869: tataḥ kalau saṃpravṛtte haristu saṃmohanārthaṃ cāsurāṇāṃ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:1870: nāmnā buddho kīkaṭeṣu prajāto vedapramāṇaṃ nirākartumeva // GarP_3,15.26 //
GP12garup3_u:1871: tato hariḥ kalkisaṃjñaśca vīndra utpatsyate yugayormadhyasaṃdhau /
GP12garup3_u:1872: dasyuprāyānbhūmipānvai nihantuṃ nāmnā harirviṣṇuguptasya gehe // GarP_3,15.27 //
GP12garup3_u:1874: viśvādaya sahasraṃ ca parādyā amitāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,15.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1876: svayaṃ nārāyaṇāste te nāṇumātraṃ vibhidyate // GarP_3,15.29 //
GP12garup3_u:1879: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe viṣṇoravatāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1883: śṛṇu samyaṅ mahābhāga tajjñānasya vinirṇayam // GarP_3,16.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1884: īśādanyasya jagato hyātmo locana eva tu /
GP12garup3_u:1889: puṃso hibhāryā prakṛtiḥ prakṛteścā bhimāninī // GarP_3,16.4 //
GP12garup3_u:1890: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ guṇānvīndra puruṣeṇa saha prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1891: tamaḥ pānaṃ tathā kartuṃ prakṛtyākhyā tadābhavat // GarP_3,16.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1892: vāsudevasya bhāryā tu māyā nāmnī prakīrtitā /
GP12garup3_u:1893: saṃkarṣaṇasya bhāryā tu jayeti parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.6 //
GP12garup3_u:1894: aniruddhasya bhāryā tu śāntā nāmnīti kīrtitā /
GP12garup3_u:1895: kṛtiḥ pradyumnabhāryāpiṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ babhūvaha // GarP_3,16.7 //
GP12garup3_u:1899: rajobhimānibhūdevī bhāryā sā sūkarasya ca // GarP_3,16.9 //
GP12garup3_u:1901: nārāyaṇasya bhāryā tu lakṣmīrūpā tvajā smṛtā // GarP_3,16.10 //
GP12garup3_u:1904: videhaputrī sītā tu rāmabhāryā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.12 //
GP12garup3_u:1909: atha brahmā ca vāyuśca śriyaḥ koṭiguṇādhamau /
GP12garup3_u:1910: vakṣye ca brahmaṇo rūpaṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama // GarP_3,16.15 //
GP12garup3_u:1912: sa eva puruṣonāma viriñca iti kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.16 //
GP12garup3_u:1916: vidhisaṃjño viriñcaḥ sa jñātavyaḥ pakṣisattama // GarP_3,16.18 //
