GP12garup3_u:1921: saṃkarṣaṇācca garuḍa jayāyāṃ yo vabhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:1922: sa vāyuḥ prathamo jñeyo pradhāna iti kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.21 //

GP12garup3_u:1927: yato hṛdi sthito vāyustato vai dhṛtisaṃjñakaḥ /

GP12garup3_u:1931: sadā smarati vai vīndra atosau smṛtisaṃjñakaḥ /

GP12garup3_u:1936: viṣṇau bhaktiṃ vardhyati bhaktānāṃ hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_3,16.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1940: prabhuḥ prabhūṇāṃ garuḍa sodarāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,16.30 //
GP12garup3_u:1942: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛhi sthitvā balaṃ paśyati sattama // GarP_3,16.31 //

GP12garup3_u:1947: vakratvaṃ nāsti yogasya ṛjuryogya iti smṛtaḥ /

GP12garup3_u:1956: mokṣādhikāriṇaḥ sarve kurvate kasya pūjanam // GarP_3,16.38 //
GP12garup3_u:1960: jñānaṃ ca viparītaṃ syāttena yātyadharaṃ tamaḥ // GarP_3,16.40 //
GP12garup3_u:1964: śive sūrye paṇmukhe ca viṣṇubuddhiḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,16.42 //
GP12garup3_u:1966: śilādyeṣu ca sarveṣu aikyenava vicintanam // GarP_3,16.43 //
GP12garup3_u:1970: anyeṣāṃ sarvadā nāsti ato na ṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,16.45 //
GP12garup3_u:1972: mokṣādhikāriṇāṃ kāle ataḥ prajñeti kathyate // GarP_3,16.46 //
GP12garup3_u:1974: ato vāyuḥ sadā vīndra jñānamityeva kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.47 //
GP12garup3_u:1976: tataśca gurusaṃjñāṃ cāpyavāpa sa ca mārutaḥ // GarP_3,16.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1977: yogināṃ hṛdaye sthitvā sadhyāyati hariṃ param /

GP12garup3_u:1981: ato vai vijñanāmāsau prokto hi khagasattama /

GP12garup3_u:1983: athavāyogināṃ nityaṃ hṛdi sthitvā sa mārutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1984: vairāgyaṃ saṃjanayati virāga iti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.52 //
GP12garup3_u:1986: tatsukhaṃ tūttareṣāṃ ca vāyuparyantameva ca // GarP_3,16.53 //
GP12garup3_u:1987: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca uttamānāṃ nṛṇāṃ tathā /

GP12garup3_u:1990: duḥ khaśokādikaṃ kiñciddevānāṃ bhavati prabho // GarP_3,16.55 //
GP12garup3_u:1993: yataḥ kaliścādhikaḥ syādato duḥ khīti sa smṛtaḥ /

GP12garup3_u:1998: devāveśo bhavettasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,16.59 //

GP12garup3_u:2005: ataḥ kaliḥ sadā duḥ khī sukhī vāyustu sarvadā /

GP12garup3_u:2008: kaṣṭabhaṅgaḥ kalilayo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,16.64 //
GP12garup3_u:2010: praviṣṭāḥ saṃti lokeṣu pṛthaksaṃti khageśvara // GarP_3,16.65 //
GP12garup3_u:2015: ato rocananāmāsau marudaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ rāmāvatāre hanumānrāmakāryārthasādhakaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2016: sa eva bhīmasenastu jāto bhūmyāṃ mahābalaḥ // GarP_3,16.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2019: sarveṣāṃ saṃkaraṃ yastu kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,16.70 //

GP12garup3_u:2024: ataḥ sa prajñayā pūrṇo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /

GP12garup3_u:2031: nāsti nāstyeva pakṣīndra yato nāstyaśubhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_3,16.76 //

GP12garup3_u:2044: caturmukhasya bhāryā tu kīrtitā sā sarasvatī // GarP_3,16.82 //

GP12garup3_u:2133: śivanāmno dvijasyaiva gṛhe sā tu kumārikā /

GP12garup3_u:2234: īśānakoṇe saṃsthito yastu rudro hyavāpa vai vāmadeveti saṃjñām /

GP12garup3_u:2262: āsaktatā putradārādikānāṃ samyak śaktistavane nāsti viṣṇoḥ /

GP12garup3_u:2283: anarpitaṃ tava devasya viṣṇorbhuktaṃ mayā bahuvāraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,18.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2284: pādāravinde nārpitaṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā kena puṇyena deva /
GP12garup3_u:2285: bhuktvābhuktvā harinairavedyajātaṃ sukhaṃ tvadīyaṃ ramayā lālitaṃ ca // GarP_3,18.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2286: dyubhvāśrayaṃ tava mūrdhānamāhuḥ kirīṭayuktaṃ kuṭilaiḥ kuntalaiśca /
GP12garup3_u:2289: evaṃ subhaktyā ca ruroda rudro dṛṣṭvā hariṃ survaguṇaiḥ saṃpūrṇam // GarP_3,18.50 //
GP12garup3_u:2291: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā dayayā vāsudeva drakṣye kathaṃ punaritthaṃ ruroda // GarP_3,18.51 //
GP12garup3_u:2292: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tvarivale bhavināśiśaṅkhacakrādikaistrijagatāpi ca deva pūrṇam /
GP12garup3_u:2293: etādṛśaṃ tvadudaraṃ ca kathaṃ rameśa drakṣye punaḥ punarahaṃ tviti saṃruroda // GarP_3,18.52 //
GP12garup3_u:2294: ānandapūrṇa nakhapūrṇa sukeśapūrṇa lomādipūrṇa guṇapūrṇa sughoṇapūrṇa /
GP12garup3_u:2295: vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ tava vibhostu viśālabhūtaṃ sadbhūṣaṇaṃ vimalakaustubhaśobhi lakṣmyā // GarP_3,18.53 //
GP12garup3_u:2296: sukomalaṃ śrītulasyāstathaiva supuṣpitaṃ canda naiścarcitaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2297: etādṛśaṃ tava vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tava kāruṇyadṛṣṭyā // GarP_3,18.54 //
GP12garup3_u:2298: punaḥ punardarśanaṃ me kathaṃ syādevaṃ rudraḥ sa ca bhaktyā ruroda /
GP12garup3_u:2299: atastūrurnāma saṃprāpya rudrastatputrobhūddaurvasaṃjñaḥ sa eva // GarP_3,18.55 //
GP12garup3_u:2300: yasmādrudaṃ corvaritaṃ vai cakāra tasmātsa rudrastvaurvasaṃjño babhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2301: aurvastu lokānmokṣayogyāṃśca dṛṣṭvā hyatyantaṃ vai viṣayeṣveva niṣṭhān // GarP_3,18.56 //
GP12garup3_u:2302: stūddaiva caurvo viṣṇupādāravidaṃ smṛtvāsmṛtvā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2303: te pāpiṣṭhāḥ pāparūpānbhajanto dinedine durviṣayānkadindriyaiḥ // GarP_3,18.57 //
GP12garup3_u:2304: kadā caitānheyabuddhyā vimuñce na jānehaṃ ceti samyag ruroda /
GP12garup3_u:2305: ete hi mūrkhā viṣayānarthalabdhyai kurvanti yatnaṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,18.58 //
GP12garup3_u:2306: kadindriyārthaṃ hi dhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti ca sarve viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2308: smṛtvāsmṛtvā vāsudevasya māyāṃ ruroda caurvo bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2309: atīva kaṣṭena ca lokavṛttyā śritā dainyaṃ svīyakāryaṃ vihāya // GarP_3,18.60 //
GP12garup3_u:2310: atīva dainyena dhanādikaṃ ca saṃpādya sarve 'pi supāpaśīlāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2311: kaṣṭārjitaṃ dravyadhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti sarve paśavo vyarthameva // GarP_3,18.61 //
GP12garup3_u:2312: satpātrabhūte viṣṇubuddhyā kadāpi tyajanti naite māyayā vai murāreḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2313: eṣāmāyurvyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ kathaṃ naṣṭā iti samyagruroda // GarP_3,18.62 //
GP12garup3_u:2314: eṣāmāyurvyarthamevaṃ gataṃ ca eṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā yauvanaṃ tu dhruvaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2315: skandhasthamṛtyurhasate kṛṣṇa viṣṇo taṃ vai na jānanti vimūḍhacetasaḥ // GarP_3,18.63 //
GP12garup3_u:2316: gṛhaṃ madīyaṃ śatavarṣaṃ ca jīvetputrā madīyā śavatavarṣaṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2317: ahaṃ ca jīve śatavarṣaṃ sukhena madīyabhāryāpi sulakṣaṇā'ste // GarP_3,18.64 //
GP12garup3_u:2318: gāvaśca me saṃti sadugdhapūrṇā mitrāṇi me saṃti mudā hi yuktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2319: dāsye sutaṃ vāraṇārthaṃ tu vadhvai putrīṃ vivāhārthamahaṃ dadāmi // GarP_3,18.65 //
GP12garup3_u:2320: dāsye cāhaṃ satsu putrīṃ dhanaṃ vā dāsye cāhaṃ dhanikeṣveva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2321: adṛṣṭaśūnyān bhagavānvāsudevo dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā hasate sarvadaiva // GarP_3,18.66 //
GP12garup3_u:2322: nāhaṃ kariṣye śravaṇaṃ kathāyā madbhāgyanā śaśca bhaviṣyatīti /
GP12garup3_u:2323: nāhaṃ hariṃ pūjayiṣye sadaiva putrādināśaśca bhaviṣyatīti // GarP_3,18.67 //
GP12garup3_u:2325: etādṛśānmūrkhajanāṃśca dṛṣṭvā ruroda caurvo vāsudevaikaniṣṭhaḥ // GarP_3,18.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2326: atastvaurvo rudrarūpī khagendra jānīhi nityaṃ kṛṣṇasuśikṣitārthaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2327: yadā satī dakṣaputrī khagendra dakṣādhvare svaśarīraṃ visṛjya // GarP_3,18.69 //
GP12garup3_u:2329: ūrdhvaretā bhavetyuktvā ūrdhvaretā babhūva ha // GarP_3,18.70 //
GP12garup3_u:2330: pāṇigrāhaṃ rudradevo mahātmā yadā himādreḥ kanyakāyāścakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2331: tasyāṃ paraṃ laṃpaṭaḥ saṃbabhūva ato rudraḥ parasaṃjñāmavāpa // GarP_3,18.71 //
GP12garup3_u:2333: samā ete mokṣakāle sṛtau ca śatairguṇairnyūnabhūtāśca tābhyām // GarP_3,18.72 //
GP12garup3_u:2336: nirṇetuṃ jñānināṃ yadvajjñāpanārthaṃ tathā mama // GarP_3,18.73 //
GP12garup3_u:2337: brūhi śiṣyāya dayayā uddhartuṃ māṃ ca sarvadā /
GP12garup3_u:2338: pūrṇakāmasya te kṛṣṇa kā spṛhā vidyate prabho // GarP_3,18.74 //
GP12garup3_u:2340: uvāca kṛpayā kṛṣṇaḥ prasannaḥ kamalekṣaṇaḥ // GarP_3,18.75 //
GP12garup3_u:2342: gāyatryāśca śatānanda ekānandastu vedhasaḥ etādṛśaḥ śatānando brahmaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,18.76 //
GP12garup3_u:2345: evaṃ tu nirṇayo jñeya ānandasya sadā khaga /
GP12garup3_u:2347: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe rudrarodanahetvānanantānandatāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2351: brahmāṇī bhāratī cobhe adhike devasattama // GarP_3,19.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2355: sarveṣāṃ caiva pūrveṣāmavekṣyaiva hare vibho // GarP_3,19.3 //
GP12garup3_u:2358: nirṇayaṃ brṛhi govinda sarvajñosi na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2366: yathānande tathā jñāne viṣṇau bhaktau balādhike // GarP_3,19.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2367: sarve guṇaiḥ śataguṇāḥ krameṇoktā nu te 'khilāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2368: bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ sukhaṃ bhaktibalādhike // GarP_3,19.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2370: evaṃ jñānaṃ śataṃ jñeyaṃ mārute nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,19.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2371: bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ balaṃ ca samudāhṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:2372: evameva ca vāyośca jñānaṃ caivamiti sphuṭam // GarP_3,19.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2376: ānandatāratamyaṃ ca yathoktaṃ tu mayā tava // GarP_3,19.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2377: tathaiva jānīhi khaga nānyathā tu kathañcana /
GP12garup3_u:2378: ahaṃ vijānāmi mayi sthitān guṇānsarvairviśeṣaiśca khagendra saṃyutān // GarP_3,19.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2379: susūkṣmarūpāṃśca sadā khagendra mayāpyadṛṣṭo nāsti nāstyeva kaścit // GarP_3,19.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2380: sarvāvatāreṣvapi vidyamānaṃ hariṃ vijānāti ramāpi devī // GarP_3,19.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2382: susūkṣmarūpānsā vijānāti devī brahmādibhyo matprasādādhikaṃ ca // GarP_3,19.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2383: svātmasvarūpaṃ pravijānāti devī susūkṣmarūpaṃ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam /
GP12garup3_u:2384: svānyaṃ prapañcaṃ pravijānāti lakṣmīstathāpyaśeṣaiḥ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam // GarP_3,19.18 //
GP12garup3_u:2386: śrotraṃ na jānāti harerguṇāṃśca susūkṣmarūpāṃśca viśeṣasaṃyutān // GarP_3,19.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2387: spaṣṭasvarūpeṇa yathā viduḥ surā muktvā brahmāṇaṃ na tathā tepyamuktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2388: svātmānamanyacca sadā viśeṣaryuktaṃ vijānāti vidhiśca mārutaḥ // GarP_3,19.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2389: vāṇī vijānāti harerguṇāṃśca svayaṃbhuvo naiva tāvadviśeṣān /
GP12garup3_u:2390: traiguṇyarūpātparataḥ sadaiva paśyedviṣṇuṃ kṛṣṇarūpaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,19.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2391: śeṣo rudro vīndra etaiśca sarve tamo mātre pravijānanti saṃstham /
GP12garup3_u:2392: vāṇīdṛṣṭānsaviśeṣān guṇāṃste jānanti no satyamevoktamaṅga // GarP_3,19.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2393: umā suparṇā vāruṇī ceti tisraḥ sahaiva taḥ pravijānanti sustham /
GP12garup3_u:2394: harerviśeṣānarudra dṛṣṭānkhagendra jānanti naitāḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle // GarP_3,19.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2395: indrādayaḥ pravijānanti vīndra ahaṅkāre vyāptarūpaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2396: dakṣādyā vai buddhitattve sthitaṃ taṃ jānanti te somasūryādayaśca // GarP_3,19.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2397: viṣṇuṃ hariṃ bhūtatattve sthitaṃ ca ye cānye ca pravijānanti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2398: anye ca paśyanti yathā svayogyamaṇḍāntarasthaṃ harirūpaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,19.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2399: kecitprapaśyanti hareśca rūpaṃ tvadīyahṛtsthaṃ hṛdi kecitsadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2400: evaṃprakāraṃ pravijānīhi vīndra hyatho śṛṇu tvaṃmama bhāryāḥ ṣaḍetāḥ // GarP_3,19.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2401: rukmiṇyādyāḥ ṣaṇmahiṣyo mamaśrīrnīlā ca yā mama bhāryā khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2402: sarge pūrvasminhavyavāhasya putrī tāstā bhaje sadya evā viśeṣāt // GarP_3,19.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2403: kanyaiva sā kṛṣṇapatnī ca kāmāṃstāṃstān bhajenmanasā cintitāṃśca /
GP12garup3_u:2404: atīva yatnaṃ kavyavāhaṃ khagendra pitṛṣvekaḥ sarvadā vai cakāra // GarP_3,19.28 //
GP12garup3_u:2405: tathaiva sā naiva bhartāramāpa yatastu sā kṛṣṇaniṣṭhaikacittā // GarP_3,19.29 //
GP12garup3_u:2406: tadābravītkavyavāhaśca putrariṃ patiṃ kimarthaṃ necchasi mūḍhabuddhe /
GP12garup3_u:2407: tadābravītkavyavāhaṃ ca puttrī hariṃ vinā sarvaguṇopapanne /
GP12garup3_u:2408: janmanyasmin bhartṛtā nāsti deva yato bhartā hariravaika eva // GarP_3,19.30 //
GP12garup3_u:2409: yato loke sustriyaḥ sarva eva saṃdā jñeyā vidhavāste hi nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2410: anādi nityaṃ bhuvanaikasāraṃ susuṃdaraṃ mokṣadaṃ kāmadaṃ ca // GarP_3,19.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2411: etādṛśaṃ na vijānanti yāstu sarvāstā vai vidhavāḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2412: nimittabhūtaṃ bhartṛrūpaṃ ca jīvaṃ daivopetaṃ haribhaktyā vihīnam // GarP_3,19.32 //
GP12garup3_u:2413: sukaśmalaṃ navarandhraiḥ stravantaṃ durgandhayuktaṃ sarvadā kutsitaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2414: etāḥ dṛśe bhartṛjīve nu tāta prayojanaṃ nāsti kṛṣṇaṃ vihāya // GarP_3,19.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2415: devastriyo nijabhartṝnvihāyu tatra sthitaṃ prīṇayantyeva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2416: ataśca tāḥ sadhavāḥ sarvadaiva lokairvandyā nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,19.34 //
GP12garup3_u:2417: bhartāste haribhaktā yadi syurāsāṃ strīṇāṃ janmasāphalyameva /
GP12garup3_u:2419: yadbhartāro haribhaktā na saṃti tābhistyājyaṃ svīyagātraṃ bhṛśaṃ hi /
GP12garup3_u:2420: svabhartṛtaṃ kṛṣṇarūpaṃ hariṃ ca smṛtvā samyag yadi gātraṃ tyajeyuḥ // GarP_3,19.36 //
GP12garup3_u:2421: tadā naiva hyātmahatyādidoṣāḥ strīṇāmevaṃ nirṇayoyaṃ hi śāstre /
GP12garup3_u:2422: yadbhartāro na vijānanti viṣṇuṃ tāsāṃ saṃgo naiva kāryaḥ kadāpi // GarP_3,19.37 //
GP12garup3_u:2424: kalau yuge durlabhā viṣṇubhaktā harebhaktirdurlabhā sarvadaiva // GarP_3,19.38 //
GP12garup3_u:2425: hareḥ kathā durlabhā martyaloke harerdīkṣā durlabhā durlabhā ca /
GP12garup3_u:2426: harestattve nirṇayo durlabho hi harerdāsaiḥ saṃgamo durlabhaśca // GarP_3,19.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2427: pradakṣiṇaṃ durlabhaṃ vai murārernamaskāro durlabho vai kalau ca /
GP12garup3_u:2428: tadbhaktānāṃ pālanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ durlabhaṃ hyannadānam // GarP_3,19.40 //
GP12garup3_u:2429: tantroktapūjā durlabhā vai murārernāmagraho durlabhaścava viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2430: suvaiṣṇavānāṃ pujanaṃ durlabhaṃ hi sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ durlabhaṃ ca // GarP_3,19.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2431: śālagrāmasparśanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ darśanaṃ durlabhaṃ hi /
GP12garup3_u:2432: gosparśanaṃ durlabhaṃ martyaloke sadgāyanaṃ durlabhaṃ sadguruñca // GarP_3,19.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2433: sadbhāryāḥ satputrakā durlabhā hi śeṣācalasthasya hareśca darśanam /
GP12garup3_u:2434: sudurlabhaṃ raṅganāthasya tīre kāveryā vai darśanaṃ viṣṇupadyāḥ // GarP_3,19.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2435: kāñcīkṣetre varadarājasya sevā sudurlabhā darśanaṃ caiva loke /
GP12garup3_u:2436: sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ rāmasetoḥ sudurlabhā madhvaśāstre ca śaktiḥ // GarP_3,19.44 //
GP12garup3_u:2437: bhīmātīre saṃsthitasyāpi viṣṇoḥ sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2438: revātīre saṃsthitasyāpi viṣṇorgayākṣetre viṣṇupādasya caiva // GarP_3,19.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2439: tathā badrau saṃsthita syāpi viṣṇoḥ sudurlabhaṃ martyaloke sthitānām /
GP12garup3_u:2440: śeṣācale śrīnivāsāśrame ca tapasvino durlabhā martyaloke // GarP_3,19.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2441: prayāgākhye mādhavasyāpi nityaṃ sudarśanaṃ durlabhaṃ vai nṛṇāṃ hi // GarP_3,19.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2443: evamuktvā sā pitaraṃ yayau śeṣācalaṃ prati // GarP_3,19.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2445: tatrasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā natvā mahāsatī // GarP_3,19.49 //
GP12garup3_u:2449: gartabhūte ca ekānte cacāra tapa uttamam // GarP_3,19.51 //
GP12garup3_u:2453: tvameva mātā ca pitā tvameva bhartā ca sakhātvameva /
GP12garup3_u:2454: tvameva putraśca gururgarīyānmitraṃ svasā tvaṃ mama vallabhaśca // GarP_3,19.53 //
GP12garup3_u:2455: anādyananteṣvapi janmasu prabho vicāryamāṇā na vijānepyahaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2456: etai hi sarve ca nimittamātrataḥ pitrādayastvaṃ hyanimittamātrataḥ // GarP_3,19.54 //
GP12garup3_u:2457: ato murāreśca tavaiva bhāryā bhūyāsamityeva tadā vrataṃ me /
GP12garup3_u:2458: duḥ saṃgamātrādisamāgamaṃ na saṃsiddhirityeva vadānyamūrte // GarP_3,19.55 //
GP12garup3_u:2459: tvaddūṣakāṇāṃ tava dāsavarya vidūṣakāṇāṃ darśanaṃ chindhi deva /
GP12garup3_u:2460: gurudruhāṃ darśanaṃ chindhi viṣṇo bhaktadruhāṃ mitratāṃ chindhi kṛṣṇa // GarP_3,19.56 //
GP12garup3_u:2461: tava dhrugbhirbhāṣaṇaṃ chindhi deva tvaṃ saṃgamaṃ dehi padāravinde /
GP12garup3_u:2462: śrīśailavāsāya namonamaste namonamaḥ śrīnivāsāya tubhyam // GarP_3,19.57 //
GP12garup3_u:2463: svāmin parāvara rameśa nidānamūrte kālo mahānapi gataśca nidarśanante /
GP12garup3_u:2465: kathaṃ mama syāttava darśanaṃ prabho sarvaiśca doṣaiśca susaṃgatāyāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2466: dāsyāspadāyāstava dāsadāsyāḥ prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa // GarP_3,19.59 //
GP12garup3_u:2470: hariṇodīritaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā prāha smitānanā // GarP_3,19.61 //
GP12garup3_u:2472: ahaṃ hi bhāryā bhūyāsaṃ tava mādhava suṃdara // GarP_3,19.62 //
GP12garup3_u:2475: ahaṃ kumāri subhage kṛṣṇajanmani bhūtale // GarP_3,19.63 //
GP12garup3_u:2476: bhavāmi tava bhartāhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup3_u:2477: evamuktā sutā kanyā puraṇyarāśiṃ hariṃ param // GarP_3,19.64 //
GP12garup3_u:2487: dehaṃ tatraiva saṃtyajya kumārī caiva putrikā // GarP_3,19.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2488: kumbha kasya gṛhe jātā nīlā nāmnā tu sā smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:2490: kalpavāhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ prathamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2494: tato nāgnijito rājño gṛhe jātā kumārikā // GarP_3,19.71 //
GP12garup3_u:2498: baddhvā vṛṣānnṛpāñjitvā prāptā nīlā mahākhaga // GarP_3,19.73 //
GP12garup3_u:2499: kuṃbhakasya sutā nīlā dehasthāḥ prāviśan bhṛśam /
GP12garup3_u:2501: bhūmau dvidhā saṃprajātā kumāryeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2503: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe nīlāvivāhanirṇayo nāmaikonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2506: yā pūrvasarge nalasaṃjñasya vīndra putrī bhūtvā viṣṇupatnī sakāmā /
GP12garup3_u:2507: pradakṣiṇaṃ bhramaṇaṃ vai cakāra guṇena bhadrā bhadrasaṃjñā babhūva // GarP_3,20.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2508: kanyābhāve saṃsthitāṃ bhadrasaṃjñāṃ pitā nalastvabravīttāṃ sa paśyan /
GP12garup3_u:2509: bhadre kimarthaṃ gātrapīḍāṃ karoṣi phalaṃ hi tannandini me vadasva // GarP_3,20.2 //
GP12garup3_u:2511: śṛṇutvaṃ me tāta namaskriyādeḥ phalaṃ vaktuṃ kā samarthā bhavecca // GarP_3,20.3 //
GP12garup3_u:2512: tathāpyahaṃ tava vakṣyāmi tāta yathāśaktyā śṛṇu samyagghitāya /
GP12garup3_u:2513: sadā harimarma nātho dayālurahaṃ harestava dāsānudāsī /
GP12garup3_u:2514: māṃ pāhi viṣṇostava vande pade ityuktvā praṇāmaṃ cākaroddaṇḍarūpam // GarP_3,20.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2515: hareḥ praṇāmaṃ tviti kartavyaśūnyaṃ vyarthaṃ tamāhurjñāninastacchṛṇu tvam /
GP12garup3_u:2517: yathā prasanno vandanāddevaddeva stathā na tuṣṭaḥ pūjanātkarmataśca /
GP12garup3_u:2518: yathā nāmasmaraṇādvandanādvā pāpānniyacchetu tathā na cānyaiḥ // GarP_3,20.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2519: dehaṃ tu ye poṣayantyeva tāta hareḥ praṇāmaiḥ śūnyabhūtaṃ ca puṣṭam /
GP12garup3_u:2520: tadevamāhurvyarthameveti tāta tatpoṣakāṇāṃ narake duḥ khamāhuḥ // GarP_3,20.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2521: yamo 'pi taṃ tatra ulūkhale tu nidhāya piṣṭaṃ sukhalaiḥ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:2522: yo vā paraṃ na karotyeva tāta pradakṣiṇaṃ devadevasya viṣṇoḥ // GarP_3,20.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2523: tasyaiva pādau talayantre nidhāya yamaśca nityaṃ prakaroti piṣṭam /
GP12garup3_u:2524: eṣāṃ jihvā harikṛṣṇeti nāma na vakti nityaṃ vyarthabhūtāṃ vadanti // GarP_3,20.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2525: teṣāṃ jihvā yamaloke yamastu niṣkāsya piṣṭaṃ prakaroti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2526: kāśīnivāsena ca kiṃ prayojanaṃ kiṃ vā prayāge maraṇena tāta // GarP_3,20.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2527: kiṃ vāraṇāgre maraṇena saukhyaṃ kiṃ vā makhādeḥ samanuṣṭhitena /
GP12garup3_u:2529: yeṣāṃ jihvāgre harināmaiva nāsti yeṣāṃ gātrairnamanaṃ nāpi viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2530: yeṣāṃ padbhyāṃ nāsti hareḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ teṣāṃ sarvaṃ vyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,20.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2532: ato viṣṇornamanaṃ kāryameva harernāmasmaraṇaṃ tāta kāryam // GarP_3,20.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2533: janma hyetaddurlabhaṃ naśvaraṃ tu yathā jalasthaṃ tattathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2534: no visvāsaṃ kuru gātre tvadīye jīveṣvapi svaḥ paraśceti tāta // GarP_3,20.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2535: sadyaḥ kṛtaṃ namanaṃ na tvadīyaṃ sadyaḥ kṛtaṃ smaraṇaṃ na tvadīyam /
GP12garup3_u:2536: kadā prāpsye maraṇaṃ tanna jāne na viśvāsaṃ kuru gātre mahātman // GarP_3,20.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2539: sāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ cakre namaskāraṃ sadā hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2540: evaṃ bahudinaṃ kṛtvā dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ param // GarP_3,20.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2548: sāvadhānamanā bhūtvā śṛṇu pakṣīndra sattama // GarP_3,20.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2551: mitraṃ hariṃ prāptukāmā sadaika tatropāyaṃ cintayāmāsadevī // GarP_3,20.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2552: hariprāptau sādhanāḥ saṃti teṣu mukhyaṃ kaciccintayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2553: teṣāṃ madhye śravaṇaṃ śreṣṭhamāhuḥ purāṇānāṃ sāttvikānāṃ sadāpi // GarP_3,20.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2554: viṣṇorutkarṣo vartate yatra vāyostathotkarṣaḥ sajjanānāṃ purāṇe /
GP12garup3_u:2555: śrāddhaṃ sadā viṣṇubuddhyā sadaiva nānyacchrāvyaṃ sādhanaṃ tatra caiva // GarP_3,20.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2556: yasmindine śravaṇaṃ nāsti viṣṇosteṣāṃ janma vyarthamāhuḥ kathāyām /
GP12garup3_u:2557: snāna japaḥ pañcayajñaṃ vrataṃ ca iṣṭāpūrte kṛcchracāndro ca dattam // GarP_3,20.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2558: sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca dīkṣā kathāṃ vinā samyaganuṣṭhitāṃ vai /
GP12garup3_u:2559: yairna śrutaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ sasaṃpradāyairgurubhiḥ saṃyutaiśca // GarP_3,20.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2560: yairna śrutaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ yairna śrutaṃ brahmakāṇḍaṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:2561: teṣāṃ janma vyarthamāhurmamahāntastasmācchrāvyā harivārtā sadaiva // GarP_3,20.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2562: na yatra govindakathāmahānadī na yatra nārāyaṇapādasaṃśrayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2563: na yatra viṣṇoḥ satataṃ vacosti na saṃvasettatkṣaṇamātraṃ kathañcit // GarP_3,20.28 //
GP12garup3_u:2564: yasmin grāme bhāgavataṃ na śāstraṃ na vartate bhāgavatā rasajñāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2565: yasmin gṛhe nāsti gītārthasāraḥ yasmin grāme nāma sahasrakaṃ vā // GarP_3,20.29 //
GP12garup3_u:2566: tayo rasajñā yatra na santi tatra na saṃvasetkṣaṇamātraṃ kathañcit /
GP12garup3_u:2567: yasmin dine divyakathā ca viṣṇorna vāsti jantostasya cāyurvṛthaiva // GarP_3,20.30 //
GP12garup3_u:2568: garbhe gate nātra vicāryamasti tanmanyate durlabhaṃ martyaloke /
GP12garup3_u:2569: karṇaṃ kalpairbhūṣitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca na suṃdaraṃ cāhurāryā rasajñāḥ // GarP_3,20.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2570: viṣṇoḥ kathākhyābharaṇaiśca yuktaṃ tadeva karṇaṃ suṃdaraṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2571: tasmātsadā bhāgavatārthasāraṃ śṛṇvanti ye satataṃ vācayanti // GarP_3,20.32 //
GP12garup3_u:2572: teṣāṃ janma svasthamāhurmahānto mahatphalaṃ cāsti tathaiva teṣām /
GP12garup3_u:2573: soṣṇīṣakañcukayutāśca hareḥ kathāṃ vai śṛṇvanti yepi ca paṭhanti sadaiva martyāḥ // GarP_3,20.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2574: sarvepi te pūjanīyā hi loke na vai śiśre codare caiva saktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2575: ye dākṣiṇyādarthalobhādvadanti sadā purāṇaṃ bhagavattattvasāram // GarP_3,20.34 //
GP12garup3_u:2576: pracchādayante tattvagopyāni ye tu teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2577: ye dharmakāṇḍe karmakāṇḍe sadaiva utpādayante suruciṃ tatra nityam // GarP_3,20.35 //
GP12garup3_u:2578: maulyena ye kathayeyuḥ purāṇaṃ teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūrya sunaḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2579: maulyena ye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ śṛṇvanti vai hariśāstrārthatattvam // GarP_3,20.36 //
GP12garup3_u:2580: maulyena vedādhyayanaṃ prakurvate teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2581: yadṛcchayā prāptadhanena ye tu saṃtuṣṭāste hyatra yogyāḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,20.37 //
GP12garup3_u:2582: dhanārjane ye tvatitṛṣṇābhiyuktāsteṣāṃ na vai bhāgavatedhikāraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2583: matvā loke harirevati nityamantaryāmī nāsti tadanya īśaḥ // GarP_3,20.38 //
GP12garup3_u:2584: evaṃ sadā ye pravicintayanti yogakṣemaṃ bibhṛyādviṣṇureṣām /
GP12garup3_u:2585: sadvaiṣṇavānāmaśubhaṃ nāsti nāsti pradṛśyate saṃśayajñānarūpāt // GarP_3,20.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2587: atastadarthaṃ naiva yatnaṃ ca kuryāddhanārthaṃ vai haritattve ca kuryāt // GarP_3,20.40 //
GP12garup3_u:2588: ataḥ snātvā divyamantraṃ japitvā visarjayitvā viṣṇunirmālyagandham /
GP12garup3_u:2589: śucirbhūtvā bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ saṃśrāvayetsarvavettāpi nityam // GarP_3,20.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2590: karmānusāreṇa dhanārjanaṃ ca vedārjanaṃ śāstrasamārjanaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2591: bhaviṣyati śravaṇaṃ cāpi viṣṇoratyādarācchravaṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca // GarP_3,20.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2593: āsvādya tadbhāgavataṃ purāṇamānandabāṣpairyuktatā durghaṭā ca // GarP_3,20.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2594: śrutvā tattvā nāṃ nirṇayaṃ dhāraṇaṃ ca sudurghaṭaṃ cāhurāryāḥ samastam /
GP12garup3_u:2595: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānantaraṃ ca kāmakrudhorjāraṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca // GarP_3,20.44 //
GP12garup3_u:2596: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānaṃ taraṃ ta tathā yoge durghaṭaṃ saṃgataṃ ca // GarP_3,20.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2597: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānantaraṃ ca kāmakrudhorjāraṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2598: ete doṣā jñānapūtānapīha kurvanti saṃdehayutānsadaiva // GarP_3,20.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2599: ato hyahaṃ śravaṇaṃ satkathāyāḥ sadā kariṣye nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:2600: tenāpyahaṃ harināmābhivāñchā niścitya cittaṃ śravaṇe vai cakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2601: ādehamevaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca kṛtvā tyaktvā dehaṃ bhūtale saṃprajātā // GarP_3,20.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2603: sumitrā saṃjñakāyāṃ ca jātā vai mitravindikā // GarP_3,20.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2604: śravaṇena hariṃ mitraṃ prāptā sā mitravindikā /
GP12garup3_u:2605: ataḥ sā mitravindeti saṃjñayā saṃbabhūva ha // GarP_3,20.49 //
GP12garup3_u:2606: svayaṃvare mitravindā rājñāṃ madhye tu bhāminī /
GP12garup3_u:2609: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhadrākṛtabhagavatpatitvaprāpakatapaścaryādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2616: tapa ālocanaṃ proktaṃ tattvānāṃ ca vinirṇayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2618: prāyo nāma tapaḥ proktaṃ cittanigraha ucyate /
GP12garup3_u:2619: prāyaścittamiti proktaṃ na tu kṣauraṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,21.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2621: pūrvaṃ na japtaṃ divyamantraṃ mukunda taptaṃ sadā kleśadāvānalena // GarP_3,21.5 //
GP12garup3_u:2622: na vai smṛtaṃ harināmāmṛtaṃ ca sadā smṛtaṃ haridoṣādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2623: na tu smṛtaṃ haritattvāmṛtaṃ ca samyak śrutaṃ lolavārtādikaṃ ca // GarP_3,21.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2625: na vanditaṃ haripādāravindaṃ suvandito mitrapādaḥ sughoraḥ // GarP_3,21.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2626: na dṛṣṭaṃ vai dhūpadhūmrairupetaṃ harervakraṃ kuntalaiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2627: putrādikaṃ lālitaṃ vai mukunda na lālitaṃ tava vakraṃ murāre // GarP_3,21.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2628: sulālitaṃ bhūṣaṇaiḥ putramitraṃ na lālitaṃ sarvapāpāpahāri /
GP12garup3_u:2629: na bhuktaṃ vai harinairavedyaśeṣaṃ mitrālaye ṣaḍrasānnaṃ ca bhuktam // GarP_3,21.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2630: supuṣpagandhā nārpitā te murāre samarpitāḥ putramitrādikebhyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2631: santaptohaṃ putramitrādikeṣu kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2633: tathāpyabhakṣyai rasanā ca dagdhā kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2635: na pāvitaṃ maccharīraṃ murāre kadā drakṣye tava va ktraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2637: avaiṣṇavānāṃ digdhagandhādidoṣairgātraṃ dagdhaṃ kadā hyuddhariṣye mukunda // GarP_3,21.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2638: dagdhau ca pādau mama vāsudeva na gacchantau kṣetrapathaṃ hareśca /
GP12garup3_u:2639: netre ca dagdhe mama sarvadāpi nālokitaṃ tava deva pratīkam // GarP_3,21.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2640: dagdhau ca hastau mama vāsudeva na pūjitaṃ tava viṣṇoḥ pratīkam /
GP12garup3_u:2641: mayā kṛtaṃ pāpajātaṃ murāre kadā drakṣye tava vakraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2642: madīyadoṣāngaṇayanna pūrṇa dayāṃ kuru tvaṃ suddhadāsyānmukunda /
GP12garup3_u:2643: yāvanti lomāni madīyagātre saṃti prabho sarvadorṣarvidūra // GarP_3,21.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2644: tāvanti pāpāni madīyagātre kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda /
GP12garup3_u:2646: sukhaṃ nāptaṃ hyapumātraṃ mukunda sevā muktā tava devasya viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2647: itaḥ paraṃ putramitrādikaṃ ca yāsye nāhaṃ tava dāsī bhavāmi // GarP_3,21.18 //
GP12garup3_u:2648: yeye brūyuḥ putramitrādikaiśca samyak sukhaṃ jāyate martyaloke /
GP12garup3_u:2649: teṣāmāsye mūtraviṣṭhādikaṃ ca samyak sadā patitaṃ ceti jāne // GarP_3,21.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2650: mitrādīnāṃ yatkṛtaṃ dravyajātaṃ vṛthā gataṃ malarūpaṃ ca jātam /
GP12garup3_u:2651: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ yatkṛtaṃ dravyajātaṃ hariprāpteḥ kāraṇaṃ syātsadaiva // GarP_3,21.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2652: etādṛśaṃ tattu jātaṃ mukunda alaṃ hyalaṃ tena duḥkhaṃ ca bhuktam /
GP12garup3_u:2653: saṃgaṃ dattātsajjanānāṃ sadā tvaṃ vinā ca tvaṃ durjanānāṃ ca saṃgāt // GarP_3,21.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2654: saṃgaiḥ sadā durjanānāṃ murāre gātraṃ dagdhaṃ na virāgeṇa yuktam /
GP12garup3_u:2655: etādṛśāhaṃ kāṃ gātiṃ vā mukunda yāsye na jāne dayayā māṃ ca pāhi // GarP_3,21.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2656: etādṛśo hyanutāpaḥ khagendra prāyaścittaṃ na ca kṣaurādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2657: bhānoḥ kanyā hyanutāpaṃ ca kṛtvā vicārayāmāsa hareḥ sutattvam // GarP_3,21.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2658: sarvottamo harirekaḥ sadaiva yataḥ pūrṇaḥ sarvaguṇaistataśca /
GP12garup3_u:2659: sṛṣṭau yasmājjayate viśvajātamato hariḥ sarvaguṇaiśca pūrṇaḥ // GarP_3,21.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2660: yo devānāmādya akāra eva yato brahmādyā naiva pūrṇāḥ samastāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2661: lakṣmīprasādāccirapuṇyena jāto yathāyogyaṃ pūrṇaguṇo viriñcaḥ // GarP_3,21.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2662: na lakṣmīvadguṇapūrṇo viriñco na viṣṇuvadguṇapūrṇā ramāpi /
GP12garup3_u:2663: na vāyuvadbhāratī cāpi pūrṇā na śeṣavadvāruṇī cāpi pūrṇā // GarP_3,21.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2664: na vai rudravatpārvatī pūrṇarūpā hyanyepyevaṃ naiva pūrṇāḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2665: ālocanāmevameṣā hi kṛtvā tapaścakre yamunāyāśca tīre // GarP_3,21.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2666: tadācāhaṃ yamunāyāśca tīraṃ pārthena sākaṃ mṛgayāṃ gataḥ khaga /
GP12garup3_u:2667: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ tatra tapaścarantīṃ tadābruvaṃ matsakhāyaṃ ca pārtham // GarP_3,21.28 //
GP12garup3_u:2668: he pārtha śīghraṃ vraja kanyāsamīpaṃ tvaṃ pṛccha kasmādatra tapaḥ karoṣi /
GP12garup3_u:2669: evaṃ proktastatsamīpaṃ sa gatvā pṛṣṭvā caitatkāraṇaṃ śīghrameva // GarP_3,21.29 //
GP12garup3_u:2670: āgatya māmavadatphālgunoyaṃ sarvaṃ vṛttāṃntaṃ tvasau matsamīpe /
GP12garup3_u:2671: tatastvahaṃ sumuhūrte ca tasyāḥ pāṇigrahaṃ kṛtavāṃstatra samyak // GarP_3,21.30 //
GP12garup3_u:2673: pūrṇānande ramamāṇāsya nityaṃ tayā ca me kiṃ sukhaṃsyātkhagendra // GarP_3,21.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2674: mayā vivāhonugrahārthaṃ hi tasyā aṅgīkṛto na tu saukhyāya vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:2675: tathā vakṣye lakṣmaṇāyāśca rūpaṃ pāṇigrāhe kāraṇaṃ cāpi vīndrā // GarP_3,21.32 //
GP12garup3_u:2676: śṛṇuṣva tattava vakṣyāmi gopyaṃ sacchiṣyake nāsti gopyaṃ gurośca // GarP_3,21.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2677: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavataḥ kālindyā vivāhe hetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2680: yā lakṣmaṇā pūrvasarge khagendra putrī hyabhūdvahnivedasya vettuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2681: sulakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutatvādyataḥ sā sulakṣmaṇeti prathitā khagendra // GarP_3,22.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2682: yathā lakṣmīrlakṣaṇaiḥ sā supūrṇā yathā harirlakṣaṇairvai supūrṇaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2683: yathā vāyurlakṣaṇaiḥ pūrṇa eva yathā gāyatrī lakṣaṇaiḥ sā supūrṇā // GarP_3,22.2 //
GP12garup3_u:2684: yathā rudrādyā lakṣaṇairvai prapūrṇā rudrādillakṣmaṇā caiva pūrṇā /
GP12garup3_u:2685: guṇenaivaṃ dharmataḥ kiñcideva tathānusaṃdhānādvriyate nāma cāpi // GarP_3,22.3 //
GP12garup3_u:2686: tasmā dāhurlakṣmaṇetyeva sarve tallakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu cādau khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2687: nārāyaṇe pūrṇaguṇe rameśe dvātriṃśatsaṃkhyāni sulakṣaṇāni // GarP_3,22.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2688: saṃtyeva pakṣīndra vadāmyanu kramānmattaḥ śrutvā mokṣamāpnoti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2690: ya etatsarvaṃ militaṃ caikameva harerviṣṇorlakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2691: mukhaṃ strigdhaṃ vartulaṃ puṣṭirūpaṃ dvitīyaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2693: yaddantā vai tīkṣṇasūkṣmāśca saṃti tallakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāścaturtham // GarP_3,22.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2694: yasyādhare raktimā tvasti vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ pañcamaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2695: yasya hastā atiraktāḥ khagendra tallakṣaṇaṃ prāhurāryāśca paṣṭham // GarP_3,22.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2696: yasminnakhāḥ saṃti raktāḥ suśobhāstallakṣaṇaṃ saptamaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2697: yasminkapole raktimā tvasti vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ hyaṣṭamaṃ prāhurāryā // GarP_3,22.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2699: yasyo daraṃ tanturūpaṃ supuṣṭaṃ valitrayairaṅkitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca // GarP_3,22.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2700: tallakṣaṇaṃ daśamaṃ prāhurāryā ekādaśaṃ nimnanābhiṃ tadāhuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2701: ūrudvayaṃ yasya ca māṃsalaṃ vai tallakṣaṇaṃ dvādaśaṃ prāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2702: kaṭirhi dīrghā pṛthulāsti yasya trayodaśaṃ lakṣma tadāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2703: yasyāsti muṣko supariṣṭhito vai caturdaśaṃ lakṣma tadāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2704: samunnataṃ śiśramatho hi lakṣma yasyāsti tat pañcadaśaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:2705: sutāmrakaṃ pādatalaṃ khagendra tallakṣaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ prāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2706: nimnau ca gulphau saptadaśaṃ tadāhurgrī vārūpaṃ prāhuraṣṭādaśaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2707: ekonaviṃśaṃ tvakṣipadmaṃ suraktaṃ prāhurbāhuṃ jānu viṃśaṃ tathaiva // GarP_3,22.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2709: trayoviṃśaṃ sūkṣmamāsyaṃ tadāhuścaturviśaṃ suprasanne ca dṛṣṭī // GarP_3,22.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2710: hrasvaṃ liṅgaṃ mārdavaṃ cāpi vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:2711: samau ca pādau kaṭijānu corū ṣaḍviṃśamāhuśca same ca jaṅghe // GarP_3,22.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2712: samānahastau samakarṇau militvā dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2713: dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai mukunde dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai ramāyām // GarP_3,22.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2714: dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇopi tadbhāratyāḥ pravadantyeva satyam /
GP12garup3_u:2715: tathā ca śaṅkā samameva cakriṇetyevaṃ sadāmā kuru nirṇayaṃ bruve // GarP_3,22.18 //
GP12garup3_u:2716: ekasya vai lakṣaṇasyāpi viṣṇorlakṣmīrantaṃ naiva samyak prapede /
GP12garup3_u:2717: atonantairlakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutaṃ ca hariṃ cāhurlakṣaṇajñāḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,22.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2718: jānāti lakṣmīrlakṣaṇaṃ vāyurūpe svāpekṣayā hyatiriktaṃ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2719: svalakṣaṇāpekṣayā bhāratī tu śatairguṇairadhikā vedhasopi // GarP_3,22.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2720: khagendra tasmāllakṣaṇe sāmyacittaṃ viśvādīnāṃ sarvadā mā kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:2721: aṣṭāviṃśatiṃ prāhū rudrādikānāṃ bhrūnetrayorlakṣaṇenaiva hīnāḥ // GarP_3,22.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2722: alakṣaṇaṃ manyate yaddhi tasya durlakṣaṇaṃ naiva taccintanīyam /
GP12garup3_u:2723: aṣṭāviṃśatiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai harasya na bhāratīvaccintanīyaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,22.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2724: ato haraḥ krodharūpī sadaiva tayorabhāvātsatyamuktaṃ tathaitat /
GP12garup3_u:2725: ato dvayaṃ nāsti rudre khagendra śiśrodare kiñcidādhikyamasti // GarP_3,22.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2727: ṣaḍvaviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā vāruṇyādyā pañcaviṃśaiśca candraḥ // GarP_3,22.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2728: arthaścaturviṃśatibhiścaiva yukto nāsāvāyordvyadhikā viṃśatiśca lakṣaṇaiścaikaviṃśatyā śacī yuktā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,22.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2738: caturbhaiḥ kṣitipāḥ proktāstribhiranye ca saṃyutāḥ // GarP_3,22.30 //
GP12garup3_u:2739: udare kiñcidādhikye hrasve pāde ca karṇayoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2740: śikhādhikyaṃ vinā vipra bhāryāyāṃ ca śivasya ca // GarP_3,22.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2743: jaṅghādhikye sahaivāṣṭau doṣāḥ śacyāḥ sadā smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2753: lalāṭe pāṇḍutā nityaṃ vāmaskandhe kare khaga /
GP12garup3_u:2756: ūrau navāñjikāromaḥ tathā pṛṣṭhe ca mastake // GarP_3,22.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2757: lalāṭe trīṇi dīrghe tu same dvau saṃprakīrtitau /
GP12garup3_u:2758: sarpākārastu yo matsyastasya śiśre prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.40 //
GP12garup3_u:2760: śiśrākāraśca yo matsyo gude tasya praśasyate // GarP_3,22.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2762: śvākāraścāpi matsyo vai mukhe tasya prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2763: haste tu bahurekhāḥ syurloma nāsāpuṭe smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:2764: atidīrghaṃ tu cāṅguṣṭhaṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ cātidīrghakam // GarP_3,22.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2768: sahābhiprāya garbheṇa brahmaṇoktaṃ tava prabho // GarP_3,22.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2770: mayoktasyaiva sa vyāsaḥ kaṃbugrīvaḥ pradarśyate // GarP_3,22.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2772: ato virodho nāstyeva tathā jñānātpratīyate // GarP_3,22.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2773: saptādhikairviṃśatilakṣaṇaistu samāyutā yāḥ striyo lakṣmaṇādyāḥ // GarP_3,22.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2774: bhage netre ca haste ca stane kukṣau tathaiva ca /
GP12garup3_u:2777: ṣaḍviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā vāruṇyāḥ ṣaḍlakṣaṇaiścaiva hīnā // GarP_3,22.50 //
GP12garup3_u:2778: karṇe kukṣau nāsikākeśapāśe gulphe bhage kiñcidādhikyamasti /
GP12garup3_u:2779: indro yuktaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā khagendra sadā hīno lakṣaṇaiḥ saptasaṃkhyaiḥ // GarP_3,22.51 //
GP12garup3_u:2780: haste pāde udare karṇayośca śiśre gulphe tvadharoṣṭhedhikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2782: nābhyāṃ gulphe hanurarṅghyośca skandhe dvije netre tvadharoṣṭhedhikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2783: trayoviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā śacī tathā navadoṣaiśca yuktā // GarP_3,22.53 //
GP12garup3_u:2784: bhage keśe hyadharoṣṭhe ca karṇe jaṅghe gaṇḍe vakṣasi gulphayośca /
GP12garup3_u:2785: tathottaroṣṭhe kiñcidādhikyamasti evaṃ vijānīhi khagendrasattama // GarP_3,22.54 //
GP12garup3_u:2786: dvāviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutastu daśabhirdeṣaiḥ pravaho nāma vāyuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2788: tadviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutastu tadā doṣerdvādaśabhiśca yuktaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2793: taiśca ṣoḍaśabhiryukto dhanapo nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,22.58 //
GP12garup3_u:2799: taistrayodaśabhiścaiva saṃyuto budha eva tu // GarP_3,22.61 //
GP12garup3_u:2810: ṣadguṇaiḥ kṣitipā yuktā ṣaḍviṃśatyā ca doṣataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2812: tribhiḥ keccittato hīnā na saṃti khagasattama /
GP12garup3_u:2813: yasminnare kṣitipe vā khagendra ādhikyaṃ yaddṛśyate lakṣaṇasya // GarP_3,22.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2814: na te narā naiva te vai kṣitīśāḥ sarve naiva hyuttamāḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2815: ye devā ye ca daityāśca sarvepyevaṃ khagādhipa // GarP_3,22.69 //
GP12garup3_u:2819: piturgṛhe vardhamānā sadāpi svakuṭuṃbaṃ śreṣṭhayituṃ khagendra // GarP_3,22.71 //
GP12garup3_u:2821: sadāpi ye tvanusaṃdhānena yuktā antargate tatratatra sthite ca // GarP_3,22.72 //
GP12garup3_u:2822: ajñātatve cānnapānādikaṃ ca dattaṃ saṃto vyarthamevaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:2823: hariṃ vakṣye tatratatra sthitaṃ caṃ taṃ vai śṛṇu tvādareṇādya nityam // GarP_3,22.73 //
GP12garup3_u:2824: bālo harirbālarūpeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ kṣīrādikaṃ navanītaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2825: gṛhṇāti nityaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vastrajātamevaṃ dadyātsarvadā viṣṇutuṣṭyai // GarP_3,22.74 //
GP12garup3_u:2826: mitrairhariḥ keśavākhyo mukundo bhuṅkte dattaṃ tvannaprānādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2827: pūrvaṃ dadyātsarvadā vai gṛhastho dhanyo bhavedanyathā vyarthameva // GarP_3,22.75 //
GP12garup3_u:2828: gṛhṇāti nityaṃ mādhavākhyo hariścetyevaṃ jñātvā deyamannādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2829: evaṃ jñātvā dīyamānena nityaṃ prīṇāti viṣṇurnānyathā vyarthameva // GarP_3,22.76 //
GP12garup3_u:2830: gṛhe nityaṃ vāsudevo haristu prīṇāti nityaṃ tatra tiṣṭhansuparṇa /
GP12garup3_u:2831: evaṃ jñātvā svagṛhaṃ sarvadaiva alaṅkuryāddhāturūpaiḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,22.77 //
GP12garup3_u:2833: mitre mukundaḥ śālake cānirūddho nārāyaṇo dvijavarye sadāsti // GarP_3,22.78 //
GP12garup3_u:2834: goṣṭhe ca nityaṃ viṣṇurūpī haristu aśve sadā tiṣṭhati vāmanākhyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2835: saṃkarṣaṇaḥ śūdravarṇe sadāsti vaiśye pradyumnastiṣṭhati sarvadaiva // GarP_3,22.79 //
GP12garup3_u:2836: janārdanaḥ kṣattrajātau sadāsti dāśeṣu nityaṃ mahidāso haristu /
GP12garup3_u:2837: mahyāṃ nityaṃ tiṣṭhati sarvadaiva hyupendrākhyo harirekaḥ suparṇa // GarP_3,22.80 //
GP12garup3_u:2838: gaje sadā tiṣṭhati cakrapāṇiḥ sadāntare tiṣṭhati viśvarūpaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2839: nityaṃ śuni tiṣṭhati bhūtabhāvanaḥ pipīlakāyāmapi sarvadaiva // GarP_3,22.81 //
GP12garup3_u:2841: harerna varṇosti na gotramasti na jātirīśe sarvarūpe vicitre // GarP_3,22.82 //
GP12garup3_u:2842: evaṃ jñātvā sarvadā lakṣmaṇā tu hariṃ sadā prīṇayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2843: saparyayā vai kriyamāṇayā hariḥ patirmamasya diti cintayānā // GarP_3,22.83 //
GP12garup3_u:2844: tatyāja dehaṃ viṣṇupatitvakāmā madreṣu vai vīndra putrī prajātā /
GP12garup3_u:2845: svayaṃvare lakṣmaṇāyā ahaṃ ca bhittvā lakṣyaṃ bhūpatīndrāvayitvā // GarP_3,22.84 //
GP12garup3_u:2846: pāṇigrahaṃ lakṣmaṇāyāśca kṛtvā gatvā purīṃ ramayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2847: tathaivāhaṃ jāṃbavatyā vivāhaṃ matpatnītve kāraṇaṃ tvāṃ bravīmi // GarP_3,22.85 //
GP12garup3_u:2848: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe lakṣmaṇāvivāhahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2851: somasya putrī pūrvasarge babhūva bhāryā madīyā jāmbavatī mama priyā /
GP12garup3_u:2852: tāsāṃ madhye hyadhikā vīndra kiñcidrudrādibhyaḥ pañcaguṇairvihīnā // GarP_3,23.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2854: yadāveśāddhrāsamupaiti kāle tadā tāsāṃ sāmyamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,23.2 //
GP12garup3_u:2857: tāsāṃ madhye jāmbavantī tu kṛṣṇa ārādhanaṃ kīdṛśaṃ sā cakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2858: tanme brūhi kṛpayā viśvamūrte ādhikye vai kāraṇaṃ tābhya eva // GarP_3,23.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2862: yā pūrvasarge somaputrī babhūva piturgṛhe vartamānāpi sādhvī /
GP12garup3_u:2863: janma svakīyaṃ sārthakaṃ vai cakāra pitrā sākaṃ viṣṇuśuśrūṣaṇe na ca // GarP_3,23.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2864: śuśrāva nityaṃ satpurāṇāni caivaṃ cakre sadā viṣṇupādapraṇāmam /
GP12garup3_u:2865: cakre sadā tārakasyāpi viṣṇoḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ kurvatī sā // GarP_3,23.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2866: pitrā sākaṃ sā tu kanyā khagendra vairāgyayuktā śravaṇātsaṃbabhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2867: keśaṃ ca mitraṃ dviradādikaṃ ca anarghyaratnāni gṛhādikaṃ ca // GarP_3,23.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2868: sarvaṃ hyetannaśvaraṃ caiva mene mamādhīnaṃ hariṇā vai kṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2869: yenaiva dattaṃ putramitrādikaṃ ca tenā hṛtaṃ vedanāṃ naiva cakre // GarP_3,23.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2870: adyaiva viṣṇuḥ paramo dayāluḥ dayāṃ mayi kṛtavāṃste na suṣṭhu /
GP12garup3_u:2871: pitrā sākaṃ kanyakā sā tu vīndra sadātmani hyamale vāsudeve // GarP_3,23.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2872: ekāntatvaṃ suṣṭhu bhaktyā gatā sā yadṛcchayā sopapannena devī /
GP12garup3_u:2873: akalpayantyātmano vīndra vṛttiṃ cakāra yatsāvadhirādhaṃ prathaiva // GarP_3,23.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2874: sā vai vittaṃ viṣṇupādāravinde duḥ khārṇavāttarāke saṃcakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2875: vāgīndridriyaṃ khaga samyak cakāra harerguṇānāṃ varṇane vā sadaiva // GarP_3,23.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2876: hastau ca viṣṇorgṛhasaṃmārjanādau cakāra devī gātramalāpahāram /
GP12garup3_u:2877: śrotraṃ ca cakre harisatkathodaye mokṣādimārge hyamṛtopame ca // GarP_3,23.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2879: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ sparśane caiva saṃge nirmālyagandhānuvilepane tvak // GarP_3,23.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2880: ghrārṇedriyaṃ sā haripādasāre cakāra saṃsāravimuktide ca /
GP12garup3_u:2883: kāmaṃ hṛdāsye tu haridāsyakāmyā tathottamaślokajanāścaranti // GarP_3,23.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2884: niṣkāmarūpe ca matiṃ cakāra vāgindriyaṃ stavanaṃ svīcakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2885: evaṃ sadā kāryasamūhamātmanā samarpayitvā parameśapādayoḥ // GarP_3,23.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2886: tīrthāṭanārthaṃ tu jagāma pitrā sākaṃ hareḥ prīṇanādyarthameva /
GP12garup3_u:2889: yāvatkālaṃ tīrthayātrā mukunda tāvatkālaṃ tūrdhvaretā bhavāmi // GarP_3,23.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2890: yāvatkālaṃ tīrthayātrāṃ kariṣye tāvaddattādvaiṣṇavānāṃ ca saṃgam /
GP12garup3_u:2891: hareḥ kathāśravaṇaṃ syānmukunda nāvaiṣṇavānāṃ saṃgināmaṅgasaṃgam // GarP_3,23.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2892: suhṛjjanaiḥ putramitrādikaiśca dīrthāṭanaṃ naiva kuryāṃ mukunda /
GP12garup3_u:2893: kurvanti ye kāmyayā tīrthayātrāṃ teṣāṃ saṃgaṃ kuru dūre mukunda // GarP_3,23.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2894: śālagrāmaṃ ye vihāyaiva yātrāṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ prāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2895: yadā tīrthānāṃ darśanaṃ syāttadaiva śālagrāmaṃ purataḥ sthāpayitvā // GarP_3,23.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2896: tīrthāṭanaṃ pādacairaiḥ kṛtaṃ cetpūrṇaṃ phalaṃ prāhurāryāḥ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2897: pādatrāṇaṃ pādarakṣāṃ ca kṛtvā tīrthāṭanaṃ pādahīnaṃ tadāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2898: yo vāhane turage copaviṣṭastīrthāṭanaṃ kurute cārdhahīnam /
GP12garup3_u:2899: vṛṣādīnāṃ vāhane pādamāhuḥ parānnānāṃ bhojane vyarthamāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2900: mahātmanāṃ vedavidāṃ yatīnāṃ parānnānāṃ bhojane naiva doṣaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2901: saṃkalpayitvā paramādareṇa jagāma sā tīrthayātrārthameva // GarP_3,23.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2902: ādau snātvā harinirmātyagandhaṃ visarjayitvā śravaṇaṃ vai cakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2903: pitrā sākaṃ bhojanaṃ cāpi kṛtvā agre dine krośamekaṃ jagāma // GarP_3,23.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2904: tatra dvijānpūjayitvānnapāna rātrau tattvaṃ śrāvayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2905: evaṃ yātrāṃ ye prakurvanti nityaṃ teṣāṃ yātrāṃ saphalāṃ prāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,23.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2906: vinā dayāṃ tīrthayātrā khagendravyarthetyevaṃ vīndra cāhurmahāntaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2907: divā rātrau ye na śṛṇvanti divyāṃ hareḥ kathāṃ tīrthamārge khagendra // GarP_3,23.28 //
GP12garup3_u:2908: vyarthaṃvyarthaṃ tasya cāhurgataṃ vai aśvādīnāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca viddhi /
GP12garup3_u:2913: anusaṃdhānādrahitaṃ sarvameva kṛtaṃ vyarthameveti cāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2914: ato hareḥ pāpavināśinīṃ kathāṃ śrutvā viṣṇorbhaktimānsyātvagandra /
GP12garup3_u:2915: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā haripādāṅkitaṃ ca smṛtvāsmṛtvā bhaktimānsyātkhagendra // GarP_3,23.32 //
GP12garup3_u:2916: pitrā sākaṃ kanyakā sāpi vīndra śeṣācalasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca draṣṭum /
GP12garup3_u:2917: jagāma sā mārgamadhye hariṃ ca sā cintayāmāsa ramāpatiṃ ca // GarP_3,23.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2918: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya vakṣaḥ śrīvatsaratnairbhūṣitaṃ vistṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2919: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya tundaṃ valitrayeṇāṅkitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca // GarP_3,23.34 //
GP12garup3_u:2920: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya kaṇṭhaṃ maharlokasyāśrayaṃ kaṃbutulyam /
GP12garup3_u:2921: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya nābhiṃ sadāntarikṣasyāśrayaṃ vai supūrṇam // GarP_3,23.35 //
GP12garup3_u:2922: kadā drakṣye vadanaṃ vai murārerjanalokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,23.36 //
GP12garup3_u:2923: śiraḥ kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye satyasya lokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2924: kaṭiṃ kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye bhūrlokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,23.37 //
GP12garup3_u:2925: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya coru talātalasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2926: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jānu sukomalaṃ sutalasyāśrayaṃ ca // GarP_3,23.38 //
GP12garup3_u:2927: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jaṅghe rasātalasyāśrayeḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2928: kadā drakṣye pādatalaṃ hareśca pātālalokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,23.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2929: itthaṃ mārge cintayantī ca devī śeṣācale śeṣadevaṃ dadarśa /
GP12garup3_u:2932: taddarśanādvāṣpakalākulekṣaṇā sadyaḥ samutthāya nanāma mūrdhnā // GarP_3,23.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2933: mukhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā namanaṃ ca kāryaṃ pṛṣṭhādibhāge namanaṃ na kāryam /
GP12garup3_u:2934: sāpi dviṣaṭkaṃ namanaṃ ca cakre śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā puro 'sya // GarP_3,23.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2935: itthaṃ kāryaṃ vaiṣṇavaiḥ parvatasya tvaṃ vaiṣṇavairviparītaṃ ca kāryam /
GP12garup3_u:2936: madhvāntaḥsthaḥ parvatāgresti nityaṃ ramābrahmādyaiḥ pūjitaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,23.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2938: ityevamuktvā kapilākhyatīrthe sthānaṃ cakre sā svapitrā sahaiva // GarP_3,23.44 //
GP12garup3_u:2939: atraivāste śrīnivāso haristu dravyeṇa rūpeṇa na cānyatheti /
GP12garup3_u:2940: ādausnātvā muṇḍanaṃ tatra kṛtvā tīrthaśrāddhaṃ kārayitvā sutīrthe // GarP_3,23.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2942: śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā sa cāgre punaḥ praṇāmaṃ sāpi cakre subhaktyā // GarP_3,23.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2943: sopānānāṃ śataparyantamevamāruhya sā hyupaviṣṭā tu tatra /
GP12garup3_u:2944: śuśrāva sā bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ śuśrāva vaiveṅkaṭādreḥ praśaṃsām // GarP_3,23.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2945: jaigīṣavyādgurupādātsubhaktyā suśrāva tattvaṃ veṅkaṭādreśca sarvam // GarP_3,23.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2946: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe veṅkaṭeśagiriyātrākramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2949: kanye śṛṇu tvaṃ veṅkaṭākhyācalasya smerānanāṃ puṇyamāṃrohaṇe 'sya /
GP12garup3_u:2950: śrīgītāyāḥ paṭhanaṃ caiva kurvannārohaṇaṃ kurute sarvalokaḥ // GarP_3,24.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2951: padepade śrīnivāsaśca devastvalaṃ hyalaṃ prīyate bhaktavargaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2952: taṃ prīṇayanmokṣamāyānti sarve harau tuṣṭe kimalabhyaṃ ca kanye // GarP_3,24.2 //
GP12garup3_u:2953: sopānadeśe yaḥ purāṇaṃ śṛṇoti tadā kṛtā sarvatīrthādiyātrā /
GP12garup3_u:2954: tadā divā prastuvantīha mārge sadā hariṃ śrīnivāsaṃ guruṃ ca // GarP_3,24.3 //
GP12garup3_u:2955: sopānānāṃ mahimānaṃ ca śrutvā śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā ca tatra /
GP12garup3_u:2956: namaskṛtvā punarevāpi sā tu sopānāni tvārurohātha sādhvī // GarP_3,24.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2957: sopānānāṃ vīndra cārohaṇena tvavaiṣṇavānāṃ haritoṣo na caiva /
GP12garup3_u:2958: tenaiva teṣāṃ sādhanaṃ bhūya eva tamasyandhe pātayituṃ khagendra // GarP_3,24.5 //
GP12garup3_u:2959: sthalesthale evamevāpi kāryaṃ jaigīṣavyaṃ punarevāha devī /
GP12garup3_u:2961: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāso haristu brahmādīnāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,24.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2962: jaigīṣavya kṛpayā tvaṃ vadasva jaigīṣavyo hyevamukto hariṃ tu /
GP12garup3_u:2963: uvāca kanyāṃ somaputrīṃ satīṃ ca brahmādīnāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,24.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2967: ṛṣyādīnāṃ dṛśyate candravacca sanmānuṣāṇāmaparokṣo haristu // GarP_3,24.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2969: sa sūryavaddṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ saṃsāriṇāṃ veṅkaṭeśaḥ khagendra // GarP_3,24.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2970: saṃdohavaddṛśyate vai prakāśo mithyāvatāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2971: pāṣāṇavannailyarūpaprakāśaḥ śilāmātre dṛṣyate vai kalau ca // GarP_3,24.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2972: nṛṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śrīnivāso haristu kalau svarūpaṃ śrīnivāsasya devī /
GP12garup3_u:2973: na mānuṣāḥ pravijānanti sarve yataḥ kalau tāmasā rājasāstu // GarP_3,24.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2974: tatsaṃginaḥ sāttvikāḥ kecideva hyato bhaktā durlabhā vai kalau ca /
GP12garup3_u:2975: ye dṛśyante bhaktavatte na bhaktāḥ śiśrodarayorbharaṇe caiva saktāḥ // GarP_3,24.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2976: kurvanti yātrāṃ ca tadarthameva bhaktijñānaṃ durlabhaṃ vai kalau ca /
GP12garup3_u:2977: bhaktā ye vai na viraktāḥ sadaiva teṣāṃ harerdarśanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca // GarP_3,24.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2978: bhaktasvarūpaṃ tava vakṣye khagendra yo jñānapūrṇaḥ parame snigdha eva /
GP12garup3_u:2979: na ca dveṣairbandhuro bhaktiyuktastava dveṣāñchṛṇu vakṣye ca samyak // GarP_3,24.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2981: jñānānandaiḥ paripūrṇe harau ca guṇairapūrṇo harirityeva cintā // GarP_3,24.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2982: śrībrahmarudrādidivaukasāṃ sadā tathā dvijānāṃ saṃmānāyāśca cintā /
GP12garup3_u:2983: viṣṇoḥ sakāśādbrahmarudrādikānāṃ sadādhikyālocanaṃ dveṣa eva // GarP_3,24.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2985: avatārāṇā chedabhedādikaṃ ca tathocyate maraṇasyāpi cintā // GarP_3,24.18 //
GP12garup3_u:2986: tadbhaktānāṃ dveṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāstadvākyānāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dveṣa eva /
GP12garup3_u:2987: naca dveṣaiḥ saṃyutā ye ca loke kanye dṛśyante na tu bhaktāḥ kadācit // GarP_3,24.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2989: jaigīṣavya brūhi me ke ca bhaktā bhaktiṃ kathaṃ darśayāmāsurete /
GP12garup3_u:2990: teṣāṃ hariḥ śrīnivāso mahātmā trātā sadā bhaktavarge dayāluḥ // GarP_3,24.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2991: jaigīṣavyastvevamukto mahātmā uvāca kanyāṃ saṃsmaran bhaktavaryaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2993: prahādādyā śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ kṛtvā nṛsiṃhe cottamāṃ bhaktimeva // GarP_3,24.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2994: avāpa sāmrājyamanuttamaṃ ca jñānaṃ nṛsiṃhātsamavāpa paścāt /
GP12garup3_u:2995: parāśaraḥ śrīnibāsasya bhakto bhaktiṃ kṛtvā vyāsarūpaṃ hariṃ ca // GarP_3,24.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2996: stutvā tena jñānatattvaṃ hyavāpya jagāma mokṣaṃ bhaktisaṃvardhitātmā /
GP12garup3_u:2997: yo nāradaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhakto bhaktiṃ kṛtvā garbhavāse harau ca // GarP_3,24.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2998: tayā bhaktyā brahmaputratvamāpa jñānaprāptyā tena muktiṃ jagāma /
GP12garup3_u:2999: yo hyaṃbarīṣaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ kṛtvā bhaktiṃ paradeva harau ca // GarP_3,24.24 //
GP12garup3_u:3000: japtvā jñānaṃ prāpya durvāsakaścāpyavāpa mokṣaṃ tena saṃvardhitātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3001: mucukundo vai śrīnivāsasya bhakto vairāgyato bhaktidārḍhyaṃ ca kṛtvā // GarP_3,24.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3002: tattvajñānaṃ prāpya viṣṇormahātmā hyavāpa mokṣaṃ tena saṃvardhitātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3003: sa puṇḍarīkaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ pitrādiṣṭo viṣṇubhaktiṃ ca kṛtvā // GarP_3,24.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3005: brahmā ca vāyuśca sarasvatī ca jñātavyāḥ sarve ṛjuyoginaśca // GarP_3,24.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3006: acchinnabhaktāśca sadā murārerna kāmyaraktāḥ śuddharūpā hi te ca /
GP12garup3_u:3009: parjanyamitrādaya eva sarve sadā hyete śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ // GarP_3,24.29 //
GP12garup3_u:3010: viśvāmitro bhṛguraurvaśca kutso marīciratriḥ pulahaḥ kratuśca /
GP12garup3_u:3011: śaktirvasiṣṭho sautamīyo pulastyo bhāradvājaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ // GarP_3,24.30 //
GP12garup3_u:3012: māndhātā nahuṣoṃbarīṣasagarau rājā pṛthurhaihayo ikṣvākurbharato yayātisutalau dharmo vikukṣistathā /
GP12garup3_u:3013: uttānaśca bibhīṣaṇo daśaratho hyete mahājñāninaḥ śrīmadveṅkaṭanāyakasya ca gurorbhaktāḥ sadā saṃsmṛtāḥ // GarP_3,24.31 //
GP12garup3_u:3015: godāvarī narmadā ca kṛṣṇā bhīmarathī tathā // GarP_3,24.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3017: ityetāśca harerbhaktāḥ saṃti cātraiva bhāmini // GarP_3,24.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3018: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu kanye mayā sati /
GP12garup3_u:3019: yatra pravartate mārge kathā viṣṇormahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,24.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3021: tatraiva bhaktāḥ sarvepi saṃti viṣṇostathaiva ca // GarP_3,24.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3022: ye devayātrāṃ paramātmacintayā kurvanti te haribhaktāśca nānye /
GP12garup3_u:3023: yato harau parame vaiṣṇavānāṃ sarvaṃ niṣṭhāmeti kṛtyaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,24.36 //
GP12garup3_u:3025: yo na dadyādabhaktaḥ sa tataḥ ko nu paraḥ paśuḥ // GarP_3,24.37 //
GP12garup3_u:3026: bhaktā hareḥ śrīnivāsācale ca gaṅgādirūpeṇa ca tatratatra /
GP12garup3_u:3027: tiṣṭhanti sevārthamurukramasya teṣāṃ pūjā naiva kāryā ca devi // GarP_3,24.38 //
GP12garup3_u:3028: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu tvaṃ tatra sthale vastragandhādidhūpaiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3029: purāṇoktā api bhedena pūjyā dṛṣṭvā ca tānvandayetprājña eva // GarP_3,24.39 //
GP12garup3_u:3030: sadbrāhmaṇānvandayetpādamūle hastau ca dvau saṃpuṭīkṛtya devi /
GP12garup3_u:3031: sāṣṭāṅgarupaṃ vandanaṃ caiva viṣṇoḥ kuryāttathā gurave viṣṇubuddhyā // GarP_3,24.40 //
GP12garup3_u:3032: gaṅgādīnāṃ vandanaṃ kāryameva sāṣṭāṅgaṃ vai tulasīnāṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:3033: aśvatthānāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva gavādīnāṃ namanaṃ mānasena // GarP_3,24.41 //
GP12garup3_u:3034: pūjā sadā devadevasya viṣṇoḥ kāryā bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaireva nānyaiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3035: ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaiva kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye // GarP_3,24.42 //
GP12garup3_u:3036: ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaivaṃ kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye /
GP12garup3_u:3037: yenāmakā viṣṇubhaktāḥ sadaiva pūjā viṣṇornaiva kāryātra devi // GarP_3,24.43 //
GP12garup3_u:3038: mohādyo vai pūjayeddevadevaṃ mahādharmādyāti cāndhaṃ tamo vai /
GP12garup3_u:3039: brahmādināmāni harerhi devīṃ viṣṇoḥ svanāmāni dadau divaukasām // GarP_3,24.44 //
GP12garup3_u:3040: nādāddhīraḥ keśavādīni kanye svakaṃ puraṃ pravihāyaiva rājā /
GP12garup3_u:3041: evaṃ mayoktaṃ kanyake sarvametadetatparaṃ samyagārohaṇīyam // GarP_3,24.45 //
GP12garup3_u:3042: govinda nārāyaṇa mādhaveti yūyaṃ mayā sarvamārādhitavyam /
GP12garup3_u:3043: sarve militvā punarevaṃ khagendra samāruhanvaiṅkaṭādriṃ gṛṇantaḥ // GarP_3,24.46 //
GP12garup3_u:3045: draṣṭuṃ sarve śrīnivāsaṃ tathaiva kurvantaste talaśabdaṃ nadantaḥ // GarP_3,24.47 //
GP12garup3_u:3046: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā tārkṣyaḥ kṛṣṇamuvācaha kathamāsvādanaṃ cakruretadvistīryame vada /
GP12garup3_u:3048: bho śrīnivāsa tava nāmaiva caitannāma svāmī nanu nāmaiva svāmī /
GP12garup3_u:3049: yāṃ brahmādyā āśrayantītti yasmāttasmādramā śrīriti nāma cāpa // GarP_3,24.48 //
GP12garup3_u:3051: bho śrīnivāseti tu nartayanto romāñcamātrāstalaśabdakāriṇaḥ // GarP_3,24.49 //
GP12garup3_u:3052: adyaiva paśyāma harestavāsyaṃ kadā vayaṃ kṛta kṛtyā bhavāmaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3053: bhoḥ keśavādyaiva padāravindaṃ saṃdarśayitvā sudayāṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,24.50 //
GP12garup3_u:3055: īśaṃ cārhaṃ rudramityeva cāhustatprerakaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārye // GarP_3,24.51 //
GP12garup3_u:3056: ato hariḥ keśavanāmadheyo bhoḥ keśaveti ca nartayantaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3057: ānandavāpīṃ saṃstravantobhi jagmurnārāyaṇeti pravadanto hi jagmuḥ // GarP_3,24.52 //
GP12garup3_u:3059: nārāyaṇeti pravadantīha loke nārānubandhātsarvamuktāḥ khagendra // GarP_3,24.53 //
GP12garup3_u:3060: nārāḥ proktā āśrayatvācca teṣāmatopi nārāyaṇa eva vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:3061: muktāśca ye tu prapadaṃnu jagmuraṇḍodakaṃ yasya kaṭākṣamātrāt // GarP_3,24.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3062: yadutpannaṃ tena nārāḥ khagendra teṣāṃ sadāpyāśrayatvācca vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:3064: evaṃ nanṛtuḥ pariśaṃsayanto govinda nānyo hi na caiva darśanam /
GP12garup3_u:3065: gośabdavācyāstu samastavāco gobhiśca sarvaiḥ pratipādyate yataḥ // GarP_3,24.56 //
GP12garup3_u:3066: ato hi govinda iti smṛtaḥ sadā bho vedavedyeti tathā na nanṛtuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3067: ānandabāṣpaiśca samanvitā hi hare murāre tava darśanaṃ hi // GarP_3,24.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3068: dehi prabho vai tavadāsadāsāścaturdaśe bhuvane sarvadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3069: yatastvamevaṃ vasatīti vāsuścātraiva nityaṃ krīḍate sarvadaiva // GarP_3,24.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3071: bho vāsudeveti nanṛtuḥ sarvadaiva bho mādhaveti nanṛtuścaiva sarve // GarP_3,24.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3072: lakṣmīpate ceti vadanti sarve dhanīti śabdaḥ svābhivācī yato hi /
GP12garup3_u:3073: atopyāryā mādhaveti bruvanti lakṣmīpate pāhi tathaiva bhaktān // GarP_3,24.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3074: te vai bruvanto nanṛtuśca jagmurviṣṇo sadāsmānparipāhi nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3076: jagmuśca sarve dadṛśuśca tīrthaṃ bhaktyopetāḥ śrīnivāsaṃ smarantaḥ // GarP_3,24.61 //
GP12garup3_u:3078: kiṃ nāmakaṃ tīrthamidaṃ munīndra kiṃ kāryamatra pravadāsmānkṛtīśa /
GP12garup3_u:3079: kasmai prasanno bhagavāñchrīnivāsastvasminsutīrthaṃ vada vistareṇa // GarP_3,24.62 //
GP12garup3_u:3082: niṣkāmabuddhyā tu yadā jagāma śeṣācalasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca draṣṭum // GarP_3,24.63 //
GP12garup3_u:3084: nṛsiṃharūpaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ bhajasva sudurlabhaṃ mānuṣaṃ janma kanye // GarP_3,24.64 //
GP12garup3_u:3085: tatrāpi viṣṇornṛhare sutattvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ suṣṭhu yātrā tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:3086: yasyāṃ yātrāyāṃ yatra kutrāpi deśe hareḥ kathā vartate daityavaryāḥ // GarP_3,24.65 //
GP12garup3_u:3087: tatra sthale harirāste sadaiva yato vyāptaḥ sarvato vai nṛsiṃhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3089: vyāpto hariścetkathamatra vai sakhe na dṛśyate jalarūpī nṛsiṃhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3090: sa evamukto dānavānāṃ sutaiśca tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,24.67 //
GP12garup3_u:3091: tava svarūpaṃ mama darśayasva svayogyarūpaṃ dānavānāṃ sutānām /
GP12garup3_u:3092: iti stutaḥ śrīnivāso haristu tasminnantarjalarūpaṃ samāyāt // GarP_3,24.68 //
GP12garup3_u:3093: asminsnānaṃ ye prakurvanti tīrthe teṣāṃ jñānaṃ paramaṃ dṛḍhaṃ syāt /
GP12garup3_u:3094: atra snāne mānuṣāṇāṃ ca tāta buddhirna hi syātkalikāle viśeṣāt // GarP_3,24.69 //
GP12garup3_u:3095: dattvāṃ varaṃ daityavarāya viṣṇurantardadhe jalapūrṇe sukuṇḍe /
GP12garup3_u:3096: adyāpyāste jalamadhye nṛsiṃhaḥ prahlādopi daityakumārakaiḥ saha // GarP_3,24.70 //
GP12garup3_u:3097: tasmin sutīrthe paritastatratatra jayeti śabdaḥ śrūyate cāparāhne /
GP12garup3_u:3098: idaṃ tīrthaṃ nārasiṃhābhidhaṃ ca kanyesnānaṃ hyatra kāryaṃ manuṣyaiḥ // GarP_3,24.71 //
GP12garup3_u:3099: snānaṃ kṛtvā tatra tīrthe ca samyagdīpaṃ dattvā dvijavaryāya mukhyam /
GP12garup3_u:3100: draṣṭuṃ punaḥ śrīnivāsaṃ prajagmurgovindagovinda iti bruvantaḥ // GarP_3,24.72 //
GP12garup3_u:3102: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇoḥ kathaṃ kāryaṃ darśanaṃ tadvadasva // GarP_3,24.73 //
GP12garup3_u:3103: jaigīṣavyaḥ prāha saṃhṛṣṭacitto bravīmi tantraṃ śṛṇu kanyake tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3104: śrutvā mattaḥ kuru sarvaṃ mayoktamādyaṃ dvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā // GarP_3,24.74 //
GP12garup3_u:3106: tāni sarvāṇi me deva kṣamasva puruṣottama // GarP_3,24.75 //
GP12garup3_u:3109: ādyadvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya devi samyak smaredvijayaṃ vai jayaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3110: dakṣādhvare śrīnivāsasya devi caṇḍaṃ pracaṇḍaṃ saṃsmaretsamyageva // GarP_3,24.77 //
GP12garup3_u:3111: pāścātyabhāge śrīnivāsasya devi nandaṃ sunandaṃ saṃsmaredeva bhaktyā /
GP12garup3_u:3112: savyadvāre śrīnivāsasya kanye smaretkumudākṣaṃ kumudantameva // GarP_3,24.78 //
GP12garup3_u:3113: yaścaiva dehaṃ praviśedbhaktipūrvaṃ kadā drakṣye sādareṇaiva devi /
GP12garup3_u:3114: pradakṣiṇadvādaśakaṃ ca kṛtvā pade pade saṃsmarecchrīnivāsam // GarP_3,24.79 //
GP12garup3_u:3115: śrīsvāmitīrthe samyagācamya natvā snātvā natvā bhūvarāhaṃ ca devi /
GP12garup3_u:3118: punarviśedvārataḥ saṃsthitaḥ sa pīṭhasthadevānmānasā cintayīta // GarP_3,24.81 //
GP12garup3_u:3119: madhye pīṭhaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī nārāyaṇaṃ praṇametpūrṇameva /
GP12garup3_u:3120: devasya savye pīṭhabhāgādvahiśca namaskāryaṃ gurudevāya caiva // GarP_3,24.82 //
GP12garup3_u:3122: nairṛtyabhāge vyāsadevāya devi namaskāryo vaiṣṇavaḥ sarvadāpi // GarP_3,24.83 //
GP12garup3_u:3124: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ hyagnikoṇeṣu devī dharmādhibhūtāya namo yamāya // GarP_3,24.84 //
GP12garup3_u:3126: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ vāyukoṇe ca subhrūrvairāgyānāmadhipaṃ caiva rudram // GarP_3,24.85 //
GP12garup3_u:3127: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ tvīśakoṇe ca devi aiśvaryāṇāmadhipaṃ cendradevam /
GP12garup3_u:3128: pīṭhasya pūrve praṇamennairṛtiṃ ca aryāmṇānāmadhipaṃ cātra devi // GarP_3,24.86 //
GP12garup3_u:3129: devasya pīṭhasya ca dakṣiṇe ca durgāṃ namedugrarūpābhidhāṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3130: pīṭhasya kanye praṇametpaścime vai ārogyāṇā madhipaṃ kāmadevam // GarP_3,24.87 //
GP12garup3_u:3132: pīṭhasya madhye praṇamedvai varāhaṃ sadā kanye paramaṃ pūruṣākhyam // GarP_3,24.88 //
GP12garup3_u:3136: tasyopariṣṭādvaruṇaṃ saṃsmarecca kṣīrodadheradhipaṃ caiva devam // GarP_3,24.90 //
GP12garup3_u:3138: tasyopariṣṭātpraṇameccaiva lakṣmīṃ mahādivyāṃ maṇḍapasaṃjñakāṃ ca // GarP_3,24.91 //
GP12garup3_u:3139: pīṭhasya madhye yamasaṃjñāṃ ca lakṣmīṃ samarcayedyamamadhye ca devīm /
GP12garup3_u:3140: yamasya devasya ca dakṣiṇe ca sūryaṃ nameddīparūpaṃ ca bhadre // GarP_3,24.92 //
GP12garup3_u:3141: yamasya devasya ca vāmabhāge śriyaṃ nameddīparūpāṃ ca devīm /
GP12garup3_u:3142: yamasya devasya tu cāgrabhāge hutāśanaṃ dīparūpaṃ namecca // GarP_3,24.93 //
GP12garup3_u:3143: devasyāgre bhūmināmnīṃ namecca tattvābhimānāṃ saṃsmareccaiva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3144: paryaṅkarūpaṃ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇostamobhimānāṃ sannameccaiva durgām // GarP_3,24.94 //
GP12garup3_u:3147: padmasya pūrvasthadale ca devi strīrūpākhyaṃ vimalākhyāmimāṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3149: utkarṣanāmnīṃ paramāṃ ca devīṃ namedramāṃ brahmavāyū ca śeṣam /
GP12garup3_u:3151: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva kanye mayā paścimasthe dale ca /
GP12garup3_u:3153: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva īśāna koṇasthadaleṣu caiva /
GP12garup3_u:3155: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva tathaiva padmasya ca madhyabhāge /
GP12garup3_u:3157: strīrūpāṇāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva suyogapīṭhasya svarūpa bhūtam /
GP12garup3_u:3158: sadā namecchrīmadanantasaṃjñamevaṃ na mecchrīnivāsaṃ ca devam // GarP_3,24.101 //
GP12garup3_u:3159: śrīnivāsasya vāme tu lakṣmīṃ ca praṇamedvudhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3160: śrīnivāsasya savye tu dharāyai praṇamecchubhe // GarP_3,24.102 //
GP12garup3_u:3162: maholkaṃ dakṣiṇe caiva vīrolkaṃ paścime namet // GarP_3,24.103 //
GP12garup3_u:3163: uttare ca namaḥ kuryādyulkāya ca mahātmane /
GP12garup3_u:3164: caturṣvapi ca koṇeṣu sahasrolkaṃ nametsudhīḥ // GarP_3,24.104 //
GP12garup3_u:3166: saṃkarṣaṇāya devāya pradyumnāya ca paścime // GarP_3,24.105 //
GP12garup3_u:3168: āgneye ca namaskuryātkanye māyāṃ sadā śubhe // GarP_3,24.106 //
GP12garup3_u:3171: keśavāya namaḥ pūrve tathā nārāyaṇāya ca /
GP12garup3_u:3173: āgneye kanyake nityaṃ bhaktyā tu prayataḥ śubhe /
GP12garup3_u:3176: paścime trivikramāya vāmanāya tathaiva ca // GarP_3,24.110 //
GP12garup3_u:3178: uttare tu mahākanye hṛṣīkeśāya vai namaḥ // GarP_3,24.111 //
GP12garup3_u:3185: paścime mādhavāyātha tathā kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3186: buddhāya ca namaskuryādvāyavye kanyake śubhe // GarP_3,24.115 //
GP12garup3_u:3189: āgneye vāruṇīṃ caiva gāyatrīṃ caiva nairṛte /
GP12garup3_u:3190: vāyavye bhāratīṃ caiva īśānye girijāṃ namet // GarP_3,24.117 //
GP12garup3_u:3191: girijāṃ vāmabhāge tu sauparṇai caiva saṃnamet /
GP12garup3_u:3195: dakṣiṇe tu yamāyaiva nairṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ yajet /
GP12garup3_u:3196: paścime varuṇāyaiva vāyavye vāyave namaḥ // GarP_3,24.120 //
GP12garup3_u:3197: uttare ca kuberāya īśānye ca śivāya ca /
GP12garup3_u:3200: evaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ praṇamecca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_3,24.122 //
GP12garup3_u:3202: itaḥ parantu gantavyaṃ darśanārthaṃ ramāpate // GarP_3,24.123 //
GP12garup3_u:3203: evamuktvā tu sā devī taiḥ sārdhaṃ tu yayau mudā /
GP12garup3_u:3206: samāgamo durghaṭa eva vīndra satāṃ ca sattattvavibodhakānām /
GP12garup3_u:3208: payo vikāraṃ ca nijaṃ jahāti śeṣasya śeṣaṃ nalinasya ṣaṅkajam /
GP12garup3_u:3209: bhāvaṃ calaṃ paṅkajanābhayogātsatsaṃgayogādaśubhāni na syuḥ // GarP_3,24.126 //
GP12garup3_u:3210: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe śrīveṅkaṭeśagiryārohaṇakramatadbhaktatatparvatanāmādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3212: sā dvāradeśe śrīnivāsasya devī svāmipuṣkariṇīṃ dadṛśe kaiśca sārdham /
GP12garup3_u:3213: svāminhare śrīnivāseti sā taṃ brahmādīnāṃ tārakaṃ sampradadhyau // GarP_3,25.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3214: devaiḥ sārdhaṃ pālanārthaṃ ca viṣṇurastyeva nityaṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ jaleṣu /
GP12garup3_u:3215: ataḥ svāmipuṣkariṇīti cāhustatra snānaṃ kanyakānyāśca cakruḥ // GarP_3,25.2 //
GP12garup3_u:3216: śucirbhūtvā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devāstuptuṃ viviśuḥ śuddhabhaktyā khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:3217: yathopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā tathaiva cakre kanyāśca sarvaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,25.3 //
GP12garup3_u:3218: tadā hariṃ darśayāmāsa tasyai svakaṃ rūpaṃ supratīke supūrṇam /
GP12garup3_u:3219: sā kanyakā śrīnivāsasya rūpaṃ dadarśa bhaktyā svamanobhirāmam // GarP_3,25.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3220: suvarṇacitraṃ vasanaṃ vasānaṃ soṣṇīṣakaṃ kañcukaṃ saṃdadhānam // GarP_3,25.5 //
GP12garup3_u:3225: dṛṣṭvā ca kanyā mumude romāñcitasugātrakā // GarP_3,25.8 //
GP12garup3_u:3227: nanarta devī puratastasya viṣṇoḥ sā dhvastadoṣā paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3228: ānanda māṃ pāhi sukhaṃ ca dattvā mukundā māṃ pāhi vimuktidānāt // GarP_3,25.9 //
GP12garup3_u:3229: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ hyaravindanetra prasannadṛṣṭyā karuṇāsudhārdra /
GP12garup3_u:3230: govinda govinda suduḥ khitāṃ māṃ jñānādidānena hi pāhi nityam // GarP_3,25.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3232: hare hare māṃ satataṃ pāhi daityānsamāhṛtya prabalānvighnarūpān // GarP_3,25.11 //
GP12garup3_u:3233: rameśa māṃ pāhi caturmukheśa viśveśa māṃ pāhi sarasvatīśa /
GP12garup3_u:3234: rameśa māṃ pāhi nidānamūrte vṛndāravṛndairvanditapādapadma // GarP_3,25.12 //
GP12garup3_u:3235: evaṃ tu natvā paramādareṇa tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramaṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:3236: lakṣmyā sadā ye 'viditā guṇāśca asaṃkhyātāḥ saṃti viṣṇau ca vīśa // GarP_3,25.13 //
GP12garup3_u:3237: teṣāṃ sakāśādatibāhulyasaṃkhyā guṇā harau te 'viditā vai ramāyāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3238: ato hare stavane kvāsti śaktistathāpi yatnaṃ stavane te kariṣye // GarP_3,25.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3240: rudraprasādātstavanaṃ te kariṣye tathāpi viṣṇo mayi śāntiṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,25.15 //
GP12garup3_u:3241: yadi prasannosi mayi tvamīśa tvatpādamūle dehi bhaktiṃ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:3242: tvaddarśanāddeva śubhāśubhaṃ ca naṣṭaṃ madīyaṃ hyaśubhaṃ ca nityam // GarP_3,25.16 //
GP12garup3_u:3243: tvanmāyayā naṣṭamimaṃ ca lokaṃ madena mattaṃ badhiraṃ cāndhabhūtam /
GP12garup3_u:3244: aiśvaryayogena ca yo hi mūko jātaḥ sadā dīnāgurvādikeṣu // GarP_3,25.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3246: tvaṃ deva me dehi satāṃ ca saṃgaṃ tava svarūpapratipādakānām // GarP_3,25.18 //
GP12garup3_u:3247: putrādīnāmaihikaṃ vāsudeva dagdhvā ca me dehi pādāravinde /
GP12garup3_u:3248: sadvaṣṇave kriyamāṇaṃ ca kopaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādaravinde // GarP_3,25.19 //
GP12garup3_u:3249: dravyādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca lobhaṃ dagdhvā vai me dehi pādābjamūle /
GP12garup3_u:3250: putrādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca mohaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle // GarP_3,25.20 //
GP12garup3_u:3251: vidyāṃ putraṃ dravyajātaṃ madaṃ ca dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle /
GP12garup3_u:3252: sadvaiṣṇavāsahamānasvarūpaṃ dagdhvā mātsaryaṃ pāhi māṃ veṅkaṭeśa // GarP_3,25.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3253: mantraṃ ca me dehi nidānamūrte yenaiva me syāttava saṃgaśca bhūyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3254: nānyaṃ vṛṇe tava pādābjasaṃgāttadeva me dehi mama prasannaḥ // GarP_3,25.22 //
GP12garup3_u:3255: itīritaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ prasanna uvāca devo hyamṛtastravaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3256: atraiva kanye prajapasva mantraṃ sugopyarūpaṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,25.23 //
GP12garup3_u:3257: vakṣyāmi mantraṃ paramādareṇa śṛṇvadya bhaktyā paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3258: antaḥ sthamantyaṃ hyādyasaṃyuktameva sabindu tadvatsparśakādyena yuktam // GarP_3,25.24 //
GP12garup3_u:3259: ekārayuktaṃ prathamāntaḥ sthayuktaṃ samatrikoṇe coṣmaṇā saṃyutaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3260: takārasaktaṃ svarśamantaḥ sthayuktamādyanta oṃkārasamanvitaṃ ca // GarP_3,25.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3261: anena mantreṇa tavepsitaṃ ca bhaveddhi kanye nāntra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:3262: evaṃ sa uktvā śrīnivāso haristu pratīkavaddarśayāmāsa rūpam // GarP_3,25.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3263: natvā tu sā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī uvāsa ha svāmisaraḥ samīpe /
GP12garup3_u:3264: tasmindine brāhmaṇādīṃśca sarvānsaṃtarpayāmāsa ca ṣaḍrasānnaiḥ // GarP_3,25.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3266: sākaṃ bhaktyā saṃpraṇamyātha devī pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāsasya suṣṭhu // GarP_3,25.28 //
GP12garup3_u:3267: nanarta devī supratīkasya cāgre lajjāṃ tyaktvā jaya deveti coktvā /
GP12garup3_u:3268: ānṛttakāle ca hareśca vaktraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭyā tu paraṃ nanarta // GarP_3,25.29 //
GP12garup3_u:3269: mamādya gātraṃ pāvitaṃ śrīnivāsa mamādya netraṃ saphalaṃ saṃbabhūva /
GP12garup3_u:3270: mamādya pādau sārthakau caiva jātau pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāseśa kṛtvā // GarP_3,25.30 //
GP12garup3_u:3271: hastau ca me sārthakāvadya jātau agre kṛtvā hastaśabdaṃ murāreḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3272: evaṃ vadantī prīṇayantī ca devaṃ jagāmasā stotravacaḥ kadambaiḥ // GarP_3,25.31 //
GP12garup3_u:3273: devāstadā dunduṃbhayo vinedire tanmastake puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca cakruḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3274: tasminkāle ubhayoḥ pārśvayośca nṛtyaṃ cakrurdevatāvāranāryaḥ // GarP_3,25.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3275: tathaiva tāstalaśabdaṃ ca kṛtvā tadā sarvā namanaṃ cāpi cakruḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3276: ānandaśaile sarvadā tvitthameva sā sarvadā nartayantī ca vīndra // GarP_3,25.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3277: ānandamagnā sāpi devī jagāma svamāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdham /
GP12garup3_u:3278: yātrāmevaṃ ye na kurvanti vīndra teṣāṃ ca sarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ cāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,25.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3279: gatvāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdhaṃ guruṃ tvapṛcchadveṅkaṭeśasya mantram /
GP12garup3_u:3280: mantrasyārthaṃ brūhi me jaigiṣavya mantrāvṛttiṃ kurvatāṃ vai phalāya // GarP_3,25.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3282: śṛṇuṣva bhadre veṅkaṭe śasya nāmnastvarthaṃ śrutvā hṛdaye saṃnidhatsva // GarP_3,25.36 //
GP12garup3_u:3287: vya (ve) mindriyādikaṃ proktaṃ vyaṅgabhūtaṃ harau yataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3293: muktānāṃ ca samūhastu vyaṅkaṭeti prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,25.41 //
GP12garup3_u:3302: atastu vyaṅkaṭeśākhya evaṃ jñātvā japaṃ kuru // GarP_3,25.45 //
GP12garup3_u:3304: nidrāṃ cakāra tatraiva rātrau pitrā sahaiva ca /
GP12garup3_u:3305: brāhme muhūrte cotthayi hṛdi sasmāra kanyakā // GarP_3,25.46 //
GP12garup3_u:3308: śrīraṅgaśāyī ca anantaśāyī kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.47 //
GP12garup3_u:3310: nārāyaṇaḥ śrībadarīnivāsaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.48 //
GP12garup3_u:3317: dvārāvatī kāśikāvantikā ca prayāgakāñcyau mathurāpurī ca /
GP12garup3_u:3318: māyāvatī hastimatī purī ca kurvantu sa dṛ // GarP_3,25.52 //
GP12garup3_u:3319: bhāgīrathī caiva sarasvatī ca godāvarī siṃdhukṛṣṇa ca veṇī /
GP12garup3_u:3320: kalindakanyā yamunā ca narmadā kurva dṛ // GarP_3,25.53 //
GP12garup3_u:3322: sutāmraparṇī ca pinākinī ca ku dṛ // GarP_3,25.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3325: gururvasiṣṭhaḥ kraturaṅgirāśca manuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaśca gautamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3326: raibhyo marīciścyavanaśca dakṣaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.56 //
GP12garup3_u:3327: saptārṇavāḥ sapta kulācalāśca dvīpāśca saptopavanāni sapta /
GP12garup3_u:3328: bhūrādikāni bhuvanāni sapta kurvantu sa dṛ // GarP_3,25.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3329: māndhātrā nahuṣoṃbarīṣasagarau rājā nalo dharmarāṭ prahlādaḥ kraturāḍ vibhīṣaṇagayau vyāso hanūmānapi /
GP12garup3_u:3330: aśvatthāma kṛpāvumā drupadajā śrījānakī tārakā mandodaryakhilāḥ prabhātasumahaṃ kurvantu nityaṃ hare // GarP_3,25.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3331: aśvatthasya vanāni kiṃ ca tulasīdhātrīvanāni prabho punnāgasya vanāni caṃpakavanānyanyāni puṣpāṇi ca /
GP12garup3_u:3332: mandārasya vanāni yāni ca hareḥ saugandhikānyapyaho nityaṃ tāni diśantu matpramuditaṃ śrīveṅkaṭeśa prabho // GarP_3,25.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3333: evaṃ smṛtvā śrīnivāsasya devī kṛtvā śaucaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sākam /
GP12garup3_u:3334: snātuṃ yayau puṣkariṇīṃ hareśca snānaṃ samyak tatra cakāra deśe /
GP12garup3_u:3335: samyag japtvā vyaṅkaṭeśasya mantramuvāca sā jaigiṣavyaṃ guruṃ ca // GarP_3,25.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3336: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devī kṛtaveṅkaṭeśadarśanatatstutyādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3339: śrīnivāsaḥ kimarthaṃ vai āgatotra vadasva me /
GP12garup3_u:3341: svāmipuṣkariṇī cātra kimarthaṃ hyagatā vada // GarP_3,26.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3342: jaigīṣavya uvāca śṛṇu bhadre mahābhāge vyaṅkaṭeśasya cāgamam /
GP12garup3_u:3343: āvayordevi pāpāni viṣamaṃ yānti bhāmini // GarP_3,26.2 //
GP12garup3_u:3346: babhūva daityayonau ca devānāṃ kaṇṭako balī /
GP12garup3_u:3347: saṃjīvo vijayaḥ prokto haribhakto mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,26.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3353: tvaṃ mā dadasva duḥ khaṃ me pālayiṣyati kovidaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3354: kṣaṇamātraṃ na jīvāmi tvāṃ vinā jīvanaṃ na hi // GarP_3,26.7 //
GP12garup3_u:3355: mā tapa tvaṃ mahābhāga mama jīvanahetave /
GP12garup3_u:3357: hiraṇyākṣo mātaraṃ prāha jālaṃ hitvā viṣṇorbhajane 'laṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3358: mayisnehaṃ putrahetorvirūḍhaṃ sukhaduḥ khe ceha loke paratra // GarP_3,26.9 //
GP12garup3_u:3359: yāvatsnehaṃ mayi mātaḥ karoṣi tāvatkleśaṃ śāśvataṃ yāsyasi tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3360: mātaśca te mayi putratvabuddhistvayyapyeṣā mātṛbuddhirmamāpi // GarP_3,26.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3361: tāte pūjye pitṛbuddhirmamāsti tasmiṃstute bhartṛbuddhirhi mithyā /
GP12garup3_u:3362: nirmāti yasmāddharireva sarvaṃ samyak pātā niyato 'sau murāriḥ // GarP_3,26.11 //
GP12garup3_u:3363: ato hi mātā harireva sarvadā tvanyāsāṃ vai mātṛtā copacārāt /
GP12garup3_u:3364: nirmātṛtvaṃ yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddroṇādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva // GarP_3,26.12 //
GP12garup3_u:3365: mātṛtvaṃ vai yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddhātrādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3366: yataḥ sadā yāti jagattatto hariḥ sadā pitā viṣṇurajaḥ purāṇaḥ // GarP_3,26.13 //
GP12garup3_u:3367: sadā pitā mukhyapitā yadi syādgarbhasthabāle pālakaḥ ko vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3368: mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkūrmādīnāṃ pālakau kau vadasva // GarP_3,26.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3369: mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkṛpādīnāṃ rakṣakau kau vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3371: na tārakohaṃ narakācca subhrūrna vai bhartā nāpi pitrādayaśca /
GP12garup3_u:3372: na vai mātā nānujādiśca sarvaḥ sarvatrātā viṣṇurato na cānyaḥ // GarP_3,26.16 //
GP12garup3_u:3373: māyāṃ madīyāṃ jñānaśastreṇa cchitvā bhaktyā hareḥ smaraṇaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3374: yadbhaktirūpūrvaṃ smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇostatsarvathā pāpaharaṃ ca mātaḥ // GarP_3,26.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3375: yo vā bhaktyā smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇoḥ karotyasau pāpaharo bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3376: ayaṃ deho durllabhaḥ karmabhūmau tatrāpi madhye bhajanaṃ viṣṇumūrteḥ // GarP_3,26.18 //
GP12garup3_u:3377: āyurgataṃ vyarthameva tvadīyaṃ śīghraṃ bhajeḥ śrīnivāsasya pādam /
GP12garup3_u:3378: upadiśyaivaṃ mātaraṃ putravaryo daityāveśātsobhavadvai tapasvī // GarP_3,26.19 //
GP12garup3_u:3379: caturmukhaṃ prīṇayitvaiva bhaktyā hyavadhyatvaṃ prāpa tasmānmahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3380: tato bhūmiṃ karavadveṣṭayitvā ninye tadā daityavaryo mahātmā // GarP_3,26.20 //
GP12garup3_u:3382: bhittvācābdhiṃ viviśe taṃ mahātmā rasātale saṃsthitaṃ bhūtalaṃ ca // GarP_3,26.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3384: taṃ karṇamūle tāḍayitvā jaghāna prasādayāmāsa ca pūrvavadbhuvam // GarP_3,26.22 //
GP12garup3_u:3385: sudiggajānsthāpayitvā ca viṣṇuḥ śrīmuṣṭe vai saṃsthitaḥ śrīvarāhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3386: tadā hariścintayāmāsa viṣṇurbhaktyā madīyaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehamadya // GarP_3,26.23 //
GP12garup3_u:3387: ārādhayiṣyanti ca māṃ kva ete teṣāṃ dayāṃ kutra vāhaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup3_u:3388: evaṃ hariścintayitvā sukanye vaikuṇṭhalokādacalaṃ śeṣa saṃjñam /
GP12garup3_u:3389: vīndraskandhe sthāpayitvā svayaṃ ca samāgatobhūdbhūtalaṃ bhūtaleśaḥ // GarP_3,26.24 //
GP12garup3_u:3391: śrīkṛṣṇaveṇīparyantaṃ sthāpayā māsa taṃ girim // GarP_3,26.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3392: gireḥ pucche tu śrīśailaṃ madhyame 'hobalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:3393: mukhaṃ ca śrīnivāsasya kṣetraṃ ca samudāhṛtam // GarP_3,26.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3395: gaṅgādisarvatīrthāni puṇyāni hyatra saṃti vai // GarP_3,26.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3398: putrārthī putramāpnoti nṛpo rājyaṃ ca vindati /
GP12garup3_u:3406: vyaṅkaṭeśasya śailasya māhātmyaṃ yāvadasti hi // GarP_3,26.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3408: vyaṅkaṭādrau parāṃ bhaktiṃ ye kurvanti dinedine /
GP12garup3_u:3410: mūko vāgmī bhavedeva badhiraḥ śrāvako bhavet /
GP12garup3_u:3411: vandhyā syādbahuputrā ca nirdhanaḥ sadhano bhavet // GarP_3,26.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3413: tattvato vyaṅkaṭādrestu svarūpaṃ vetti ko bhuvi // GarP_3,26.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3414: yasmādasya gireḥ puṇyaṃ māhātmyaṃ vetti yaḥ pumān /
GP12garup3_u:3421: snānaṃ kurvanti ye tatra teṣāṃ muktiḥ kare sthitā /
GP12garup3_u:3423: tāni sarvāṇi tatraiva saṃti tīrthe hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.39 //
GP12garup3_u:3430: tīrthānāṃ snānamātreṇa mokṣaṃ yāntīti ye viduḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3431: te sarve asurā jñeyāste yānti hyadhamāṃ gatim // GarP_3,26.43 //
GP12garup3_u:3433: āste vāyuḥ sadā viṣṇoḥ pūjāṃ kartumanuttamām // GarP_3,26.44 //
GP12garup3_u:3437: ye veṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsavaryāḥ snānaṃ suryustatra pūrvaṃ sukanye /
GP12garup3_u:3438: madhvāntasthāḥ śrīnivāsastu nityamatra snānātprīyatāṃ me dayāluḥ // GarP_3,26.46 //
GP12garup3_u:3439: ye madhvatīrthe snātumicchanti devi rudrādayo vāyubhaktā mahāntaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3440: sadā snānaṃ tatra kurvanti devi prātaḥ kāle codayātpūrvameva // GarP_3,26.47 //
GP12garup3_u:3441: ye vāyutīrthe visṛjanti dehajaṃ malaṃ mūtraṃ vamanaṃ śleṣmakaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3442: ye 'pānaśuddhiṃ liṅgaśuddhiṃ ca kanye kurvanti te hyasurā rākṣasāśca // GarP_3,26.48 //
GP12garup3_u:3443: śṛṇvanti ye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ kiṃ varṇaye tasya puṇyaṃ tu devi /
GP12garup3_u:3444: ye kṛṣṇamantraṃ tu japanti devi hyaṣṭā kṣaraṃ mantravaraṃ sugopyam // GarP_3,26.49 //
GP12garup3_u:3445: teṣāṃ hariḥ prīyate keśavolaṃ madhvāntastho nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:3446: evaṃ dānaṃ tatra kurvanti ye vai dvijāgryāṇāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ vidāṃ ca // GarP_3,26.50 //
GP12garup3_u:3447: teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ naiva jānanti devā jānātyevaṃ śrīnivāso haristu /
GP12garup3_u:3448: śālagrāmaṃ vāyutīrthe dadante teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ vetti sa vyaṅkaṭeśaḥ // GarP_3,26.51 //
GP12garup3_u:3449: sudurlabho vāyutīrthe 'bhiṣeko niṣkāmabuddhyā vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca devi /
GP12garup3_u:3450: tatrāpi tīrthe labhyate bhāgyayogādbhāgavatasya śravaṇaṃ viṣṇudāsaiḥ // GarP_3,26.52 //
GP12garup3_u:3451: tathaiva tīrthe durlabhaṃ tatra devi śālagrāmasya dvijavarye ca dānam /
GP12garup3_u:3454: jānārdanīṃ mūrtimāhurmahānto dānaṃ tasyā durlabhaṃ tatra tīrthe // GarP_3,26.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3455: atyuttamaṃ mūrtidānaṃ tu bhadre sudurllabhaṃ paramaṃ nātra lobhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3456: sudurlabhaṃ bahudogdhyāśca gṛṣṭerdānaṃ tathā vastraratnādikānām // GarP_3,26.55 //
GP12garup3_u:3457: atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi svāpekṣitaṃ dānamāhurmahāntaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3458: svasyānapekṣaṃ phaladānaṃ ca vastrādānaṃ tasya vyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,26.56 //
GP12garup3_u:3459: atyuttamaṃ gṛṣṭidānaṃ ca puṇyaṃ naivāpyate dugdhadohāśca gāvaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3460: atyuttame vastradāne subuddhiḥ sudurghaṭā paramā vai janānām // GarP_3,26.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3461: atyuttamaṃ bhāgavatasya pustakaṃ sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ ca kanye /
GP12garup3_u:3462: atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ nṛṇāṃ hi /
GP12garup3_u:3463: sudurlabho vaiṣṇavaistattvavidbhirharervicāro vāyutīrthe ca kanye // GarP_3,26.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3465: candratīrtha miti proktaṃ tatrāste candramāḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3466: śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ ca tatra sthitvā karotyayam /
GP12garup3_u:3467: tatra snānaṃ prakurvanti puṇyadeśe ca kanyake // GarP_3,26.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3469: tatra snātvā pūrvabhāge śālagrāmaṃ dadāti yaḥ // GarP_3,26.61 //
GP12garup3_u:3473: prasannavadanaṃ sūkṣmaṃ susnigdhaṃ kanyake śubhe // GarP_3,26.63 //
GP12garup3_u:3480: lakṣmīnārāyaṇasamāṃ tāṃ mūrtiṃ viddhi bhāmini // GarP_3,26.66 //
GP12garup3_u:3481: sudurlabhaṃ tasya mūrteśca dānaṃ taccandratīrthe śravaṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3482: samyak svarūpaṃ dadhivāmanasya sudurghaṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ vaiṣṇavācca // GarP_3,26.67 //
GP12garup3_u:3483: tatra snātvā vāmanasya svarūpaśravaṇādvidurdānaphalaṃ samaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3485: madhyāhne durlabhaṃ snānaṃ nṛṇāṃ tatra sumaṅgale /
GP12garup3_u:3486: tatra sthitvā dhanyanaraḥ sadā bhajati vai harim // GarP_3,26.69 //
GP12garup3_u:3490: devasya vāmabhāge ca madhyadeśaṃ vihāya ca // GarP_3,26.71 //
GP12garup3_u:3493: pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhūvarāhasya marterdānaṃ dattvā śravaṇaṃ cāpi kṛtvā /
GP12garup3_u:3494: tatra sthitaṃ bhūvarāhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sa vai naraḥ kṛtakṛtyo hi loke // GarP_3,26.73 //
GP12garup3_u:3495: tatra snātvā bhūvarāhasya marteḥ śṛṇoti yo lakṣaṇaṃ samyageva /
