GP12garup3_u:3496: sa tena puṇyaṃ samupaiti devi sa muktibhāṅ nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,26.74 //
GP12garup3_u:3497: īśānakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi raudraṃ tīrthaṃ paramaṃ pāvanaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3498: tatra sthitvā rudradevo mahātmā pūjāṃ karoti śrīnivāsasya nityam // GarP_3,26.75 //
GP12garup3_u:3499: hastāṣṭakaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ vadanti tatra snānaṃ vaiṣṇavaiḥ kāryameva /
GP12garup3_u:3500: tatra snātvā prayato vai murāreḥ kathāṃ divyāṃ śṛṇuyādādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3501: snānaṃ pānaṃ tatra dānaṃ ca kuryāllakṣmīnṛsiṃhaprīyate devi nityam3,26.76 //
GP12garup3_u:3507: etā dṛśaṃ gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyā mūrterdānaṃ durghaṭaṃ viddhi vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:3508: tatra snātvā śrīnṛsiṃhasvarūpaṃ lakṣmīpateḥ śṛṇuyādbhaktiyuktaḥ // GarP_3,26.80 //
GP12garup3_u:3509: mūrterdānātphalamāpnoti devi satyaṃsatyaṃ nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,26.81 //
GP12garup3_u:3511: durlabhaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu snānaṃ sarvārthasādhakam // GarP_3,26.82 //
GP12garup3_u:3512: śālagrāmasya dānaṃ tu durlabhaṃ tatra vai nṛṇām /
GP12garup3_u:3515: chattrākāraṃ vartulaṃ ca prasannavadanaṃ śubham // GarP_3,26.84 //
GP12garup3_u:3517: savye dakṣiṇapārśve ca samayoḥ puṣkalānvitam // GarP_3,26.85 //
GP12garup3_u:3522: kalau nṛṇāṃ tasya lābho durlabhaḥ saṃsmṛto bhuvi /
GP12garup3_u:3523: dānaṃ ca sutarāṃ devi darlabhaṃ kiṃ vadāmi te // GarP_3,26.88 //
GP12garup3_u:3524: brahmatīrthe ca saṃsnāya śrotavyā vai hareḥ kathā /
GP12garup3_u:3526: lakṣaṇaṃ yo vijānāti tadā tatsadṛśaṃ phalam /
GP12garup3_u:3527: prāpnotyeva na saṃdeho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,26.90 //
GP12garup3_u:3529: śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ tu kartumāste śacīpatiḥ // GarP_3,26.91 //
GP12garup3_u:3533: dadāti bhūtale bhadre bhūpateḥ sadṛśo bhavet // GarP_3,26.93 //
GP12garup3_u:3541: etādṛśaṃ tu vai bhadre sītārāmābhidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,26.97 //
GP12garup3_u:3543: durlabhaṃ tu kalau nṝṇāṃ svasāmrājyapradaṃ śubham // GarP_3,26.98 //
GP12garup3_u:3545: yā taddānaṃ durlabhaṃ tannālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // GarP_3,26.99 //
GP12garup3_u:3546: dānasya śaktyabhāve tu śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3548: āgneyakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi tīrthaṃ tvāste vahnisaṃjñaṃ suśastam /
GP12garup3_u:3549: sa vahnidevaḥ śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ kartuṃ hyāste sarvadā tīrthamadhye // GarP_3,26.101 //
GP12garup3_u:3550: yo vā tīrthe vahnisaṃjñe ca devi bhaktyā snānaṃ kurute 'jaṃ smaranhi /
GP12garup3_u:3551: jñānadvārā mokṣamāpnoti devi tatra snānaṃ durllabhaṃ vai nṛṇāṃ ca // GarP_3,26.102 //
GP12garup3_u:3552: jñātvā snānaṃ duṣkaraṃ tīrtharāje bhaktistasmindurllabhā caiva devi /
GP12garup3_u:3553: śālagrāme tacchilāyāśca dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ vāsudevābhidhāyāḥ // GarP_3,26.103 //
GP12garup3_u:3554: hrasvaṃ tathā vartulaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ mukhaṃ mukhacakraṃ suśuddham /
GP12garup3_u:3555: suveṇuyuktaṃ vāsudevābhidheyaṃ dānaṃ kalau durlabhaṃ tasya bhadre // GarP_3,26.104 //
GP12garup3_u:3556: dāne tasyāḥ śaktya bhāve ca devi snātvā tīrthe vāsudevābhidhasya /
GP12garup3_u:3557: samyak śrāvyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai śilāyāstayostulyaṃ phalamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,26.105 //
GP12garup3_u:3559: tatrāste yamarājastu pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.106 //
GP12garup3_u:3560: tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ cāpyakṣayaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:3567: paṭṭavardhanarāmaṃ tu yo dadāti ca tatra vai /
GP12garup3_u:3568: paṭṭābhiṣikto bhavati nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,26.110 //
GP12garup3_u:3570: āste hi nirṛtistatra pūjāṃ kurtuṃ ca sarvadā // GarP_3,26.111 //
GP12garup3_u:3571: tatra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ punarjanma na vidyate /
GP12garup3_u:3573: mūrtiṃ dadāti yo martyaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup3_u:3577: tanmūrtidānaṃ durlabhaṃ tatra devaḥ prīṇāti yasmācchrīnivāso mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3578: yadā dānaṃ durghaṭaṃ syācca devi tadā śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya mūrteḥ // GarP_3,26.115 //
GP12garup3_u:3580: tatra snātvā śeṣamūrtiṃ pradadāti dvijātaye // GarP_3,26.116 //
GP12garup3_u:3589: iha loke paratrāpi mokṣadā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3590: navacakrādupakramya viṃśatyantaṃ ca yatra saḥ // GarP_3,26.121 //
GP12garup3_u:3592: viśvaṃbharaḥ sa vijñeyo viṃśatyūrdhvaṃ varānane // GarP_3,26.122 //
GP12garup3_u:3594: kalau tu durlabhaṃ naṇāṃ taddānaṃ cātidurlabham // GarP_3,26.123 //
GP12garup3_u:3596: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā prayāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_3,26.124 //
GP12garup3_u:3598: tatrāste varuṇo devaḥ pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.125 //
GP12garup3_u:3600: śiśumāraṃ ca matsyaṃ ca trivikramamathāpi vā /
GP12garup3_u:3603: cakratrayā ca vadane pucchopari sacakrakā // GarP_3,26.127 //
GP12garup3_u:3607: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā vāruṇe tīrtha uttame // GarP_3,26.129 //
GP12garup3_u:3609: pūrvauktā mūrtayo yasmin gṛhe tiṣṭhanti bhāmini /
GP12garup3_u:3610: bhāgīrathī tīrthavarā saṃnidhatte na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,26.130 //
GP12garup3_u:3611: svāmi puṣkariṇīsnānaṃ durghaṭaṃ tu kalau nṛṇām /
GP12garup3_u:3612: tatra sthitānāṃ tīrthānāṃ snānaṃ cāpyatidurghaṭam // GarP_3,26.131 //
GP12garup3_u:3617: snānaṃ kuru yathānyā yaṃ śayyādānaṃ tathā kuru /
GP12garup3_u:3618: jaigīṣavyena muninā tvevamuktā ca kanyakā // GarP_3,26.134 //
GP12garup3_u:3620: tīrtheṣveteṣu susnātā dānaṃ cakre subhāminī // GarP_3,26.135 //
GP12garup3_u:3621: uvāsa tatra sā davī triḥ saptakandināni ca /
GP12garup3_u:3623: sa yāti paramāṃ bhaktiṃ śrīnivāse jaganmaye // GarP_3,26.136 //
GP12garup3_u:3624: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vyaṅkaṭagirimāhātmye svāmipuṣkariṇyāditīrthatatratyadevatadīyaśālagrāmalakṣaṇa taddānādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3628: papraccha taṃ guruṃ vipraṃ vinayāvanatā sudhīḥ // GarP_3,27.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3629: kinnāmeyaṃ nadī vipra kiṃ kāryaṃ cātra me vada /
GP12garup3_u:3633: iyaṃ nadī mahābhāge sadā pāpavināśinī // GarP_3,27.3 //
GP12garup3_u:3635: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate hyatra snānaṃ kartuṃ samudyataiḥ // GarP_3,27.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3637: yāvacchubhrodakaṃ devi tāvatsanānaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_3,27.5 //
GP12garup3_u:3639: śuddhodake samāyāte pāpaṃ naṣṭamiti dhruvam // GarP_3,27.6 //
GP12garup3_u:3641: atra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ dātavyaṃ dāna muttamam /
GP12garup3_u:3642: tataśca jñānamāsādya viviṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_3,27.7 //
GP12garup3_u:3646: sūtasya hananādrāmo nirmukto hyatra bhāmini // GarP_3,27.9 //
GP12garup3_u:3647: nānena sadṛśaṃ tīrthaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3648: snānaṃ kuru mahābhāge tena siddhiṃ hyavāpsyasi // GarP_3,27.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3649: jaigīṣavyeṇa muninā pitrā saha ca kanyakā /
GP12garup3_u:3651: yāvacca pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ tāvatkālaṃ hi tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup3_u:3655: kumārīmahimānaṃ ca śrutvā snānaṃ cakāra sā /
GP12garup3_u:3656: punarāvṛtya sā devī hyantarā virajānadīm // GarP_3,27.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3657: dṛṣṭvā papraccha sā devī jaigīṣavyaṃ guruṃ prabhum /
GP12garup3_u:3658: kiṃ saṃjñikeyaṃ viprendra kiṃ kāryaṃ hyatra me vada // GarP_3,27.15 //
GP12garup3_u:3660: iyaṃ bhāgīrathī kanye āyāti hyantareṇa tu // GarP_3,27.16 //
GP12garup3_u:3662: kanye tvasyāstu salilaṃ śrīninivāsapriyaṃ sadā // GarP_3,27.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3663: atra snānaṃ yaḥ karoti sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup3_u:3664: snānaṃ cakāra sā kanyā jale paramapāvane // GarP_3,27.18 //
GP12garup3_u:3665: dānādikaṃ tathā jñātvā jajāpa paramaṃ manum /
GP12garup3_u:3670: snānaṃ kṛtvā mahābhāgā yayau tuṃburusaṃjñikām // GarP_3,27.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3671: papraccha taṃ guruṃ devī nāthaṃ kinnāmikā tvayam /
GP12garup3_u:3673: iyaṃ tuṃbarukābhijñā nārī vai varavarṇinī // GarP_3,27.22 //
GP12garup3_u:3674: purā tuṃ buruṇā sākaṃ nāradastapasi sthitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3676: snānaṃ yaḥ kurute hyatra sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup3_u:3677: atra snānaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kalau // GarP_3,27.24 //
GP12garup3_u:3678: atra snānaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam /
GP12garup3_u:3679: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca dattvā dānānyakeśaḥ // GarP_3,27.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3680: punarāgatya sā devī śrīnivāsaṃ nanāma ha /
GP12garup3_u:3686: kapilākhyordhvadeśe tu tattīrthaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,27.28 //
GP12garup3_u:3689: tata ūrdhvaṃ mahābhāgā yayau tatra dadarśa sā /
GP12garup3_u:3690: pañcāyudhānāṃ tīrthāni teṣu snānaṃ cakāra sā // GarP_3,27.30 //
GP12garup3_u:3693: saptarṣīṇāṃ tadūrdhvaṃ tu puṇyatīrthaṃ ca satphalam /
GP12garup3_u:3695: eteṣāṃ caiva māhātmyaṃ ko vā vaktumihārhati /
GP12garup3_u:3696: ṛṣitīrtheṣu sā kanyā cacāra tapa uttamam // GarP_3,27.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3698: yogadhāraṇa yā dehaṃ tyaktvā jāṃbavato gṛhe // GarP_3,27.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3699: jātā jāṃbavatī nāma vavṛdhe tasya veśmani /
GP12garup3_u:3701: rukmyā anaṃ tarā saiṣā mama bhāryā khageśvara // GarP_3,27.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3703: ko vā varṇayituṃ śakto madanyaḥ puruṣo bhuvi // GarP_3,27.36 //
GP12garup3_u:3704: veṅkaṭeśasya naivedyaṃ sadā lakṣmīḥ karoti vai /
GP12garup3_u:3705: brahmā pūjayate nityamevaṃ śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ // GarP_3,27.37 //
GP12garup3_u:3708: grāhyameva na saṃdeho anyathā nārakī bhavet // GarP_3,27.38 //
GP12garup3_u:3709: śrīnivāsātparo devo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3712: idaṃ tu paramaṃ gopyaṃ tavoktaṃ ca khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:3714: itaḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tāratamyaṃ śṛṇu prabho // GarP_3,27.40 //
GP12garup3_u:3715: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe utta dṛ tṛ dṛ brahma dṛ kanyākṛtanānātīrthayātrādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3717: yā pūrvasarge dakṣaputrī satī tu rudrasya patnī dakṣayajñe svadeham /
GP12garup3_u:3718: visṛjya sā menakāyāṃ ca jajñe dharādharāddhemavato vai sakāśāt // GarP_3,28.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3719: sā pārvatā rudrapatnī khagendra yā śeṣapatnī vāruṇī nāma pūrvā /
GP12garup3_u:3720: saivāgatā balabhadreṇa rantuṃ dvirūpamāsthāya mahāpativratā // GarP_3,28.2 //
GP12garup3_u:3721: śrīrityākhyā indirāveśayuktā tasyā dvitīyā pratimā megharūpā /
GP12garup3_u:3722: śeṣaṇa rūpeṇa yadā hi vīndra tapaścacāra viṣṇunā sārdhameva // GarP_3,28.3 //
GP12garup3_u:3723: tadaiva devī vāruṇī śeṣapatnī tapaśca kre indirāprītaye ca /
GP12garup3_u:3724: tadā prītā indirā suprasannā uvāca tāṃ vāruṇīṃ śeṣapatnīm // GarP_3,28.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3725: yadā rāmo vaiṣṇavāṃśena yuktaḥ saṃpatsyate bhūtale rauhiṇeyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3726: mayyāveśātsaṃyutā tvaṃ tu bhadre śrīrityākhyā valabhadrasya rantum // GarP_3,28.5 //
GP12garup3_u:3727: saṃpatsyase nātra vicāryamastītyuktvā sā vai prayayau viṣṇuloke /
GP12garup3_u:3728: śrīlakṣmyaṃśācchrīritīḍyāṃ samākhyāṃ labdhvā loke śeṣapatnī babhūva // GarP_3,28.6 //
GP12garup3_u:3729: yadāhīśo vipulāmuddharecca tadā rāmaḥ śrībhidāsaṃgame ca /
GP12garup3_u:3730: karoti toṣatsarvadā vai ramāyāstasyāpyāveśo vyaṃstritamonasaṃgam // GarP_3,28.7 //
GP12garup3_u:3731: yā revatī raivatasyaiva putrī sā vāruṇī balabhadrasya patnī /
GP12garup3_u:3732: sauparṇanāmnī balapatnī khagendra yāstāstisraḥ ṣaḍviṣṇośca strībhyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3733: dviguṇādhamā rudraśeṣādikebhyo daśādhamā tvaṃ vijānīhi pautra // GarP_3,28.8 //
GP12garup3_u:3735: rāmeṇa rantuṃ sarvadā vāruṇī tu putrītvamāpe revatasyaiva subhrūḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3736: evaṃ trirūpā vāruṇī śeṣapatnī dvirūpabhūtā pārvatī rudrapatnī // GarP_3,28.9 //
GP12garup3_u:3738: śrūyate ca mayā kṛṣṇa nimittaṃ brūhi me prabho // GarP_3,28.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3740: evaṃ tvayoktaṃ bhagavanniścayārthaṃ mama prabho // GarP_3,28.11 //
GP12garup3_u:3741: revatī śrīyutā śrīśca śeṣarūpā ca vāruṇī /
GP12garup3_u:3742: sauparṇi pārvatī caiva tisraḥ śeṣāśato varāḥ // GarP_3,28.12 //
GP12garup3_u:3744: nimittaṃ brūhi me kṛṣṇa tavaśiṣyāya suvrata // GarP_3,28.13 //
GP12garup3_u:3747: uttamānāṃ ca sāmyaṃ tu uttamāveśato bhavet // GarP_3,28.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3750: yathā mayocyate vīndra tathā jānīhi nānyathā /
GP12garup3_u:3753: vṛtrādīnāṃ śarīraṃ tu puramityucyate budhaiḥ // GarP_3,28.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3757: mantradyumnastato loke ubhāvapyeka eva tu // GarP_3,28.19 //
GP12garup3_u:3761: caturthepi ca vāyośca viśeṣosti sadārjuna // GarP_3,28.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3765: vedoktamantrā gāḥ proktā dhiyā saṃdhārayedyataḥ // GarP_3,28.23 //
GP12garup3_u:3769: viśeṣeṇa hariṃ kukṣau vijñānācca hariḥ sadā // GarP_3,28.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3771: rāmaputraḥ kuśaḥ prokta indra eva prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,28.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3773: ataḥ kuśa iti prokto jānakīnandanaḥ prabhuḥ // GarP_3,28.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3775: vikukṣiḥ kuśa evaite sapta cendrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,28.28 //
GP12garup3_u:3776: yaḥ kṛṣṇaputtraḥ pradyumnaḥ kāma eva prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3783: yo rudraputraḥ skandastu kāma eva prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,28.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3784: ripūnāskaṃ date nityamataḥ skanda iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3786: kāmāvatāro vijñeyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,28.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3787: sudarśanaśca paramaḥ pradyumnaḥ sāṃba eva ca /
GP12garup3_u:3790: tayormadhye tu garuḍa kāma indrādhamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,28.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3796: sa evābhūddhareḥ sevāṃ kartuṃ rāmānujo bhuvi // GarP_3,28.38 //
GP12garup3_u:3800: evaṃ dvirūpo vijñeyo hyaniruddho mahāmatiḥ // GarP_3,28.40 //
GP12garup3_u:3804: duryodhanasya yā putrī lakṣaṇā sā ratiḥ smṛtā // GarP_3,28.42 //
GP12garup3_u:3805: kāṣṭhā sāṃbasya bhāryā sā lakṣaṇaṃ saṃyunaktyataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3807: evaṃ dvirūpā vijñeyā kāmabhāryā ratiḥ smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:3809: rājadharmeṇa viṣṇośca jātaḥ prīṇayituṃ hareḥ // GarP_3,28.44 //
GP12garup3_u:3811: rāmāvatāre bharatākhyo babhūva hyaṃbhojajāveśayuto bṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_3,28.45 //
GP12garup3_u:3813: ato hyasau nāranāmā babhūva hyaṅgatvamāptuṃ rāmadevasya bhūmyām // GarP_3,28.46 //
GP12garup3_u:3815: yasmāddoṇātsaṃbhabhūva guruśca tasmādasau droṇasaṃjño babhūva // GarP_3,28.47 //
GP12garup3_u:3816: bhūbhārabhūtādyuddhṛtau hyaṅgabhūto viṣṇoḥ sevāṃ kartumevāsa bhūmau /
GP12garup3_u:3818: yasmādutkṛṣṭo hariratra samyagato hyasau budhavannāma cāpa /
GP12garup3_u:3819: sakhā hyabhūtkṛṣṇadevasya nityaṃ mahāmatiḥ sarvalokeṣu pujvaḥ // GarP_3,28.49 //
GP12garup3_u:3821: kanyāṃ sṛṣṭvā hareḥ prīṇannāsa bhūmā prajāpatiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3823: śacīṃ bharyāṃ devarājasya viddhi tasyā hyavatāraṃ śṛṇu samyak khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:3824: rāmāvatāre nāma tārā babhūva sā vālipatnī śacīsajakā ca // GarP_3,28.51 //
GP12garup3_u:3825: rāmānmṛte vālisaṃjñe patau hi sugrīvasaṃgaṃ sā cakārātha tārā /
GP12garup3_u:3826: ato nāgātsvargalokaṃ ca tārā kva vā yāyādantarikṣe na pāpā // GarP_3,28.52 //
GP12garup3_u:3827: kṛṣṇāvatāre saiva tārā ca vīndra babhūva bhūmau vijayasya patnī /
GP12garup3_u:3828: piśaṅgadeti hyabhidhā syācca tasyāḥ sāmīpyamasyāstvajuṃnaveva cāsīt // GarP_3,28.53 //
GP12garup3_u:3829: utpādayitvā babhruvāhaṃ ca putraṃ tasyāṃ tyaktvā hyarjuno vai mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3830: ataścobhe vāracitrāṅgade ca śacīrūpe nātra vivāryamasti // GarP_3,28.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3831: pulomajā mantradyumnasya bhāryā yā kāśikā gādhirājasya bhāryā /
GP12garup3_u:3832: vikukṣibhāryā sumatiśceti saṃjñā kuśasya patnī kāntimatīti saṃjñā // GarP_3,28.55 //
GP12garup3_u:3833: etā hi sapta hyavarāśca śacyā jānīhi vai nāsti vicāraṇātra /
GP12garup3_u:3836: atha yaḥ pravaho vāyurmukhyavāyoḥ suto balī /
GP12garup3_u:3837: sa vāyuṣu mahānadya sa vai koṇādhipastathā // GarP_3,28.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3838: nāsikāsu sa evokto bhautikastulya eva ca /
GP12garup3_u:3839: ativāhaḥ sa evoktaḥ yato gamyo mumukṣubhiḥ // GarP_3,28.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3842: pravahaśceti saṃjñāṃ sa kimarthaṃ prāpa tadvada // GarP_3,28.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3843: arthaḥ kaścāsti tannāmnaḥ pratītastaṃ vadasva me /
GP12garup3_u:3845: uvāca paramaprītaḥ saṃstūya garuḍaṃ hariḥ // GarP_3,28.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3850: mayoktametattu satyaṃ na mithyā gṛhṇāmi hastenoragaṃ kopayuktam // GarP_3,28.62 //
GP12garup3_u:3851: sarvaṃ nu satyaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatuhyahīndraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3853: etasya saṃdhāraṇādeva vīndra sa vāyuputraḥ pravahetyāpa saṃjñām /
GP12garup3_u:3854: yo vā loke viṣṇumūrtiṃ vihāya daityasvarūpā reṇukādyāḥ kudevāḥ // GarP_3,28.64 //
GP12garup3_u:3855: teṣāṃ tathā matpitṝṇāṃ ca pūjā vyarthā satyaṃ satyametadbravīmi /
GP12garup3_u:3856: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.65 //
GP12garup3_u:3857: pitryaṃ nayāmi pravihāyaiva ye tu pitruddeśātkevalaṃ yaḥ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:3858: sa pāpātmā narakānvai prayātītyetadvākyaṃ satyametadbravīmi // GarP_3,28.66 //
GP12garup3_u:3859: na śrīḥ svatantrā nāpi vidhiḥ svatantro na vāyudevo nāpi śivaḥ svatantraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3860: tadanye no gauripuloma jādyāḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ nātra loke svatantraḥ // GarP_3,28.67 //
GP12garup3_u:3861: bravīmi satyaṃ puruṣo viṣṇureva satyaṃ satya bhujamuddhṛtya satyam /
GP12garup3_u:3862: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndra // GarP_3,28.68 //
GP12garup3_u:3863: jīvaśca satyaḥ paramātmā ca satyastayorbhedaḥ satye e tatsadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3864: jaḍaścasatyo jīvajaḍayośca bhedo bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ ca jaḍaiśayorbhidā // GarP_3,28.69 //
GP12garup3_u:3865: bhedaḥ satyaḥ sarvajīveṣu nityaṃ satyā jaḍānāṃ ca bhedā sadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3866: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau daśatu māṃ hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.70 //
GP12garup3_u:3868: etasya saṃdhāraṇādevavīdre sā vāyuputraḥ pravahetyāpa saṃjñām // GarP_3,28.71 //
GP12garup3_u:3869: dvayaṃ svarūpaṃ praviditvaiva pūrvaṃ tvaṃ svīkuruṣva dvayameva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3870: snānādikaṃ ca prakaroti nityaṃ pāpī sa ātmā naiva mokṣaṃ prayāti // GarP_3,28.72 //
GP12garup3_u:3871: tasmāddvayaṃ pravicāryaiva nityaṃ sukhī bhavennātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:3872: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.73 //
GP12garup3_u:3874: kiṃ taddvayaṃ devadeveśa kiṃ vā tatkāraṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3875: dvayostyāgaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva tyāgātsukhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva // GarP_3,28.74 //
GP12garup3_u:3877: dvayaṃ cāhustvindriye dve baliṣṭhe dehe hyasmiñ śrotranetre susṛṣṭe /
GP12garup3_u:3878: avāntare śrotranetre khagendra dvayaṃ cāhustatsvarūpaṃ ca vakṣye // GarP_3,28.75 //
GP12garup3_u:3879: śrotrasvabhāvo loka vārtāśrutau ca hyatīva modastvādarāsvādanena /
GP12garup3_u:3880: harervārtāśravaṇe duḥ khajālaṃ śrotrasvabhāvo jaḍatā damaśca // GarP_3,28.76 //
GP12garup3_u:3881: netrasvabhāvo darśane strīnarāṇāṃ hyatyādarānnāsti nidrādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3882: harerbhaktānāṃ darśane duḥ kharūpo viṣṇoḥ pūjādarśane duḥ khajālam // GarP_3,28.77 //
GP12garup3_u:3883: tayoḥ svarūpaṃ praviditvaiva pūrvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ svīkarotyeva mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3884: śiśraṃ maurkhyāccaiva kutrāpi yonau praveśayetsarvadā hyādareṇa // GarP_3,28.78 //
GP12garup3_u:3885: bhayaṃ ca lajjā naiva cāste vadhūnāṃ tathā nṛṇāṃ vanitānāṃ yatīnām /
GP12garup3_u:3886: svasāraṃ te hyaviditvā dinepi suvāma yajñena svābhāvaśca vīndra // GarP_3,28.79 //
GP12garup3_u:3888: tatho pahārasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ abhakṣyāṇāṃ bhakṣaṇe tatsvabhāvaḥ // GarP_3,28.80 //
GP12garup3_u:3889: alehyalehasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ pātuṃ tvapeyasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3890: dvayoḥ svarūpaṃ ca vihāya mūḍhaḥ punaḥ punaḥ svīkarotyeva nityam // GarP_3,28.81 //
GP12garup3_u:3891: tasya snānaṃ vyarthamāhuśca yasmāttasmāttyājyaṃ na dvayoḥ kāryameva /
GP12garup3_u:3892: abhiprāyaṃ hyetamevaṃ khagendra jānīhi tvaṃ prahasyaiva nityam // GarP_3,28.82 //
GP12garup3_u:3893: bhāryādvayaṃ hyaviditvā svarūpaṃ svīkṛtya caikāṃ pravihāyaiva caikām /
GP12garup3_u:3894: snānādikaṃ kurute mūḍhabūddhiḥ vyarthaṃ cāhurmokṣabhogau ca naiva /
GP12garup3_u:3895: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.83 //
GP12garup3_u:3897: bhāryādvayaṃ kiṃ vada tvaṃ mamāpi tayoḥ svarūpaṃ kiṃ vada tvaṃ murāre /
GP12garup3_u:3898: tayormadhye grāhyabhāryāṃ vada tvamagrāhyabhāryāṃ cāpi samyagvada tvam // GarP_3,28.84 //
GP12garup3_u:3900: buddhiḥ patnī sā dvirūpā khagendra duṣṭā caikā tvaparā suṣṭhurūpā /
GP12garup3_u:3901: tayormadhye duṣṭarūpā kaniṣṭhā jyeṣṭhā tu yā suṣṭhubuddhisvarūpā // GarP_3,28.85 //
GP12garup3_u:3902: kaniṣṭhayā naṣṭatāṃ yāti jīvaḥ sutiṣṭhantyā yāti yogyāṃ pratiṣṭhām /
GP12garup3_u:3903: kaniṣṭhāyāḥ śṛṇu vakṣye svarūpaṃ śrutvā tasyāstyāgabuddhiṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.86 //
GP12garup3_u:3904: jīvaṃ yaṃ vai prerayantī kaniṣṭhā kāmyaṃ dharmaṃ kurute sarvadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3905: kva brāhmaṇāḥ kva ca viṣṇurmahātmā kva vai kathā kva ca yajñāḥ kvagāvaḥ // GarP_3,28.87 //
GP12garup3_u:3906: kva cāśvatthaḥ kva ca snānaṃ kva śaucametatsarvaṃ nāma nāśaṃ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:3907: mūḍhaṃ patiṃ reṇukāṃ pūjayasva māyādevyā dīpadānaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.88 //
GP12garup3_u:3908: subhairavādīn bhaja mūḍha tvamandha hāridracūrṇandhārayeḥ sarvadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3909: jyeṣṭhāṣṭamyāṃ jyeṣṭhadevīṃ bhajasva bhaktyā sūtraṃ galabandhaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.89 //
GP12garup3_u:3910: marigandhāṣṭamyāṃ marigandhaṃ bhajasva tathā sūtraṃ svagale dhārayasva /
GP12garup3_u:3911: dīpastaṃbhaṃ sudine pūjayasva tatsūtrameva svagale dhārayasva // GarP_3,28.90 //
GP12garup3_u:3912: mahālakṣmīṃ cādyalakṣmīṃ ca samyak pūjāṃ kuru tvaṃ hi bhaktyātha jīva /
GP12garup3_u:3913: lakṣmīsūtraṃ svāgale dhārayasva mahālakṣmīvān bhavasītyuttaratra // GarP_3,28.91 //
GP12garup3_u:3915: suvāsinīḥ pūjayasvāśu bhaktyā gandhaiḥ puṣpairdhūpadīpaiḥ pratoṣya // GarP_3,28.92 //
GP12garup3_u:3917: picumandapatrāṇi vitatya bhūmau namasva tvaṃ kṣamyatāṃ ceti coktvā // GarP_3,28.93 //
GP12garup3_u:3918: mahādevīṃ pūjayasvādya bhaktyā sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ mā dadasvāpyathānnam /
GP12garup3_u:3919: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ yadi vānnaṃ dadāsi bhāgyaṃ ca te paśyato nāśameti // GarP_3,28.94 //
GP12garup3_u:3920: svavāmahaste veṇupātre nidhāya dīpaṃ dhṛtvā savyahaste pate tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3921: uttiṣṭha bhoḥ pañcagṛheṣu bhikṣāṃ kuruṣva samyak pravihāyaiva lajjām // GarP_3,28.95 //
GP12garup3_u:3922: ādau gṛhe ṣaḍrasānnaṃ ca kutvā jagadgopyaṃ bhojanaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3923: taccheṣānnaṃ bhojayitvā pate tvaṃ tāsāṃ ca re śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.96 //
GP12garup3_u:3924: tāsaṃ hastaṃ pustake stāpayitvā trāhityevaṃ tanmukhairvācayasva /
GP12garup3_u:3926: taiḥ sārdhaṃ tvaṃ śvānaśabdaṃ kuruṣva haridrācūrṇaṃsarvadā tvaṃ dadhasva /
GP12garup3_u:3927: kuruṣva tvaṃ bhīmasenasya pūjāṃ pañcāmṛtaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiścopacāraiḥ // GarP_3,28.98 //
GP12garup3_u:3928: tatkaupīnaṃ raupyajaṃ kārayitvā samarpayitvā dīpamālāṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3929: taddāsavaryān bhojayasvādya bhaktyā garjasva tvaṃ bhīmabhīmeti suṣṭhu // GarP_3,28.99 //
GP12garup3_u:3931: mahādevaṃ pūjayasvādya samyag mahārudrairatirudraiśca samyak // GarP_3,28.100 //
GP12garup3_u:3933: śākaṃbharīṃ vivisaḥ sarvaśākānsupācayitvā ca gṛhe gṛhe ca // GarP_3,28.101 //
GP12garup3_u:3935: kulādevaṃ pūjayasvādya bhaktyā tvaṃ dṛgbhyāṃ vai taddine śaṃbhubuddhyā // GarP_3,28.102 //
GP12garup3_u:3936: tadbhaktavaryānpūjayasvādya samyak tatpādamūle vandanaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3937: supañcamyāṃ mṛnmayīṃ śeṣamūrtiṃ pūjāṃ kuruṣva kṣīralājādikaiśca // GarP_3,28.103 //
GP12garup3_u:3938: sunāgapāśaṃ hi gale ca baddhvā taccheṣānnaṃ bhojayerbhoḥ punastvam /
GP12garup3_u:3939: dine caturthe bhoja yasvādya bhaktyā naivedyānnaṃ bhojayasvādya suṣṭhu // GarP_3,28.104 //
GP12garup3_u:3940: ityādikaṃ prerayitvā patiṃ sā jīvena naṣṭaṃ prikarotyeva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3941: tasyāḥ saṃgājjīvarūpaḥ patistvāṃ samyagdaṣṭāmihaloke paratra // GarP_3,28.105 //
GP12garup3_u:3942: tasyāḥ saṃgaṃ suvidūraṃ visṛjyaceṣṭvā samagraṃ kuru sarvadā tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3943: subuddhirūpā tvīrayantī jagāda bhajasva viṣṇuṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,28.106 //
GP12garup3_u:3944: hariṃ vinānyaṃ na bhajasva nityaṃ sā reṇukā tvāṃ tu na pālayiṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3945: adṛṣṭanāmā haririve hi nityaṃ phalaprado yadi na syātkhagendra // GarP_3,28.107 //
GP12garup3_u:3946: jugupsitāṃ śrutyanuktāṃ ca devīṃ patidruhāṃ sarvadā sevayitvā /
GP12garup3_u:3947: tasyāḥ prasādātkuṣṭhabhagandarādyairbhuktvā duḥ khaṃ saṃyaminīṃ prayāhi // GarP_3,28.108 //
GP12garup3_u:3948: tadā kudavī kutra gatā vadasvame hyataḥ pate tvaṃ na bhajasva devīm /
GP12garup3_u:3949: pate bhaja tvaṃ brāhmaṇānvaiṣṇavāṃśca saṃsāraduḥ khāttāransuṣṭhurūpān // GarP_3,28.109 //
GP12garup3_u:3950: sevādikaṃ pravīhāyaiva svacchaṃ māyādevyā bhajanātkiṃ vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3951: jyeṣṭhāṣṭamyāṃ jyeṣṭhadevīṃ hyalakṣmīṃ lakṣmīti buddhyā pūjayitvā ca samyak // GarP_3,28.110 //
GP12garup3_u:3952: tasyāḥ sūtraṃ galabaddhaṃ ca kṛtvā nānāduḥ khaṃ hyanubhūyāḥ pate tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3953: yadā pate yamādūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaiḥ kaśābhiḥ // GarP_3,28.111 //
GP12garup3_u:3954: tadā hyalakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
GP12garup3_u:3955: pate bhaja tvaṃ sarvadā vāyutattvaṃ na cāśrayestvaṃ sūkṣmaskandaṃ ca mūḍha // GarP_3,28.112 //
GP12garup3_u:3956: tadvattaṃ tvaṃ navanītaṃ ca bhaktyā taducchiṣṭaṃ bhakṣayitvā pate hi /
GP12garup3_u:3957: tasyāśca sūtraṃ galabaddhaṃ ca kṛtvā ihaiva duḥ khānyanubhūyāḥ pate tvam // GarP_3,28.113 //
GP12garup3_u:3958: yadā pate yamadūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3959: tadā skandaḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva // GarP_3,28.114 //
GP12garup3_u:3960: dīpastaṃbhaṃ dāpayitvā pate tvaṃ sūtraṃ ca baddhvā svagale ca bhaktyā /
GP12garup3_u:3961: tadā baddhvā yamadūtaiśca pāśairdīpastaṃbhaistāḍyamānastu samyak // GarP_3,28.115 //
GP12garup3_u:3962: dīpastaṃbhaḥ kutra palāyitobhūdato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
GP12garup3_u:3963: lakṣmīdine pūjayitvā ca lakṣmīṃ sūtraṃ tasyāḥ svagale dhāraya tvam // GarP_3,28.116 //
GP12garup3_u:3964: yadā pate yamadūtaiśca pāśairbadhvā samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3965: tadā lakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva // GarP_3,28.117 //
GP12garup3_u:3967: varārārtikaṃ kāṃsyapātre nidhāya kṛtvārtikyaṃ udaudaiti śabdam // GarP_3,28.118 //
GP12garup3_u:3968: tathaiva daṣṭvā picumandasya patraṃ sunartayitvā paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3969: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvābaddhvā tāḍyamānaśca samyak // GarP_3,28.119 //
GP12garup3_u:3970: tava svāminkuladevo mahātmanpalāyitaḥ kutra me tadvadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3971: svadehānāṃ pūjayitvā ca samyakkaṇṭhābharaṇairvidhurāṇāṃ ca keśaiḥ // GarP_3,28.120 //
GP12garup3_u:3973: yadā tadā kutra palāyitā sā keśairvihīnā laṃbakarṇaṃ ca kṛtvā // GarP_3,28.121 //
GP12garup3_u:3974: svavāmahaste veṇupātraṃ nidhāya dīpaṃ dhṛtvā savyahaste ca mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3975: gṛhegṛhe bhaikṣacaryāṃ ca kṛtvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne svagṛhaṃ caiva devī // GarP_3,28.122 //
GP12garup3_u:3976: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca mūḍha dīpaiḥ sahasrairdahyamānaśca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:3977: nirnāsikā reṇukā mūḍhabuddhe palāyitā kutra sā me vadasva // GarP_3,28.123 //
GP12garup3_u:3978: sadā mūḍhaṃ khaḍgadevaṃ ca bhaktyā taṃ bhaktavatpūjayitvā ca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:3979: taiḥ sārdhaṃ tvaṃ śvānavadgarjayitvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne svagṛhe caiva nityam // GarP_3,28.124 //
GP12garup3_u:3980: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamānastatra śabdaṃ prakurvan /
GP12garup3_u:3981: saṃtiṣṭhamāne bhaktavaryaṃ vihāya tadā devaḥ kutra palāyitobhūt // GarP_3,28.125 //
GP12garup3_u:3982: sa pārthakyādbhīmasenapratīkaṃ pañcāmṛtaiḥ pūjayitvā ca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:3983: suvyañjane cānnakaupīnameva dattvā mūḍhastiṣṭhamāne svagehe // GarP_3,28.126 //
GP12garup3_u:3984: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne yamamārge ca mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3985: bhīmaḥ sa vai kutra palāyitobhūto mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva // GarP_3,28.127 //
GP12garup3_u:3986: mahādevaṃ pūjayitvā ca samyak haretyuktvā svagṛhe vidyamāne /
GP12garup3_u:3987: yadā gṛhaṃ dahyate vahninā tu tadā haraḥ kutra palāyitobhūt // GarP_3,28.128 //
GP12garup3_u:3988: śākaṃ bharīdivase sarvameva śākaṃbharī sā ca devī mahātman /
GP12garup3_u:3989: palāyitā kutra me tvaṃ vadasva kulāladevaṃ pūjayitvā ca bhaktyā // GarP_3,28.129 //
GP12garup3_u:3990: kārpāsaṃ vai tena dattaṃ gṛhītvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne yamadūtaiśca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:3992: vihāya vai kutra palāyitobhūnna jñāyate 'nveṣaṇāccāpi kena // GarP_3,28.1130 //
GP12garup3_u:3993: yadā pañcamyāṃ mṛnmayīṃ śeṣamūrtiṃ saṃpūjya bhaktyā vidyamāne svagehe /
GP12garup3_u:3994: tadā baddhvā yamadūtāśca samyak saṃnahyamāne nāgapāśaiścabaddhvā // GarP_3,28.131 //
GP12garup3_u:3995: svabhaktavaryaṃ pravihāya nāgaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra vai saṃvada tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3997: saṃtiṣṭhaṃmāne yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne taptadaṇḍaiśca mūḍha /
GP12garup3_u:3998: dantaṃ vihāyaiva ca vighnarājaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra me taṃ vadatvam // GarP_3,28.133 //
GP12garup3_u:3999: vivāhakāle piṣṭadevīṃ subhaktyā saṃpūjayitvā vidyamāno gṛhe sve /
GP12garup3_u:4000: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃpīḍyamāno yamamārge sa mūḍhaḥ // GarP_3,28.134 //
GP12garup3_u:4001: viṣṭhādevī pīḍyamānaṃ ca bhaktaṃ vihāya sā kutra palāyitābhūt /
GP12garup3_u:4002: vivāhakāle rajakasya gehaṃ gatvā samyak prārthayitvā ca mūḍhaḥ // GarP_3,28.135 //
GP12garup3_u:4003: yastaṃbhasūtraṃ kalaśe parītya pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyamāno gṛhe sve /
GP12garup3_u:4004: yadā tadā yamadūtaśca samyak taṃ staṃbhasūtraṃ tasya mukhe nidhāya // GarP_3,28.136 //
GP12garup3_u:4005: saṃtāḍyamāne saṃtabhasūtrasthadevī palāyitā kutra me saṃvadasva /
GP12garup3_u:4006: vivāhakāle pūjayitvā ca samyak caṇḍāladevīṃ bhaktavaśyāṃ ca tasyāḥ // GarP_3,28.137 //
GP12garup3_u:4007: tadbhaktavaryaiḥ śūrpamadhye ca tīre saṃsevayitvā vidyamāno gṛhesve /
GP12garup3_u:4008: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāno yamamārge mahadbhiḥ // GarP_3,28.138 //
GP12garup3_u:4010: jvarādibhiḥ pīḍyamāne svaputre gṛhe sthitaṃ brahmadevaṃ ca samyak // GarP_3,28.139 //
GP12garup3_u:4011: dhūrpairdīpairbhakṣyabhojyaiśca puṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyamānaśca gehe /
GP12garup3_u:4012: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāne veṇupāśādibhiśca // GarP_3,28.140 //
GP12garup3_u:4013: sa brahmadevaḥ kva palāyitobhūtsumūḍhabuddhe viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
GP12garup3_u:4014: santānārthaṃ bṛhatīṃ pūjayitvā galena baddhvā bṛhatīṃ vai phalaṃ ca // GarP_3,28.141 //
GP12garup3_u:4016: tadā devī bṛhatī mūḍhabuddhe palāyitā kutra me tadvada tvam // GarP_3,28.142 //
GP12garup3_u:4017: bhajasva mūḍha paradaivataṃ ca nārāyaṇaṃ tārakaṃ sarvaduḥ khāt /
GP12garup3_u:4018: sukṣudradeveṣu matiṃ ca mā kuru na ca śṛṇu tvaṃ phalguvākyaṃ tathaiva // GarP_3,28.143 //
GP12garup3_u:4019: sukṣudradevān bhindipāle nidhāya visarjayitvā dūradeśe mahātman /
GP12garup3_u:4020: saṃdhārya tvaṃ svakulācāradharmaṃ saṃpātane narakaṃ hetubhūtam // GarP_3,28.144 //
GP12garup3_u:4021: punīhi gātraṃ sarvadā mūḍhabuddhe mantrāṣṭakairjanmatīrthe pavitre /
GP12garup3_u:4022: hṛdi sthitāṃmārairvyamudrāṃ vihāya kṛtvābhūṣāṃ viṣṇumudrābhiragryām // GarP_3,28.145 //
GP12garup3_u:4023: sadā mūḍho harivārtāṃ bhajasva hyāyurgataṃ vyarthamevaṃ kubuddhyā /
GP12garup3_u:4024: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ saṃgamo durlabhaśca kṣubdhaṃ jñānaṃ tāratamyasvarūpam // GarP_3,28.146 //
GP12garup3_u:4025: hariṃ guruṃ hyanusṛtyaiva satyaṃ gatiṃ svakīyāṃ tena jānīhi mūḍha /
GP12garup3_u:4026: dagdhvā duṣṭāṃ buddhimevaṃ ca mūḍha subuddhirūpaṃ mā bhajasvaiva nityam // GarP_3,28.147 //
GP12garup3_u:4027: mayā sārdhaṃ sadguruṃ prāpya samyagvairāgyapūrvaṃ tattvamātraṃ viditvā /
GP12garup3_u:4028: tenaiva mokṣaṃ prāpnumo nārjavairyattāryā viṣṇoḥ saṃprasādācca lakṣmyāḥ // GarP_3,28.148 //
GP12garup3_u:4029: ityāśayaṃ manasā sannidhāya tathā coktaṃ bhaktavaryo madīyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4030: ato bhaktaḥ pravahetyeva saṃjñāmavāpa vīndra prakṛtaṃ taṃ śṛṇu tvam // GarP_3,28.149 //
GP12garup3_u:4031: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tāratamyanirūpaṇadvārā viṣṇorevopāsyatvamityarthanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:4034: yo dharmo brahmaṇaḥ putro hyādisṛṣṭau tvagudbhavaḥ // GarP_3,29.1 //
GP12garup3_u:4037: pāpināṃ śikṣakattvātsa yama ityucyate budhaiḥ // GarP_3,29.2 //
GP12garup3_u:4039: prahlādānantaraṃ gaṅgā bhāryā vai varuṇasya ca /
GP12garup3_u:4042: jñānasvarūpadaṃ viṣṇuṃ yamo jānāti sarvadā // GarP_3,29.4 //
GP12garup3_u:4043: ato gaṅgeti sā jñeyā sarvadā lokapāvanī /
GP12garup3_u:4044: bhaktyā viṣṇupadītyeva kīrtitā nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,29.5 //
GP12garup3_u:4045: yā pūrvakāle yajñaliṅgasya viṣṇoḥ sākṣāddharervikramataḥ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:4046: vāmasya pādasya nakhāgrataśca nirbhidya cordhvāṇḍakaṭāhakhaṇḍam // GarP_3,29.6 //
GP12garup3_u:4049: śaśikaravaragaurāṃ mīnanetrāṃ supūjyāṃ smarati haripadotthāṃ mokṣameti krameṇa // GarP_3,29.7 //
GP12garup3_u:4050: indropi vāyukaramarditavāyukūṭabinduṃ ca prāśya śirasi hyasahiṣṇumānaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4052: bhaktyā ca khinnahṛdayaḥ paramādareṇa dhṛtvā svamūrdhni paramo hyaśivaḥ śivo 'bhūt // GarP_3,29.8 //
GP12garup3_u:4055: dvitīyenaiva rūpeṇa gaṅgā bhāryā ca śantanoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4056: suṣeṇā vai suṣeṇasya bhāryā sā vānarī smṛtā // GarP_3,29.10 //
GP12garup3_u:4057: maṇḍūkabhāryā gaṅgā tu saiva maṇḍūkinī smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:4058: evaṃ catvārī rūpāṇi gaṅgāyā iti kirtitamam // GarP_3,29.11 //
GP12garup3_u:4061: śaraṃvarāya pañcajanyācca pañca hitvā jagdhvā garvakaṃ ṣaṭkrameṇa /
GP12garup3_u:4062: svabāṇasya svahṛdi saṃsthitasya bhajetsadā naiva bhaktiṃ viṣaṃ ca // GarP_3,29.13 //
GP12garup3_u:4063: liṅgaṃ puṣṭaṃ naiva kāryaṃ sadaiva liṅgaṃ puṣṭaṃ kāryamevaṃ sadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:4064: yonau saktirnaiva kāryā sadāpi yonau mukte 'saṃgato yāti muktim // GarP_3,29.14 //
GP12garup3_u:4066: etāvatā śarabhākhyo mahātmā sa cāntaro sa tu parjanya eva // GarP_3,29.15 //
GP12garup3_u:4067: śaśvatkeśā yasya gātre khagendra prabhāsyante śarabhākhyo payotaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4068: yamasya bhāryā śyāmalā yā khagendra yasmātsadā kalibhāryāpiyā ca // GarP_3,29.16 //
GP12garup3_u:4069: matvā samyak mānasaṃ yā karoti hyataśca sā śyāmalāsaṃjñakābhūt /
GP12garup3_u:4070: malaṃ vakṣye haribhaktervirodhī sulohapātre sannidhānaṃ ca tasya // GarP_3,29.17 //
GP12garup3_u:4071: tadvaiṣṇavaistyājyamevaṃ sadaiva vastraṃ dagdhaṃ sandhijaṃ caiva janyam // GarP_3,29.18 //
GP12garup3_u:4072: cikitsitaṃ paraduḥ khaṃ khagendra darerbhaktaistyājyamevaṃ sadaiva // GarP_3,29.18 //
GP12garup3_u:4073: noccāśca te haribhaktervihīnāsteṣāṃ saṃgo naiva kāryaḥ sadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:4074: purāṇasaṃparkavisarjinaṃ ca purāṇatālaṃ ca purāṇavastram // GarP_3,29.19 //
GP12garup3_u:4075: sujīrṇakanthājinamekhalaṃ ca yajñopavītaṃ ca kalipriyaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4076: priyaṃ gṛhaṃ corṇavitā nakaṃ ca samitkuśaiḥ pūritaṃ kutsitaṃ ca // GarP_3,29.20 //
GP12garup3_u:4077: sarvaṃ cetkalibhāryāpriyaṃ ca naiva priyaṃ śārṅgapāṇeḥ kadācit /
GP12garup3_u:4078: kāṃsye supakvaṃ yāvanālasya cānnaṃ tuṣaḥ piṇyākaṃ tumbabilve palāṇḍuḥ // GarP_3,29.21 //
GP12garup3_u:4079: dīrghaṃ takraṃ svāduhīnaṃ kaḍūṣṭaṇamete sarve kalibhāryāpriyāśca /
GP12garup3_u:4080: sudurmukhaṃ nindanaṃ cāryajānāṃ satovamatyātmajānāṃ prasahya // GarP_3,29.22 //
GP12garup3_u:4083: ityādi sarvaṃ kalibhāryāpriyañca sunirmalaṃ prikarotyeva sarvam /
GP12garup3_u:4084: ataśca sā śyāmaleti svasaṃjñāmavāpa sā devakī saṃbabhūva // GarP_3,29.24 //
GP12garup3_u:4085: yudhiṣṭhirasyaiva babhūva patnīsaṃbhāvitā tatra ca devakī sā /
GP12garup3_u:4086: candrasya bhāryā rohiṇī vai tadeyamaśvinyādibhyo 'hyadhikā sarvadaiva // GarP_3,29.25 //
GP12garup3_u:4087: roṇīṃ dhṛtvā rohati yogyasthānaṃ tasmācca sā rohiṇīti prasiddhā /
GP12garup3_u:4088: ādityabhāryā nāma saṃjñā khagendra jñeyā sā nārāyaṇasya svarūpā // GarP_3,29.26 //
GP12garup3_u:4089: saṃjānātītyeva saṃjñāmavāpa saṃjñeti loke sūrya bhāryā khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:4090: brahmaṇḍasya hyabhimānī tu devo virāḍiti hyabhidhāmāpa tena // GarP_3,29.27 //
GP12garup3_u:4091: gaṅgādiṣaṭkaṃ samameva nityaṃ parasparaṃ nottamaṃ nādhamaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4092: pradhānāgneḥ pāvikānyaiva gaṅgā sadā śubhā nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,29.28 //
GP12garup3_u:4093: āsāṃ jñānatpuṇyamāpnoti nityaṃ sadā hariḥ prīyate keśavolam /
GP12garup3_u:4094: gaṅgādibhyo hyavarāhyagnijāyā svāhāsaṃjñādhiguṇā naiva hīnā // GarP_3,29.29 //
GP12garup3_u:4095: svāhākāro mantrarūpābhimānī svāheti saṃjñāmāpa sadaiva vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:4096: agnerbhāryāto buddhimān saṃbabhūva brahmābhimānī candraputro budhaśca // GarP_3,29.30 //
GP12garup3_u:4097: buddhyāharadvai rāṣṭrajātaṃ ca sarvaṃ dhṛtaṃ tvato budhasaṃjñāmavāpa /
GP12garup3_u:4098: evaṃ cābhūdabhimanyurmahātmā subhadrāyā jaṭhare hyarjunācca // GarP_3,29.31 //
GP12garup3_u:4099: kṛṣṇasya candrasya yamasya cāṃśaiḥ sa saṃyutastvaśvinorvai harasya /
GP12garup3_u:4100: svāhādhamaścandraputro budhastu pādāravinde viṣṇudevasya bhaktaḥ // GarP_3,29.32 //
GP12garup3_u:4102: budhādhamā sā vijñeyā svāhā daśaguṇādhamā // GarP_3,29.33 //
GP12garup3_u:4103: nakulasya bhāryā māgadhasyaiva putrī śalyātmajā sahadevasya bhāryā /
GP12garup3_u:4104: ubhe hyete aśvibhāryā hyuṣāpi upāsate ṣaḍguṇaṃ viṣṇumādyam /
GP12garup3_u:4105: ato 'pyuṣāsaṃjñakā sā khagendra anantarāñchṛṇu vakṣye mahātman // GarP_3,29.34 //
GP12garup3_u:4107: ataḥ śanaiścaro nāma uṣāyāśca daśādhamāḥ // GarP_3,29.35 //
GP12garup3_u:4108: karmātmā puṣkaro jñeyaḥ śanaratha yamo mataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4111: atastu puṣkalo nāma loke sa parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,29.37 //
GP12garup3_u:4113: prātaḥ kāle samutthāya smarennārāyaṇaṃ harim // GarP_3,29.38 //
GP12garup3_u:4119: gavāṃ kaṇḍūyane caiva smaredgovardhanaṃ harim // GarP_3,29.41 //
GP12garup3_u:4122: sparśe gavāṃ caiva sadā nṛṇāṃ vai bhavatyato nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:4123: yasmin gṛhe nāsti sadottamā ca gauryaṅgaṇe śrītulasī ca nāsti // GarP_3,29.43 //
GP12garup3_u:4124: yasmin gṛhe devamahotsavaśca yasmin gṛhe śravaṇaṃ nāsti viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4125: tatsaṃsargādyāti duḥ khādikaṃ ca tasya sparśo naiva kāryaḥ kadāpi // GarP_3,29.44 //
GP12garup3_u:4130: vatsyasya stanapāne ca bālakṛṣṇaṃ tu saṃsmaret /
GP12garup3_u:4133: puṇḍrāṇāṃ dhāraṇe caiva keśavādīṃśca dvādaśa // GarP_3,29.48 //
GP12garup3_u:4135: padmaṃ nārāyaṇīṃ mudrāṃ kruddholkādīṃśca saṃsmaret // GarP_3,29.49 //
GP12garup3_u:4139: annādyarpaṇakāle tu vāsudevaṃ ca saṃsmaret // GarP_3,29.51 //
GP12garup3_u:4142: yajñopavītasya ca dhāraṇe tu nārāyaṇaṃ vāmanākhyaṃ smarettu /
GP12garup3_u:4143: ārtikyakāle ca tathaiva viṣṇoḥ samyak smaretparśurāmākhyaviṣṇum // GarP_3,29.53 //
GP12garup3_u:4145: smarettu bhaktyā paramādareṇa nārāyaṇaṃ jāmadagnyākhyarāmam // GarP_3,29.54 //
GP12garup3_u:4146: trivāratīrthagrahaṇasya kāle kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ vyāsadevaṃ krameṇa /
GP12garup3_u:4147: śaṅkhodakasyoddharaṇe caiva kāle mukundarūpaṃ saṃsmaretsarvadaiva // GarP_3,29.55 //
GP12garup3_u:4148: grāsegrāse smaraṇaṃ caiva kāryaṃ govindasaṃjñasya viśuddhamannam /
GP12garup3_u:4149: ekaikabhakṣyagrahaṇasya kāle samyak smaredacyutaṃ vai khagendra // GarP_3,29.56 //
GP12garup3_u:4150: śākādīnāṃ bhakṣaṇe caiva kāle dhanvantariṃ smareccaiva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:4151: tathā parānnasya ca bhogakāle smarecca samyak pāṇḍuraṅgaṃ ca viṣṇum // GarP_3,29.57 //
GP12garup3_u:4152: haiyaṅgavīnasya ca bhakṣaṇe vai samyak smarettāṇḍavākhyaṃ ca kṛṣṇam /
GP12garup3_u:4153: dadhyannabhakṣe paramaṃ purāṇaṃ gopālakṛṣṇaṃ saṃsmareccaiva nityam // GarP_3,29.58 //
GP12garup3_u:4154: dugdhānnabhoge ca tathaiva kāle samyak smarecchrīnivāsaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4159: gaṅgāmṛtasyaiva ca pānakāle gaṅgātātaṃ saṃsmaredviṣṇumeva // GarP_3,29.61 //
GP12garup3_u:4161: putrādīnāṃ cuṃbane caiva kāle suveṇuhastaṃ saṃsmaretkṛṣṇameva // GarP_3,29.62 //
GP12garup3_u:4162: sukhaṅgakāle svastriyaścaiva nityaṃ gopi kucadvandvavilāsinaṃ harim /
GP12garup3_u:4163: tāṃbūlakāle saṃsmaraiccaiva nityaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ vāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca // GarP_3,29.63 //
GP12garup3_u:4164: śayyākāle saṃsmareccaiva nityaṃ saṃkarṣaṇākhyaṃ viṣṇurūpaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4165: nidrākāle saṃsmaretpadmanāmaṃ kathākāle vyāsarūpaṃ hariṃ ca // GarP_3,29.64 //
GP12garup3_u:4167: śrīmattulasyāśchedane caiva kāle śrīrāmarāmeti ca saṃsmarettu // GarP_3,29.65 //
GP12garup3_u:4168: puṣpādīnāṃ chedane caiva kāle samyaka smaredetkapilākhyaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4169: pradakṣiṇegāruḍāntargataṃ ca hariṃ smaretsarvadā vai khagendra // GarP_3,29.66 //
GP12garup3_u:4170: praṇamakāle devadevasya viṣṇoḥ śeṣāntasthaṃ saṃsmareccaiva viṣṇum /
GP12garup3_u:4172: pūrtiryadā kriyate karmaṇāṃ ca samyak smaredvāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4173: evaṃ kṛtāni karmāṇi hariprītikarāṇi ca // GarP_3,29.68 //
GP12garup3_u:4175: etasmādeva pakṣīśa karma yatsamudāhṛtam puṣkarākhyānamatulaṃ śṛṇoti śraddhayānvitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4177: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde tattvarahasyaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśodhyāyaḥ
